review: The waiter was so nice and helpful. Food and drink was lovely and the views were amazing. We were not rushed at all from the table.

We went last evening 5.30 pm. Beautiful views of the Old Town and surrounds. Except for the huge crane blocking the view. Our 5 star hotel booked a seat on the front row for us. We walked up stairs for the restaurant as instructed by the uber driver. The young woman on front desk told us to go out the door and walk down the stairs. No other help or direction. We stumbled on next level and the woman there checked our reservation and took us down the hill to the lowest deck where the bar was. My wife noticed our table reserved was no 42 but we were taken to no 22. Why? We were dressed well and baby boomers. We got money. So got a bad table. Waiter was rushed and totally disinterested in us. The food was lamb cutlets (waiter argued with us that it was lamb chops) and I had risotto. 5-6 mouthfuls. Price was really large. A total rip off. But we saw a sunset

My friends and I had the best time at the Panorama tonight. We walked up the trail around sunset and were able to get a table right away. Tony was our server and was so thoughtful. He made sure our heat lamp was in the right place and even brought us a second one when he noticed we were cold. A reservation cancelled and he also moved us to a better table to enjoy our drinks! This whole experience is an absolute must if you’re in Dubrovnik. Thank again, Tony!
Amazing food, view, and excellent wait staff. Well worth the trip and would strongly recommend. Beefsteak dinner was a 16 oz tenderloin cooked to perfection.

We booked prior to our arrival in Croatia due to reviews we’d seen. Glad we did as we were able to book a front row table on a day where the weather was lovely, luckily we did not leave it till later as the weather changed at the end of our break. 
Walk ins were being taken while we were there but in between bookings so at a reduced time allocation at the table but we wanted to take our time and enjoy the experience.
Our waiter was very friendly, very knowledgeable of the menu and was able to suggest alternatives to our original choice which meant we could enjoy more items off the menu. 
We had a vegetable risotto to start, beef steak main, sweets & drinks at a reasonable price €140 for two. The beef was cooked to perfection. 
All of the above was complimented by the amazing location looking over the old town. 
Would highly recommend and will return.

View is spectacular but I would recommend going for Lunch rather than dinner this time of year. It was cold when the sun went down and became quite deserted when the cable car stopped running.
Food was good but nothing special.

A great menu, with the light lunch option being very filling!
I had not booked in advance, but only had to wait 5 minutes for a table.
I had the steak sandwich which was delicious, and a strawberry kiss cocktail which was an absolute delight!
Service was excellent, and despite it being busy I was not rushed at all.
Considering the venue, I did not think it was overpriced at all.

It seems the reviews for this restaurant are either very good or very bad, probably our perspective is that you are visiting to sit down and enjoy the views ...
Anyway, we visited just before noon mid-week without a booking and managed to get a front-row table. 
Being able to sit and enjoy the view was worth it.

That said, we ordered light, a steak sandwich along with the cream cake.
The steak sandwich was surprisingly good (and contrary to some other reviews, had plenty of steak). The cake was well .. cake.

Overall, if you can't make a booking online, give it a try, you might be able to walk in. Don't expect too much in terms of food and just take in the view.

Amazing place with phenomenal food. This place is a must. Additionally we had the privilege to be served by Vedran, he went one step further, perfect recommendations, great service and incomparable attitude. 10/10.
Wow wow wow! What a place. I could not fault anything ! The staff were lovely. The food was amazing ! The strawberry mocktail was the best drink I’ve had !
Stopped in for lunch, lot of great options, food was good, views are amazing. Pricing reasonable considering the views.

Food is amazing - we had the cacio e Pepe to start which was incredible. My wife had the veal with risotto and I have the seafood rice dish. Great views and the waiter brought us a heat lamp and asked if we wanted to switch tables to move closer to the overlook. 10/10 would recommend

From start to finish the service at the Panorama restaurant was amazing! Showed up without a reservation and was seated promptly. Also arrived around 5:20pm and our order was placed as a priority to ensure we could still get food from the lunch menu. Our waiter was friendly and welcoming, he couldn't do enough to ensure we had a lovely experience. We were at the perfect time to see the sunset as well. Came for the view, stayed for the food. Fab experience. Highly recommend

Amazing food and amazing service 
The view is stunning and the restaurant provided heaters and blankets when the sun went down 
Sunset was stunning.

The view from the top was really great, overlooking the old town and the Dubrovnik town. The food was excellent. Our server, Vedran was really good. Everything was superb. The price is reasonable enough. We will definitely come back. Great experience.

It is my first visit to Croatia and Panarama restaurant with friends. We all ordered different foods from the menu and they were all excellent. Waiter versrun was outstanding in his service. I will definitely come back again with my family
The place and the food is very good. Our server Vedran is very nice and friendly. I will recommend this place to our friends and family.

Excellent service from Vedran, we came up the day before and tried to book a table outside First Throw but there was no room - however, the staff took our booking inside and when we arrived gave us a table overlooking the city at sunset. A real experience which we would highly recommend.

Beautiful view and elegant atmosphere. The dishes were not only delicious but also artfully plated. A perfect spot for a relaxing and visually pleasing dining experience. Make sue to make a reservation of the front row table before you go to have the best view here.
Beautiful location what a view, excellent service and great food. Recommend the steak sandwich, the waiter actually suggested it… he wasn’t wrong. Go there and just live the experience. *****
Incredible place, incredible views and an even more incredible waiter. Service and food was next to none, would recommend again 100 times. Must visit.

The service was chef’s kiss wonderful. Our server, Petra, was exceptionally kind and helpful. The cacio e pepe was unique and excellent. We very enthusiastically recommend Panorama to everyone who wants great food, fantastic service, and gorgeous views.
This restaurant is a must experience, you need to make this a priority while in Dubrovnik. Our waitress Petra was fantastic!
The only downside were the bugs but that’s outside the restaurant’s control. The service and drinks were great. Glad we celebrated our anniversary here.
The view is amazing! Food and cocktails are pricey but really good. I feel like you get what you pay for here. Make sure to get reservations well in advance as the place books up really fast

Fantastic place to visit. Staff very friendly 
 Views fantastic. Wine was lovely. Went with family and it was excellent. Recommend
Amazing restaurant with stunning views. Service was outstanding, food and drinks also great!!! Would definitely recommend and would come again if we come back Dubrovnik

What a place!
Amazing views, excellent food and service
Made to feel very special nothing was too much trouble.
Booked months in advance for a front row view
Absolutely beautiful view and delicious food and drinks!! Petra, you were a star!! Loved a beautiful lunch here and this spot is highly, highly recommended to experience when in Dubrovnik!!

We had booked a reservation 6 months ago and were guaranteed a first row outside seat overlooking iconic Dubrovnik. The weather did not cooperate and the evening of our reservation we had gale force winds. All people were forced inside which provided a great challenge the staff. We are easy-going and realized that they were trying to please as many people as they could under difficult circumstances. All reservations had to be accommodated inside a tiny space. We were originally seated in a space in the back of the restaurant right near the drafty door. We said that was fine as we new they were challenged. The mentioned that if a window seat became available we would be moved. The server immediately brought 2 complimentary glasses of champagne to our table. Just after that a table became available up front and we were moved. At the end of our meal we were provided with 10% discount. My point is that the staff functioned under a lot of stress and still provided great service and discounts not really necessary. That is the sign of professionally run restaurant. The food you ask??? It was superb. I had pasta and seafood as a starter and a huge piece of salmon. My wife had tempura and everything was wonderful.

Our tour guide, who was wonderful, kind of worried me about my choice for our group's lunch here. It is true that you can eat cheaper lots of other places. BUT, it was not true that few tables had a good view - they actually have it arranged very strategically so most tables have a good view. AND, I booked very far ahead and asked for "front row" and they made it happen even though i increased are large table by two at the last minute. The "waiting area" is very nice, with high tops and REALLY good cocktails. The food and view, and service, were amazing. Everyone loved it.

We moved our reservation seamlessly through Anita and we had an amazing time. The staff were great, the food was delicious and the view was breathtaking. The best view for espresso martinis. Would definitely recommend.
Amazing views, food and service was very good. Memorable experience and a special birthday dessert on the house for the birthday girl.
Absolutely amazing service by Vedran!!! I highly recommend his service to anyone joining for lunch!! 5 plus stars all around!!!

Excellent views, excellent food, lovely waiters 
Yes it’s pricey but a perfect memorable lunch in Dubrovnik 
Try and book front tables they are perfect

5 out of 5! Easy to book online from the UK. The menu is lovely, something for everyone and if you like a cocktail, they looked amazing! The staff warmly greeted us and acknowledged my husband’s birthday (which I’d mentioned when booking). They then gifted him his desert and added a candle and ‘happy birthday’ sign. The service was prompt and friendly. Food was cooked to perfection and do I even need to mention the view! Wow! 
It clouded up a bit during our stay, so got a bit chilly, do consider a jacket if going later in the year. We walked up the mountain, which required a sturdy shoe and good fitness, but the toilets are clean and spacious to freshen up and change before your meal. 

Don’t miss this gem.

Fabulous dinner, excellent service, GREAT views!! We enjoyed a second row table which provided a nice view of Old Town as well as a wonderful sunset!! One friend ordered the sea bass, delicious. One friend had the veal risotto...yummy. I had the Chef's Prawns....absolutely worth the effort to peel...wore their bib to protect my clothing :) We shared the grilled vegetables, also very good! The wait staff was attentive, courteous, never rushed us. We are SO happy we booked the restaurant.

Panorama restaurant and its staff always meets high expectations
The view at Old Town and Elaphiti Islands are simply out of this world
Many thanks to Tomo and Ivan for making our dinner so amazing
Looking forward to see you again asap!

Visited after taking the fast and convenient cable car up the mountain. The restaurant is located right next to the cable car station, with tables located right at the mountain edge or standing tables to have a beer at, as we chose to do. Fantastic panoramic views of Old Town and Dubrovnik city. Waiters were friendly and appreciative of efforts to speak some Croatian greetings. Definitely recommend going up as you won’t get these views anywhere else.

Servers were very lovely and attentive. Great setting to watch the sun set over Dubrovnik and some stunning food. A little pricey and if you want to sit outside, book ahead! The food was outstanding though and I was very happy to pay what I did. Not small posho servings there!

A beautiful restaurant in a beautiful setting. 
It was very busy and we had no reservation. The staff kindly allowed us to sit in the lobby area. When a table was available the food and service was excellent - the waiter was great, very friendly and with lovely sense of humour.
Wonderful late afternoon lunch and drinks, with a breathtaking view. I would recommend for the food, drinks, service amd view.

Tried to book a table here but it was fully booked. Decided to visit anyway as we had used the cable car. Had the warmest reception from a lovely young lady who offered us a 2nd row table for 1 hr. It was perfect. Had great drinks with a superb view. Staff were great. We had already eaten elsewhere but the food around us looked and smelt great too.

What a lovely evening & meal. We reserved our table in March in order to get a prime seat at Sunset and we weren’t disappointed. The evening started with a ride on the funicular and a trip to the War Museum. We are of Croatian descent and wanted to educate ourselves before we left the country. After the Museum, we headed for the restaurant and spent the next 2+ hours embracing the Dalmatian way of enjoying the moment. Rib Eye and Sea Bass were ordered with Burrata for appetizer. The staff the best we’ve encountered on this trip, the food flavorful and nicely presented. 

We will return on the next trip. Thank you for a wonderful meal & evening.
Lovely restaurant situated at the top of Mount Sdr. We came here to celebrate our 5th anniversary. Food was delicious, atmosphere enjoyable and service was excellent
Overpriced. The view is spectacular the service great but the food was marginal. Take an Uber to see the sunset but eat somewhere else
We turned up ad hoc, no reservations but with only a couple of minutes wait we had a perfect table with lovely views. Lovely cocktails, excellent food and very friendly service.

Superb recommend it to anyone A*
Great view brilliant staff and waiter service. Will come again. Please make sure you book to get the best experience
Great views and service. Food was tasty and the drinks were top notch. The location cannot be beat and the vibe of the space is relaxed.
Food was pretty nice, service was great….the view is the real reason to eat here….it is amazing. Would recommend coming for sunset. Be sure to book!!

Perfect, entirely one of a kind setting. Service by Vedran made us feel like royalty. Delicious food and generous drinks. Don’t let people tell you it’s “overpriced,” or whatever naysaying; THIS is a reason to visit Dubrovnik in itself!
Lovely spot, great service and superb food and drinks. Must do! Highly recommended and to make this review the required 100 characters……..

Beautiful location.. outstanding service, and food was exceptional..
Highly recommend 

Make a reservation and watch the sunset

We had originally booked the evening but feared we would miss out on the views, what a breath taking restaurant with unbelievable staff and food, this is a must when in Dubrovnik, only tip is to book early for the front row, a very special experience
Fabulous experience! Magnificent views perfect service and excellent food. Not to be missed!! Highlight of our trip to Dubrovnik

Fantastic restaurant with a wonderful view over the old town of Dubrovnik, and over the entire coast. When we thought that the view would be the best of this experience we were surrendered to the sympathy and attention of the entire team that welcomed us. The food was divine! A place to repeat

We were three couples on holiday from the UK and found this to be the most stunning setting for a special meal. Make sure you book in advance as it’s so popular. Beautiful views with delicious food, cocktails and attentive service. 100% recommend.

Fabulous food and excellent experience.
Staff are very friendly and service outstanding.
Views are to die for.Such a wonderful evening.

Our sunset dining experience was truly amazing. The quality of the ambiance matched the quality of the food. Our server Ivo was excellent with his recommendations and service. Would definitely visit again!

Cannot fault this beautiful restaurant. The service, the food and their style was brilliant.
It helps also when the views are exceptional.

Just drove up for the view and found the restaurant. Outside was busy so went inside. Far better and cooler. Sat by the window. Great views. Great food and service. Not cheap but you are paying for the view as well of course.

Absolutely brilliant experience.
I booked in advance as it was a big birthday celebration.
Booking was easy. We got a fabulous table on front row as requested. 
I worried the food wouldn’t match the location but it was exceptional, as was the wine and cocktails. 
Service was also brilliant.
They made a cake for us, followed my photos for inspiration, even put giant rocket candles on it, and I gave them a cake topper when I got there. All was seamless.
Beyond impressed!

Marco was an excellent host and server. We enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere of the restaurant with a lovely view. Marco suggested their charcuterie plate which was perfect along with our wine and beer. Very relaxing in a very busy city.

I rated this as 5-stars ONLY for the patio view. The cocktails were also very nice, but that's where it stops and this becomes a 1 or 2 star review. It seems that if you are young, hip and beautiful, you are guaranteed the very best patio tables. After reading the negative reviews, we saw this was a typical thing with this restaurant, so we decided to only have drinks here. When we arrived, there were free tables with a great view. But they sat us beside a busy wait station with only a view of... water. When we asked to move, they gave some flimsy excuses as to why it wasn't possible. Right after we made the requests, they would plonk a Reserved sign at the tables we requested, and there the sign would sit until an approved type of guest arrived. How snooty and shameful.

An exceptional fine dining experience from start to finish. The atmosphere is elegant yet welcoming, and the attention to detail in every dish is remarkable. The service was outstanding—attentive, professional, and genuinely warm—making the entire evening truly memorable. Highly recommended for anyone seeking refined cuisine paired with exceptional service.

Had a genuinely fabulous experience. The views were spectacular. We were sat on the front row which added to the entire experience. Wait staff were attentive without being overbearing & food and drink quality was perfect. I do think the value of food and drink matches the price, you get what you pay for and you of course pay for the view. Best place we have eaten in dubrovnik.
Great food, fantastic views of the city and staff are pleasant definitely recommend it a place to try when visiting Dubrovnik

Excellent experience!! I was lucky enough to have a table right on the edge, and the view was better than I could have ever imagined. My waiter, Vedran, was so friendly and warm and gave me perfect recommendations. This was the perfect way to end my 3 week trip around the Balkans.

I was expecting a touristy restaurant in a beautiful location with okay food. We were presently surprised to find really good food at a really nice restaurant!!! The earlier you plan your reservations, the better the table location- since I booked several months in advance, we had a perfect table at the edge of the mountain looking down at both the sunset as well as Old Town. Definitely recommended when visiting Dubrovnik.

Went at night time, views are insanely beautiful. Want to specifically thank Sinava, Vedran and Ivan for taking care of us and being stellar hosts and making my friends birthday special! Would recommend the lamb chops - cooked to perfection. They also offer blankets on chilly evenings so 10s all round from me
Visited here for our 1 year wedding anniversary meal! It was absolutely stunning and the food & service was outstanding!

It's a stunning setting and the food is pretty good. You oay a premium for the location but it's not outrageous.
Service a little slow which knocked it down from 5 stars but still a very, very good option
Absolutely wonderful we were upgraded to rear one. The food was absolutely delicious and the scenery was amazing. I would highly recommend this place

Amazing experience, insane views, wonderful ambience but most memorable was the service from Vedra - super attentive and when the wind threw my wine everywhere he was there to replace jt immediately. Definitely recommend.

My wife and I had sundowners at the Panorama bar located at the upper Cable car station in Dubrovnik recently. If you’re looking for a place to enjoy a few sundowners with a spectacular view of the Old Town, while watching the sun set, look no further - there are spectacular views from up here. We didn’t dine here as we were not able to get a booking, due to it being peak season, but did get a table in the open air bar section. Good selection of drinks, but with a price tag, given where it’s at. That said, highly recommended, as the views are breathtaking.

Beautiful restaurant with stunning views over Dubrovnik. Food was tasty, service was friendly, and the atmosphere made it a really special evening. Definitely recommend it, especially at sunset! Definitely worth the wait my 3 months table booking reservation,
The view is very beautiful at night , the staff is friendly and attentive, the dishes are quality overall. Very good experience in Dubrovnik

Where to start.... this was quite the experience, truly. Upon arrival we were greeted by the friendliest host who quickly sat us at a premiere table with the most exquisite views. The views had our attention as our wonderful waiter patiently took our drink orders. We opted to try a fruity cocktail and a local beer, both of which were delicious. Our meal arrived shortly after placing the order and WOW, the food was phenomenal. Everything tasted fresh, flavorful and our table was silent as each of us soaked in the views while devouring the most delicious meal. Panorama is an experience for all the senses and an absolute must if you find yourself in the most beautiful country in the world.
Service, food and scenery all excellent. Would recommend visiting. The cable car was not working for our visit. We caught an uber to and from the restaurant
Perfect experience! Wonderful service! Petra was amazing!!! The view was fantastic and food was out of this world!!!!

I had two glasses of Croatian white wine, once Malvasia, once a local grape variety I didn't know. Both times a direct hit, great in fragrance and on the tongue. The view while drinking directly on Dubrovnik. Who cares that it was n Euro too expensive. This is Croatia.
Really friendly waitress and really delicious meal! A wonderful evening! Love the linguini dish. My favorite. And my friend had teletina is also wonderful.

For an unforgettable lunch with an unparalleled view, Panorama is the place to be. We visited in the early afternoon, and the panoramic view from the top of Mount Srđ was absolutely spectacular. The delicious food and sophisticated setting were complemented by the excellence of the staff, whose warm and attentive service made the experience truly special.
Great food and service! Would recommend the ribeye and lots of drinks to choose from. With a beautiful view!!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️
Food and atmosphere was amazing. Dragana was an excellent waitress who look after us. Thankyou for a lovely experience 😊😊😊😊😊😊 10/10
Lovely experience! Great view and wonderful service. Our waiter Martin was very kind. Food felt fresh and healthy - you’re definitely optimizing for vibes > food.

Amazing resort!! Friendly staff, great food and activities! Definitely recommend this place if you’re looking for a family feel. 
Clean and spacious rooms. 
Thanks for the experience,
Katina

Truly a must-visit restaurant in Dubrovnik. The very best we’ve been to! The views are out of this world, the food and drinks are exquisite and the service is first-class from the friendliest staff. Amazing place. You must come!

I had booked several months ago for a front table at sunset and it did not disappoint. The view was unbelievable. The service was impeccable. Knowledgable and polite waiting staff. Just fabulous for our last night in Dubrovnik.

Amazing experience! Great staff, especially Toni, Vida, Lucija … honestly, the entire staff is incredible & very personable! I had the best birthday! 
Hvala ti što si to učinio/la tako posebnim!
Thank you to the wonderful manager for gifting me with a hat! 🫶😘🤗🥳💕

Probably the most spectacular location I've ever had the privilege to eat dinner. I will book another evening in a few days before I leave Dubrovnik. And it's not just the location. The decor/landscaping is elegantly stylish and the menu is top quality and imaginative too. By any international standard this is 5 stars, As good as anything you'll find in Monte Carlo or the Amalfi Coast.
Enjoyed a lovely dinner in the indoor dining area. The food , service, and view were all excellent, and our server, Mirza, was exceptional.
Amazing view! Amazing food! Amazing service by everyone, especially Martin. We enjoyed wine and their lamb chops and grilled beef steak dishes. 10/10

The Service was very good super friendly and polite. And also the drinks and food were very good additionally you have an excellent view. The perfect place to end the day relaxed after a day in Dubrovnik.
The prices are therefore planned a little more accordingly.
Amazing food and service. Highly recommend! Our waiter Martin was lovely and very attentive and made sure we had everything we needed 😊 the view over Dubrovnik was absolutely stunning!!

We decided to go up to Panorama - mainly for the sunset views. We didn't use the cable car as it was a really hot night and didn't fancy being in a hot box with plenty of other people so we took a taxi - door to door (hotel door) for about the same price as the cable car - and it was air conditioned!
We got to the restaurant and was told that they didn't have any outside tables unless we wanted to wait for a couple of hours - no thanks - but offered us a table inside. 
Got taken to our table (first table), hubby went to take some pictures and I moved our table (second table - away from the plants), hubby came back and we were just having drinks waiting for our food and the lovely young lady came over to us and offered us a table by the window (third table) which we took and want disappointed. 
Food arrived - I had veal risotto, and the hubby had steak - all delicious 😋 

I had tried to book this restaurant prior to coming on holiday, but couldn't get in, so I was pleased we did the walk-in.
Would recommend, but he warned - it's not a cheap meal.

Amazing restaurant with stunning views. 
My boyfriend and I visited when on a cruise, we had this restaurant booked well in advance and can honestly say it was the highlight of our trip. 
The staff are so polite and accommodating, really making you feel special. 
I thought the prices were reasonable and the customer service was excellent, there was a little wait and food and to say thank you we we were given our drinks for free. A lovely touch and we had no complaints as we didn’t mind waiting for the food with such stunning views! 
For everyone saying it is over priced I can strongly disagree, we paid more in other places whist on holiday!!

Lovely setting, it's really hard not to love where the restaurant is given the spectacular views from pretty much every seat.

We went as a family of 5 and had to wait for a table, and once sat we had another wait for service which was surprising given there didn't seem to be a shortage of staff.

Staff were professional rather than welcoming or friendly, drinks good and food was okay but not great. Disappointing for me was the attitude I received when I asked for a naked burger (no bun) when they said it wasn't possible. 

Given a 3 rating due to the staff attitude really. Although the food wasn't as good as other restaurants in the town at the bottom of the hill, the views made up for it.
Overall wonderful experience. Staff are very attentive and friendly. Food was to a very high standard and wonderful views over old town especially at sunset. Highly recommend.

You are spoilt for choice for good spots to eat in Dubrovnik, so why Panorama restaurant? The answer is simple, for the breathtaking views and unique outlook over the old town. We booked in advance so managed to get a table in the first line, which meant for our own little space literally inches from the edge, and an unhindered and spectacular view. The menu is pretty vast, both a full choice of main meals and “lighter” options for lunch. Service was great. A lovely way to spend a couple of hours.
Martin was an amazing server. He was very attentive and helpful. Would recommend the view and experience to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

I had a great experience at Panorama Bar, and a big part of that was thanks to Mohamed El Badry. Mohamed was professional, friendly, and genuinely welcoming. His attention to detail and positive energy made the whole visit even more enjoyable.

A fabulous restaurant overlooking Dubrovnik with amazing views. The cable car station is right next door or take a taxi to the top of the hill. We visited just before the sun set and we were shown to our table ahead of our booking time as it had freed up. We had plenty of time to enjoy the views , setting and our meal. The staff were very attentive, professional and very polite. The service was excellent, and the food and meal was one of the best we had whilst on holiday. An amazing experience all round and worth spending a few more Euros to create a lovely memory. We would fully recommend this restaurant.
We came here for an anniversary dinner, our server was phenomenal, the food was perfect! Our server even took photos of us after dinner!

Fantastic Risotto! Great pleasant service! Wonderful location. Heaters & blankets available

Service was fantastic & able to split bills

We loved the Panorama experience for our son’s 21st. It made day that little bit more special. The views are amazing, the staff are very professional, the food is lovely - we had a light lunch and delicious desserts. The atmosphere was great. Would definitely recommend booking rather than just rocking up hoping to get a table.

Amazing views of the city. Food was excellent and service was impeccable. 
Yes, it was a little pricy but not much more expensive than a dinner in the old town. Totally worth it for the views!

An Unforgettable Afternoon with a View
My family and I had an incredible dining experience. From the moment we arrived for our reservation, the staff was exceptionally accommodating, moving us to a front-row table with an unforgettable view of Dubrovnik's Old Town and Lapad.
The ambiance was beautiful, but the true highlight was our waiter, Martin Galic. He was an expert on both the food and drink menus, offering fantastic recommendations throughout our lunch. We started with a delicious Italian meat and cheese charcuterie board, perfectly paired with refreshing Aperol Spritzes. For dessert, we shared a wonderful apple pie, and Martin helped us end the meal with a classic Sljivovica.
The food was excellent, the prices were reasonable, and the views were simply breathtaking. Thanks to Martin and the entire team, our dinner was truly special. We can’t wait to return!
Incredible view and great food selection. Entrees were delicious and service from Martin was outstanding. Will definitely be back!

I pre-booked a front row table which did not disappoint. Everything about this place is just stunning. The location - the views - the drinks - the food and the service. 

Highly recommend!

We couldn’t have been happier about the food, the view and the service. We ordered “a lot of food” as the waiter said but didn’t regret a single bite of it. We ordered our drinks, Deep Blue cocktail and a cider, there was no rush in ordering food as at one stage we couldn’t make our minds up, so we got recommendations from the waiter, and then we still couldn’t make up our minds as everything sounded amazing!

 We got the beef carpaccio and the Dalmatian trilogy to start with focaccia for the table. To say we were speechless would be an understatement, order them both if you’re unsure as you won’t be disappointed in the slightest ! 

Then for the mains we got the lamb chops, the beef steak, and the prawns. We couldn’t choose and we’re glad we didn’t leave anything behind. The steak was like butter, superb ! The lamb was so stunning in looks and taste. The prawns were one of the tastiest dishes we’ve had while on holidays (and at home) 

The service was exquisite couldn’t complain on any part of the meal, we had two hours of absolute bliss with the stunning views, service and food. Definitely pre book your table as it does get extremely busy around sunset.

Completely forgot to get a picture of the prawns as we were so busy eating the dish but don’t let it deter you as I promise it’s amazing, so worth it !

Those who are willing to spend a little more will be rewarded with an unforgettable experience in the Panorama. The location on Mount Srđ is spectacular – the view over Dubrovnik and the Adriatic Sea is simply breathtaking and worth the cable car ride alone. You can also go there by taxi, the cost is similar for 2 people. 

The food? Excellent. Creatively prepared, tastefully to the point and beautifully arranged. Especially the fish dishes and local specialties have inspired us. The Service was attentive, friendly and professional – without being intrusive.

Yes, the prices are upscale – but absolutely justified given the quality, location and overall atmosphere. For a special dinner in Dubrovnik, the Panorama is the address.

Recommendation: Make sure to book in advance and arrive in time for sunset – the view is unique.

My husband and I had the pleasure of dining at panorama restaurant in July. We sat on the first row outdoors and I would say book that if you can. The view is spectacular and we got to see sunset over the water during our meal. The food was delicious and drinks were great. A must do dinner if you’re in Dubrovnik!
This restaurant is amazing. The views of the old town are magnificent. It is well worth a visit. The food was very good and very reasonably priced

Stunning restaurant over looking Dubrovnik coast and old town.
Food was delicious and staff very friendly. We came for our wedding anniversary and they went above and beyond to make our date special. Would highly recommend.

We had lunch at front row. Managed to find reservation the night before (bunch of tables became available late in the evening). Was hoping for a dinner reservation but when I tried 2-3 months before there was no availability so I would advise booking much sooner for front row dinner during peak season (June/August, possibly September). 
The welcome by the two hostesses was warm and friendly and we had the most incredible view from our table.

My husband had a burger which was good and I ordered squid with rice dish that ended up being Indian/Croatian fusion dish that tasted amazing and, if I were I home back in Toronto, I would have just loved. My suggestion would be to discuss with the waiter if one wants a more traditional dish because I had no idea that I was getting a fusion dish based on the description. I still really enjoyed my fusion dish and it was superbly made. 

I ordered a cocktail with Rosemary and it was the best cocktail on this trip but 90% of it was ice. When I jokingly mentioned to the waiter that it is 90% ice as o was ordering the second one (in Croatian, my native tongue) he told me that this is just how all cocktails everywhere were made. It felt needlessly defensive (I wasn’t asking for anything extra) and took away from the good service we got initially. 
Overall a great experience and I would highly recommend it.

This is a fantastic restaurant with great views and amazing food. But we really recommend booking 1 month or more before you arrive because we tried booking 2 weeks before and it was completely sold out. We got lucky by turning up for drinks and getting lucky with a super nice table, it was inside but still probably the best view you could get. The cable cart was fun and the staff were lovely. Eating amazing food and having one of the best views we will probably ever see is just fabulous!
The view, the food, the staff everything 5/5 spectacular!!! I cannot recommend this place enough, wasn’t a massive fan of most of the food in Croatia but this place changed my mind it was unreal

Panorama truly lived up to its name! We took the scenic cable car to the top of the hill, where we enjoyed a lovely walk and stunning views before dinner. Our table overlooked the city — the perfect spot to watch the sunset.

Our server, Martin, was exceptional — accommodating, energetic, and full of great food recommendations. He also shared some interesting insights about Dubrovnik, which made us feel right at home. Highly recommend requesting him when at this restaurant.

We started with refreshing mojitos that were perfectly balanced — not too sweet. For appetizers, we had the beef carpaccio and the orecchiette, both of which were delicious. For our main course, we shared the beef steak and chicken dish. Everything was so flavorful, we ended up taking the leftovers home.

Panorama is an absolute go-to when visiting Dubrovnik. The combination of the view, service, and food makes it an unforgettable experience.
The staff here were so friendly, Martin our server was very kind and was willing to take time to talk to us about Dubrovnik. I would recommend visiting this restaurant during your trip.

I had booked this restaurant for when we had stopped in Dubrovnik while on a cruise. I am so glad we did! We celebrated our 30th anniversary with a beautiful seat overlooking the old town and the sea. The food was incredible, drinks were amazing and staff was fantastic. We loved everything about our visit here. Only little extra that might have been nice was we had said we were celebrating our 30th and they didn’t acknowledge it in anyway.
A fantastic location with breathtaking views of Dubrovnik's Old Town.Very attentive nice staff and super delicious food. We would love to come back:).
The restaurant Panorama had the best views, food, and atmosphere of anywhere in the city! Would 10/10 recommend this place!!

Stunning views at the top of the cable car and really delicious food. Seen some reviews suggesting the food isn’t good but our food was faultless and reasonable priced really. I had the steak sandwich which was delicious, not fatty meat. My mum had the chicken burger which was SO tasty. My sister had the ham and cheese toastie .. she is a fussy one and had zero complaints. 
Drinks definitely on expensive side, €7 for a small glass bottle of coke. 
Service was amazing, very pleasant waiter.

We really enjoyed our dinner. The view was fantastic and the guy who served us was super kind and friendly. The food was delicious, we would recommend it to everyone, it was magical and the best restaurant we did so far in Croatia.

Amazing view! Amazing service! Came for just a light bite to cool down from the heat and accompanied with a Mango Daiquiri which was superb! Such a wonderful place to spend your afternoon for a good meal! Would highly recommend!

Our first night in Dubrovnik. The cable car ride up, coupled with the scenery and the wonderful service by the servers at Panorama restaurant made for a special night. The restaurant were able to accommodate my dietary requirements of vegetarian and coeliac. The food was delicious. Our server went above and beyond. It's obviously a bit pricey as you're 60 euros per couple to get up the cable car to the restaurant
 We were then 200 euros for a meal with desert and bottle of wine but it was worth every penny. Definitely a special night.

We visited the store in the morning for coffee and asked if we could sit at the front tables for a while (they wrote almost everything reserve) and we were put back back. The next couple who came and asked for it were placed at a reserve table while they had no reservation. I can't understand the distinction! The staff was rude. I'm so sorry!

If you are coming to Dubrovnik you should 100% book this restaurant! Stunning location, easy access via the cable car and we got an uber down which was no issue! The service was outstanding. We all had steak and it was the best steak I have ever eaten!! A Must go to restaurant with beautiful views of old town.
Beautiful place! Definitely worth of visiting because of the stunning view of Dubrovnik! Food was great and service very good. I will visit again
Very nice restaurant with delicious food and magnificient view. Martin was very nice and gave us an incredible service, we had a lot of fun! Would recommend!

Wow - what a wonderful experience. The breathtaking views obviously help but the whole set up at the restaurant is outstanding. Incredibly kind and attentive staff who can’t do enough to make your experience an enjoyable one. Delicious food, wonderfully presented at very reasonable prices given the location.

Fantastic!! A must do for your visit to Dubrovnik. We were lucky enough to have a table with an amazing view. The food was gorgeous and staff were attentive and welcoming. Book ahead if you plan for dinner. A***
Amazing food and view and service!!! So worth coming. It is expensive but worth the money for the view and food! Highly recommend

The food was okay, my partner and I had a burger and the bun was quite stale, we were unable to get a table on the main side even though we booked 3 months in advance. So for anyone wanting a table on the main side I would recommend booking at least 5-6 months ahead.

The staff weren’t that friendly, a little standoffish. We couldn’t make out if they were either just fed up working or judging us as we were a young couple. 

This restaurant is trending on tik tok and we don’t really see the hype.

The cable car is a good experience, however it does cost €30 per person for a return ticket.
It’s best place in Dubrovnik! ❤️❤️ service super! Staff very friendly and the dishes is very good quality, it’s was my birthday and I think it was best decision to celebrate here! ❤️
Great experience. Service was tremendous! Especially Petra who was great fun & amazing service . Lovely food . We got a lucky cancellation on the terrace and weather was stunning.

Amazing food for a birthday lunch! Great service and friendly staff! No rushing to turn the table and wonderful views! Our waiter Martin Jovev was fabulous! Would def come back and recommend! Felt very spoilt and special for a birthday Treat!
Great food, service and views. Approximately 1500 feet up, looking down on Old Town Dubrovnik. Great place to watch the sunset.

3 courses menu super delicious 
does not cost as much we Paid amount bi 150 euros 
with the swerves top 
reserve but genung early
This restaurant and staff were amazing. Had to book 4 months in advance, well worth the effort. Food was excellent. Service was 5 star, was happy to take photos for us. Loved it
Absolutely delicious dinner! Petra took amazing care of us and handled a tricky mollusk allergy with so much grace. This was an absolute must for your stay in Dubrovnik.
absolutely amazing, had the best dish of my life, if you come here ask for the dubrovnik style dish, it was a delicious surprise

We came for the view — and yes, it’s absolutely breathtaking — but what made our visit truly special was the service. Our waiter Martin was incredibly kind, attentive, and made us feel so welcome. He took the time to recommend dishes and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish!

View was great and best meal I’ve had in Croatia, delicious. Unfortunately wait staff not interested. Gave us the dessert menu and didn’t return for our order. Had to flag waiter down to take our order before our allotted time was up. Disappointing given restaurant wasn’t busy today.
The best meal I have ever eaten with breathtaking views, simply perfect! A tad expensive but you truly get what you pay for, highly recommend!

We had a really good experience at Panorama Bar & Restaurant. The food was good and tasty, and the sauce for the dishes was also really good. The place has a lovely atmosphere with a wonderful view.

All in all a cozy place that we would like to visit again!
Wow! Amazing views, food and service. Staff very kind and accommodating, particularly Vedran who looked after us for the evening Well worth a visit to this beautiful place.
Beautiful restaurant with gorgeous views and even better food. Special thank you to our waiter Martin who made the experience even more enjoyable!
Gorgeous 360 views and phenomenal food & drinks. Amazing for gluten free accommodations too! The staff was also very friendly.

The food was great, and the view from the restaurant was even better. We really enjoyed our meal and our waiter was very personable and friendly. Rating 4 stars because I thought it was a bit expensive, yet I wouldn't hesitate to eat here again.

We came here for an evening meal for my birthday several nights ago whilst on holiday in dubrovnik and all I can say is wow. The food and views were outstanding and the service was impeccable. We would highly recommend this place to anyone. The food and drinks are on the pricier side but it's well worth it in my opinion. 

I would recommend booking a table in advance if you are wanting a table with a good view as it tends to get booked up very quickly - we booked up around 2-3 months in advance and there weren't a lot of times left. Again, I think this shows just how highly rated this place is. Would most definitely come again!

A stunning restaurant. We were lucky to be sitting right at the front with the views over Dubrovnik. The food was delicious and the service first class. This was our treat meal for our trip and whilst it was a little more pricey than some other restaurants, it was still good value for an unforgettable experience. This restaurant books up so make sure you reserve a table in advance. For me this was the highlight of my holiday.

We had a wonderful evening at the Panorama, the food was excellent and really good value, and Martin our waiter made all the difference, really helpful regarding menu choices and very kind. Stunning views and a stunning restaurant. Highly recommend. Thank you Martin for making the evening so special.

Restaurant with a beautiful view, great food and courteous staff .Prices in line with the qualità.Non we had reservation but the manager politely, considering that we were only two found us a very scenic corner.
Really good food and unbelievably beautiful setting.The service was probably the best I have ever received,our waiter Ivan was truly a fantastic guy,highly recommend

The best views of Dubrovnik and Old City!! We had to book months in advance for the front row table but it was well worth it. Martin our server was so kind and we had an amazing time. Highly recommend!

Very good food. We ate lasagne, it was incredibly good. Nice staff who took in well with us. We were lucky and got a table with views of the city, especially to have dinner in these beautiful surroundings

If you go here you HAVE to order the Apple pie!!!! I am not usually a big fan of apple pie but this was the best apple pie I have ever eaten. I will forever think about it until I return one day to order it again.
Great spot for a sunset dinner, Martin recommended one of the best desserts I’ve ever had - chocolate rogač. Drinks and food was delicious! Would come back again!
Great for sunset views and great food, very nice service and very friendly staff who made lots of effort to make it a nice experience

We had a wonderful wedding anniversary lunch at panorama, enhanced by the friendly, professional staff, delicious food and drink and of course the spectacular views. We took the gondola up, although adding to the cost it saved time. We had the octopus, chicken burger and an apple, fig salad - great portion sizes and all were super delish. Highly recommend!

Amazing views. We booked a second row lunch and they upgraded us to first row with a gorgeous view of the old town. We took the cable car up and down. Food is fine but you’re there for a view. It was my partners birthday and they surprised us with a cake and sparkler and card which was so wonderful. Fantastic service. Highly recommend. Must book in advance!

Petra was great with her recommendations and the night was awesome. Weather was
Perfect, food was fantastic. Great experience - would it again
I advise you to come for lunch amazing place and super nice staff but the evening rates are doubled so it is advisable to come at lunch

We had dinner at this beautiful restaurant. The food, service and view were spectacular. A point to note, they take a 'pre authorised payment' which can take some days to go back into your account (Not in 72 hrs later, does say it can take up to 7 days). Don't understand why they don't take it off the meal when you pay the bill, which is a pretty standard practice. Advise you use credit card to pay deposit to avoid this. Over all though a lovely experience in a beautiful spot.

Great view, staff very friendly and helpful, the food was very good also.
And need I say…it was air conditioned…a very important point today!

Fantastic experience from start to finish. The views over the old town and the Adriatic are unbelievable and so is the service and food. You’ll pay a little more but the quality is definitely worth it!

Panorama Restaurant, Dubrovnik – 5 Stars
An unforgettable experience! The staff at Panorama Restaurant are truly amazing, especially Martin - he was amazing, welcoming, attentive, and incredibly kind throughout the entire visit. The food was absolutely delicious, perfectly prepared, and beautifully presented. Combine that with the stunning views over Dubrovnik, and it’s easily one of the highlights of my trip. Highly recommended!
Good service and delicious food but rather expensive. I was invited to a new table with the great view as soon as it was available, that was very nice
We had a drink after our arrival at the summit with friends. Very good service with Martin!! And great views of Dubrovnik, the sea and the islands
Stunning views. Book well in advance for the front row! Very attentive service from Mirza. Once in a lifetime experience and well worth the premium price for the food and drink.

The place is beautiful and overlooks the old town of dubrovnik. As it was a little cool, blankets are available. The risotto was very hot and excellent. I advise you to book a table that looks directly at the viewpoint.
We were lucky, we have a table, without making a reservation and with stunning views.

We strolled in after a scenic ride up on the cable car—figured we’d shoot our shot and see if we could snag a table. “Any chance there's one with a view?” we asked, ever hopeful. And boom—they said they could squeeze us in for 45 minutes with a view! (Yes, we’re American. Yes, we can eat fast.)

We got that corner table—the one with the jaw-dropping, postcard-worthy view. Our server was a total gem: friendly, on it, and never hovering.

I ordered the premium burger and a lemonade, and wow. The burger came out perfectly rare, towering with toppings—bacon, a runny egg, the works. Totally hit the spot! I recommend!
Amazing service and location! Realt worth the visit! Food is also amazing☀️If you are going to visit Dubrovnik this is a must visit Restaurant with amazing service!

Phenomenal food with phenomenal views! Our server Martin was very attentive and knowledgeable on all dishes. Definitely worth a visit. But make sure to book way ahead of time as it get booked up months in advance.

We had a wonderful experience at Panorama Restaurant on Mount Srđ in Dubrovnik. Although we were seated in the second row, we still had a stunning view of the Old Town, which made the atmosphere truly magical.

A special thanks goes to Martin, who took exceptional care of us throughout our visit. His professionalism, friendliness, and genuine effort to make our evening memorable were outstanding. We especially appreciated his dedication to capturing the perfect photo for us — he even climbed over rocks to get the right angle!

The food was great, the service impeccable, and the location unbeatable. We will definitely be recommending this place to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.

Martin Jovev was such a helpful and friendly waiter and the food was fab, great views. Best views are to the rightfor the old town and sea, booking is advised. Although, the view to the left of the mountains is also beautiful, two different worlds.

Last minute decision to take the cable car to watch the sunset and the hostess was able to find a table for two. We were lucky to get a table but it’s better to make a reservation. I went for the view and was rewarded with a delicious meal. I had the chicken which was well prepared and my husband is still talking about his gnocchi. Great drinks and service too.

Beautiful views of the whole of Dubrovnik. Food for a good price, very tasty and good quality. We were served by Martin who was really friendly and provided us with amazing service. We would definitely return here!

Fantastic setting and views. Staff could not have been more friendly and helpful, food was delicious and drinks were very generous. All in all an unforgettable evening, thanks to the team for making it so special. Definitely recommend 😊

Went to Panorama for a birthday dinner for my husband. Had a fantastic meal and the view cannot be beat. The service was great, and although they told us when we booked that we would have to be out by a certain time for the second seating, we never felt rushed. I must do for a special dinner in Dubrovnik.
The view is definitely the best in Croatia. Great view, service, & food. Riding the cable car and having lunch here is a must!!!!

Thank you for the most amazing lunch experience. Incredible food, view, service. Thank you Maryin for such attentive service as our host. We had a beautiful lunch and will remember this for many years to come. Love from the fun Aussies.
Food was very good. Ambience and view of Dubrovnik below was excellent. And service from Martin Jovev was most excellent!! Top ratings!!
Amazing view, affordable meals, informative staff. I recommend coming by cable car as the traffic getting in is on very narrow 2-way roads
Amazing view, the drinks were great and our sever Martin was brilliant. I definitely recommend the piña colada. Overall great.

Amazing spot! Very kind and attentive staff, really delicious food, and of course a beautiful view. 
The Sea Bass fillet was particularly tasty
Really nice location for dinner with beautiful views. Our server Martin was attentive to our every need, and helped make it a wonderful experience.

Beautiful views of the old town 
Lovely food, cocktails and ambience 
With very friendly staff
Definitely worth a visit.
This spot is incredible! The views are breathtaking and the service/drinks out of this world. Thank you for your hospitality Martin.

Staff is very kind, foods are amazing… 
The place is very clean (all country is clean ), amazing panaroma… 
Staff Martin is TOP!
This is a place you must visit. The view is a unforgettable experience as well as the delicious food. The waiters are kind and welcoming😍🙌

I booked front row three months before our trip. Sat down and had amazing views.
Then a lady who was on her own was sat at the table next to us looking out. She moved her table and chair to the side then set up her camera to do her social media. She completely blocked my view of Old Town.
I asked her politely to move her table back and she refused saying she wanted the better angle.
The waiters did nothing about it as I think they wanted to avoid any hastle.
I wasn’t impressed. Had a starter then left.
My review is based on my personal experience, I’m sure that generally it’s amazing and the 10 minutes of view that I had was great.
The waiters weren’t very proactive.
Amazing views and delicious food and wine!! All topped off with fabulous service - especially our waiter Martin Galic! wonderful lunch!!
Amazing service by the 2 Martins. Food was absolutely fantastic too! Would 100% return. We are also booked into the other restaurant this week and we can’t wait!

Excellent. Nice restaurant with a beautiful view. Good food and drinks
Our best recomondstions. 
We will come again as soon as possible

I booked this restaurant 4 months in advance due to the reviews I had read. It did not disappoint. Both the food and service were outstanding and the views are breathtaking! It’s not cheap but we thought it was worth it and recommend it.

For my 1st night in Dubrovnik I went to the Panorama restaurant, I had to have a seat on the left and finally, they managed to put me aside sight, again thank you to you.

Hugo cocktail was excellent with a very nice portion, I started with octopus carpaccio which was excellent, the perfect assortment of flavors!!

For the dishes I took the gnocchi pepepe e caccio. The sauce was delicious, I don’t know if it was normally or just a cooking error but the gnocchi were “creamy” in it. I still finished my dish.

A typical dessert with caramel flan, delicious, I do not regret my coming.

The bill was a bit long coming, I had to ask myself for dessert but other than that it was perfect

Such a wonderful morning/afternoon. We got on the cable car at 915, had a lovely ride up then admired the views and went into the fortress museum which gave a great deal of information, maps, weaponry from the 1991 invasion. On the top of the fortress is a spectacular, unobstructed view of Dubrovnik. Then we went to our 1130 reservation at Panorama where we had a first row table staring straight down at old town, the benefit of making a reservation months in advance. The reservation also gives you 2 hours and 15 minutes at your table and we used all of them. 
The food is pricey but given the location was worth it. Also we dined at one of the sister restaurants the night before (Dubravka 1836) and got a coupon for 10% off our entire Panorama bill. A very lucky coincidence. We enjoyed the variety of our lunch from steak sandwiches to salads. They had gluten free buratta and gluten free octopus carpaccio appetizers. The shrimp risotto was gluten free as was the carob cake. All delicious. Martin was a great server and very helpful on the gluten free navigation. He also took great pics. We ended up getting back to town a bit after 2:00PM. Doesn’t get more memorable. Would absolutely do it again.

Outstanding location, great service, views spectacular, food excellent, we originally had a inside table but they upgraded us to the view over the city, such a fantastic view and food was lovely and other expensive either. Cannot fault in any way. Book early and highly recommend.

We saved the 27 € for the cable car and walked up Mount Srđ – let’s put it this way: our calves hate us, but our cocktail taste still thanks us to this day! 😄Srđ is the local mountain of Dubrovnik, by the way.

Once at the top, we were rewarded not only with a breathtaking view, but also with a really excellent cocktail. Yes, the prices are slightly higher – but honestly: Up here you pay for the whole package of service, quality and postcard view. And it's absolutely worth it.

The staff were friendly and in good spirits (perhaps they also secretly admired our sweaty glow after the climb). The atmosphere is relaxed, the panorama is fantastic – it couldn’t be better.

Down we went again on foot with a slightly tipsy grin.

Conclusion: Panorama for the heart, cocktail for the soul, muscle soreness for memory – we will be back!

Srdačan pozdrav timu!

It's a breathtaking view that should not be missed. Excellent service and delightful drinks. 

The food, however, is another story. It's extremely expensive (and I have no issue with paying high prices for exquisite food), and there is limited choice for vegans or veggies. Dishes are nicely presented but flavourless. They trade on the basis that you'll be so moved by the view that you would not think of sending a dish back!

I recommend drinks and appetisers but skip the mains.

This restaurant was the highlight of our holiday! The food was so good, I had the lasagna which tasted homemade and delicious, the portion was very generous. Husband had the cheeseburger and said it was nice too. The views from the restaurant were amazing, make sure you book in advance for a front row seat which has the best views of all. I was concerned about sitting outside due to the temperature being so hot at lunchtime, however, it was very comfortable due to the parasol and a gentle breeze given we were so high up.

I was drawn to book my visit here simply for the view. It is truly an incredible view and place for a meal. I did book months ahead and noted it said booked out online the day i went. However plenty of people managed to walk in and get tables so dont be turned off if you are heading up Mt Srd anyway pop in a d you will likely get a table ! 
The service was very friendly but I found i had to wait to try and get someone’s attention to order and for the bill. 
The food was perfect yes expensive but not much more than in the Old Town which is very expensive anyway. 
. I-had the Sea Bass and it was done perfectly followed by Apple cake and a lovely cocktail. 60 Euro or roughly $120 aud. 
In my opinion its more than worth it and i would recommend and do again.

If you are in Dubrovnik you have to take the cable car up to the Panorama Restaurant. Yes the cable car is on the steep side (no pun intended) but the views are totally worth it. 
The food at the restaurant was fantastic, my only minor quibble would be the temperature of the food, it could have been hotter, that aside all the staff were amazing and treated us well. A big shout out to Robert our chef. Good job Robert and thank you. The steak and sea bass was lovely.
We had a fantastic dinner at Panorama. The service from Robert was fabulous and the view was exceptional! A must do in Dubrovnik.
Panoramic view of Dubrovnik. A warm and professional welcome. The meal was perfect and delicious. Wonderful evening for a wedding anniversary

We came to celebrate my best friend birthday from United States. This is the first night Dubrovnik and everything is amazing 
Martin Jovev

What a great experience! Yes, it's not inexpensive but it's worth every dime. Yes, you will probably need a reservation - it's a tourist resort and this is a unique experience. It's very popular. Take the time to make the reservation - it is going to pay off. Staff was very nice. Views cannot be replicated in this area. Relaxed environment that will take your breath away. Food is above average. It's not a Michelon restaurant but it doesn't pretend to be.

A lunch we will never forget. From start to finish we could not stop smiling. I won't lie,every time we looked at the view, we both got teary.
Thank you Pero for looking after us, you made this day so much more memorable, a credit to the team.
Amazing food. Amazing staff and a view you will never ever forget.
This was a beautiful experience, the food was delicious, the service was amazing, the staff are really kind and thoughtful. The views are incredible. Definitely worth doing if you are visiting.
Food was definitely worth the price tasted excellent and the presentation was very nice. Service was also very friendly and attentive

Beautiful experience, climbed on the cable car at a cost of 25 euros each adult, children up to 4 years do not pay, then lunch in the beautiful indoor room of the restaurant, outside is more characteristic but there is a lot of wind and being with our son we opted for a place inside where fortunately we found a place without waiting long, I recommend booking since there is a lot of turnout and you risk waiting a lot to eat!
The place is wonderful with a crazy view of the whole area of Dubrovnik and nearby islands
Very nice location. The view is fascinating. The food is excellent. The service very friendly and accommodating.

We made reservations 2-3 months in advance, I picked the front row views but when we arrived we sat at the front of a deck; our view was looking down at other tables (and the city). Be as specific as possible when making reservations. While the view was great, even with others in the way; the food was just okay. The plates looked beautiful but for the price you can find better food within the city walls. Also, plan accordingly because the sun at sundown hits perfectly and there is almost no shade available for diners where we sat. A couple next to us left because the sun was in their eyes. Also, note it costs 30€ a person to take the cable car round trip to the restaurant.
Stopped off here on a tour. The views are spectacular. Tried to book for dinner but it was booked out for every night of our stay.

My husband and I booked a reservation at panorama six months ago when we started planning our vacation. To be completely honest we expected an incredible view and mediocre food and service. In our experience, this kind of restaurant is often a tourist trap and can leave you feeling underwhelmed. To the contrary, Panorama ended up being one of the most incredible dining experiences we've had, and we have dined at Michelin star restaurants in chicago, some of the top restaurants around Europe, and this dinner is one that stands out. From the cocktails while we waited for our table, to the warm blankets that were offered when the wind was blowing, to our waiter actually climbing over the divider to rescue my husband's sunglasses that had blown off. The attention to detail was second to none, the food was some of the best we've had. I cannot recommend the cacio e Pepe, the beef carpaccio, or the beefsteak enough, they were delectable. Thank you to our waiter Vedran for giving us a dining experience we will never forget.

If you are going up the mountain this is the only place to eat or drink so they have the monopoly but don’t take advantage of that as quality is good, albeit a little pricey. It is the most amazing setting and I’m glad I booked, demand was high. We went for lunch and the food was lovely. Really tasty, fresh - the gnocchi were delicious. Service was a bit hit and miss. Very friendly but patchy - slow and some things we ordered we had to chase. We didn’t mind too much though as we were very relaxed!

The food was decent just not amazing however the total experience was really great. The service was wonderful. Gave us blankets when it got chilly. The staff was fun and we felt like VIPs for sure. Views are wonderful just make sure to prebook well in advance.

We had made reservations two months prior and could only get mountain view table. However, when we arrived they said they had a table with city and Mediterranena views. It was fantastic: the food, the service and the views. Highly recommend. We took the cable car up and down. It was windy and a little chilly but they provide both blankets and patio heaters.
Most wonderful restaurant. A must do. Stunning views. The most incredible service I have ever experienced! The staff are outstanding
Beautiful restaurant with amazing views of Dubrovnik! The service was wonderful and friendly and the food was delicious.
Beautiful view excellent service. Very good food. Waitress was wonderful. Excellent day, great weather impeccable service.

I have been coming to Panorama for a few years now and once again our meal was exceptional. My request for a terrace seat was once again granted and the service was faultless. I have always had great food here but the meal this time topped the lot. I had the grilled beefsteak with gratinated potatoes, carrot cream, onion chips and port sauce. The steak was melt in the mouth and cooked perfectly. The cheesecake to follow was also excellent. Come for the views and stay for the food. We will see you next year!

This is a beautiful lunch spot with a beautiful view. We had the best time and our lovely waiter Stephen made the whole experience with his friendly, welcoming and professional spirit. We will definitely be back if ever in Croatia again. What a spot!

This was the greatest lunch we could ever ask for. The view was absolutely incredible from every table in the restaurant. It was so worth the 30 Euro to get up the hill! Stiven was our server, he was very helpful and friendly. He chose a great wine for me just as I described. The tuna salad was the best I’ve ever had! We would recommend to anyone traveling to Dubrovnik. 10/10
This restaurant was picturesque and our server Martin was so accommodating and friendly. We would definitely recommend.

We went up the cable car (around 1800), in the hope of getting a table without reservation. We were given a window seat in the inside area, with a/c. It was a great spot!
Food was excellent, service was outstanding. Martin had full knowledge of the detail of the food menu and even better knowledge of the wine selection. We loved the ‘Posh’ Croatian wine Martin suggested, after we declined a more expensive option. 
Martin seemed to be serving all the tables on his own, but he looked after everyone so well and with a smile and a good sense of humour. Well done Martin - it was a good night!

I booked weeks in advance for a birthday celebration on the front row. The weather was so atrocious we were in the clouds and outdoors and the cable car were closed but we went anyway. The staff are so welcoming and kind. We had a wonderful meal and they brought out a delicious chocolate orange dessert for my husband that said happy birthday. They even gave us a discount, despite the weather obviously being completely out of their control. The lovely waitress said if we came back the next day they could see what they could do. 

We returned the next day and sure enough, a table on the second row was found for us. Ivan our waiter was so kind and offered to take photos of us. We were given a voucher for 10% off on our first visit and used this no problems. The local sparking wine is delicious as was my spicy pasta dish. I couldn’t recommend this place more. In our 3 day visit we also had wonderful meals, drinks and service at Dubravka 1836 and Gradska Kavana, not realising they are all the same brand. 

Top tip - walk around the back of the cable car building past the museum to sit down and watch the sunset, then finish off with a drink at panorama.
Celebrated our first wedding anniversary at this place! Beautiful views and wonderful food (bread + cheese and olive platter were delicious). Martin was amazing and so helpful!
A MUST DO in Dubrovnik!! Amazing view, amazing food and amazing service!!! We could have stayed here all day enjoying the view and food!

The views are exceptional, that goes without saying. Ivan was a great host for our meal, he made great recommendations for the menu and the wine selections. Would highly recommend sitting on the terrace if you can get a reservation, the experience is so special and the meal was delicious.
Best views of Dubrovnic, and in a city where most things feel a bit pricy, this feels pricy but fair based on the location. Food was great and staff too!
Such a lovely evening helped by Martin our waiter making us the experience so special. Great food, amazing location. Perfect
Fabulous breathtaking view. Food was amazing but pricey. However best view around so understandable. Staff friendly and professional

Panorama Restaurant offers a wonderful view of Dubrovnik.
We really enjoyed sitting here.
The waiter Steven served us excellently!
Highly recommended!
Great venue with absolutely amazing views. Fantastic food and drink with excellent service by Steven. This is a must do if your visiting Dubrovnik!

Such a beautiful venue we had no intentions of having lunch but after seeing some of the meals come out to other tables we knew we had to try something. Food was delicious and we had a very welcoming waiter named Martin. He was fantastic.

Incredible place for lunch/dinner with a view. Staff are amazingly friendly and is truely one of the best places I’ve been. Highly recommend. Food is exceptional and shout out to Martin for his exceptional service!
Wonderful staff! Delicious desert! Beautiful view!! Great way to relax and enjoy stunning views of Dubrovnik!!!!!!!

A good dining experience with the most incredible views. It’s no wonder the restaurant is so busy as surely one of the most spectacular vistas for any restaurant in the world. The standard of the food and drinks were good and quite reasonably priced (we felt) considering the location. The service was good in general - a couple of the staff were less friendly than everyone else. Definitely a place to reserve a table by the edge nearest the Old Town, marvel at the views and enjoy your meal.

Amazing views and the steak sandwich was delicious. The lunch menu appealed more to us as we are not overly keen on seafood. There is a large bar and wide selection of drinks to enjoy. The Pina Colada and draught beer were so enjoyable we stayed for a couple more than we had planned. We were very well looked after by the staff members.

The view is a amazing even in night time! Recommend to come early to see the sunset before dinner. (We had at 9 pm). Staff and service great, but food was mediocre compared to their other 2 restaurants. Looks fancy, but you get better quality elsewhere. We ate risotto and gnocci as main and only thing you could taste was the cheese.
The food was incredible as was the service! Our waiter, Robert, went above and beyond to give us a table with a gorgeous view and made sure we had everything we needed. Would highly recommend.
Unforgettable views and a lovely dinner. Robert was excellent and made our experience even more enjoyable. Would absolutely recommend.
Amazing experience this place is beautiful, great service and we even got moved to a better table on the right side. Would highly recommend and good prices for the quality
Great spot with the best views of dubrovnik. Robert was a great waiter very accommodating, the food was all incredible with great fresh flavours.

Wonderful restaurant, perfect staff, incredible views and wonderful cocktails and food. Well worth the visit
Thank you very much for looking after us so well, we will be back one day!
Bottle of Posip white wine & charcuterie board was perfect for a relaxing afternoon stop. We did not have a reservation and was able to get a "second row seat", which was great.
Great spot to relax and take in the beauty of Dubrovnik. Excellent drinks and service, if a little pricy. The view makes it so worth the money.

Amazing experience having dinner in the sky. Book early on to reserve a front row seat. The view was the highlight of our trip and well worth the cable car up and down. Food was amazing and my partner can’t stop saying that it’s the best risotto he has ever had.

Beautiful restaurant amazing food and a fantastic view! Just brilliant night.
They made it extra special by bringing out desserts either happy birthdays for us and sparklers

This was an incredible restaurant in all aspects. The view was amazing, the food was delicious, and our charming server Robert did an incredible job. Would love to come back if we had more time, really enjoyed my experience here.

The views were spectacular but the restaurant itself is poor. We found the staff to be pretty uninterested and the food was extremely poor. We were only there for lunch, 3 of the 4 of us had the chicken burger and one of us had the steak sandwich. Finding the steak in the steak sandwich was difficult and I don't quite know how to describe the chicken burgers. It seemed to be a gray colour and maybe the odd fleck of white chicken. It definitely wasn't a breast of chicken as you might expect in a chicken burger. Sorry but I can't recommend it. The views were spectacular though (and you don't need to book into the restaurant to see them)

Great food! Cacio e pepe was among the best we had. 

Unfortunately very bad weather so everyone had to sit indoors which made it quite loud. But excellent service made up for that 🙌🏼 really recommended.
The service was fantastic, the server was very attentive, views amazing, Risotto was delicious. I really enjoyed myself

Petra wonderful waitress 
knowledgeable about the menu made some great recommendations 
Thank you for the blankets covering our legs and a wonderful view

What an amazing restaurant! I booked a table for my husband's birthday in May. From start to finish, the entire evening was first class. The lovely hostess moved us inside when it was a bit too windy and then graciously moved us to a window table with a jaw-dropping view. The food and the service were impeccable. This is a must-do while in Dubravnik, and I highly recommend it! You will not be disappointed.

I asked for a slight change to the item I ordered from the menu. The manager on duty came to speak to me today he felt it would not be worth the price with the item i removed. He said he would add extra of the other ingredients and when the dish arrived to say it was enhanced was an understatement. A beautiful sandwich which tasted amazing. Thank you so much for the wonderful experience
This was a great spot in order to enjoy the best view of Dubrovnik! Great wine and service!! The only issue was the strong wind.

Tourist catcher

We had booked on the terrace for several days, for a special occasion and also to enjoy the panorama. Upon arrival, we are informed that our table has been assigned to other people, and that it would be nice if we ate inside. Oh, right!? Disappointed, but let's go. Open the card and be amazed: 15€ for a coketail, meat at 40€... The note is salty: for a piece of chicken, a salad with products taken out of boxes and 2 beers: 70€ and all this served and paid in 30mn. So if you fancy a good relaxing evening, go elsewhere!

We booked this restaurant for our last night of our honeymoon having been recommended it by a friend back home. The views were amazing, especially at sunset. You get to watch the sun go down over Old Town and the islands and it’s absolutely breathtaking. 

The food is good, but we got stuck behind a number of large parties so the service was slow (our starters took 45 mins to arrive and then our mains followed 45 mins after that). However, our waitress did apologise and we were given a reduction in the bill. You need to book in high season, and it’s a bit of a pain getting a taxi there as the road can be tricky.

We stopped for a quick bite and ended up really enjoying our meal at the top of the cable car ride. You should really make reservations - but we didn’t and still secured a great table over looking Dubrovnik.
