Gnocchi Cacio de Pepe was fresh and homemade - we were pleasantly surprised due to the location. Decent red wine selection as well - but pours are small.

The Panorama Bar in Dubrovnik offers stunning views that make every sip unforgettable. Perched high above the city, the sights of the Old Town and the Adriatic Sea are mesmerizing, especially at sunset. The cocktails are expertly crafted, with local ingredients and flavors that elevate the experience. The service is friendly and attentive, adding a personal touch to the atmosphere. It’s the perfect spot for a relaxed drink before dinner. The only downside is it can get crowded, so timing is key. Overall, a must-visit for anyone in Dubrovnik looking for a drink with a view.

All beautiful and impeccable.
Quality food, friendly staff and fast service, all accompanied by stunning views.
I recommend it for any occasion

I have just returned from an amazing hen do in Dubrovnik and cant recommend the restaurant enough. The food was brilliant, the sunset views were incredible and the staff were simply amazing. Thank you to Evo who looked after us very well on the evening, we wish we could do it all over again!

Another must do if in Dubrovnik the best views of the old town and surroundings 
36€ for 2 small beer and 1 ham and cheese toastie 😳 but it’s a once in a lifetime experience
My husband and I just had a lovely dinner! The Panorama is "must do" if you are in Dubrovnik. The view was outstanding, and the food was great too!
We arrived without a reservation and were unexpectedly treated to a town/ocean view, the young lady that looked after us was lovely. Recommended this restaurant highly.

A great view and excellent food. We booked a couple of weeks before hand and there were only one time left in a front row table during our stay in Dubrovnik. If you want a sunset view I suspect you have to book much earlier. Wine was amazing (wine waiter was brilliant) and food perfect.

We booked spur of the moment the day before and we’re lucky to get a first table area for outside views. We were going to take the cable car up to the restaurant but as it happens the next day was windy so the cars were closed and we weren’t able to sit outside. However we did have a drink outside which was accommodating with blankets before going inside to be seated. The views from here were stunning and the cocktails were delicious. The food was ok , I had the chicken burger and my partner had the premium beef burger but both agreed that they were overpriced for what they were. Staff were ok but not overly friendly like other places.

Walked up as cable car not running due to high wind. They had to close the outside seating for food (so just drinks) but we got there early around 12 and they had a table inside luckily (we did not have a reservation) and they were happy to seat us. Good service, friendly staff. Had a ham and cheese toastie and Chicken Caesar salad - both good, no complaints. All round good service and food.

Amazingly stunning view, good service. You must book if you want to have food there. We only managed to book a table for 2 but staff was very accommodating and we got the table for 4 on a second row. Food is good but not cheap (same as drinks)

Ok - so the cable car ride and the views are as spectacular as you’d expect. We literally ended up dining in the clouds at one point!

The view of the old town of Dubrovnik is the absolute best you’re going to get - bar none!

The cocktails are well made, and delicious (the Bartender’s Choice is a superb way to brunch)

The food is delicious - we had a couple of salads and they were superb.

Special mention to the service here though - there was a small mix up with our order, and the waiter and manager could not have been more polite and helpful. We have dined at a number of Michelin starred restaurants across Europe, and the service here stands up against any of them.

If you’re in Dubrovnik - this place is a must visit. The views are a given, but the staff are on another level!

Hvala!!!

Wether you come for business, enjoyment, by accident or planned, restaurant Panorama Dubrovnik is always the best! Excellent food, wine, service, waiters with endless smiles and humor sense, this place just can’t leave you indifferent. 
We come often and every time we can’t wait to come again.
Don’t miss this place when in area!😊
Had lunch is the most amazing spot in Dubrovnik. The view, food, cocktails & staff are amazing. We will definitely be back.

Found this place recommended a lot on tiktok and booked a few weeks in advance as reccomended for a prime front row seat / table outside. The catch which I think could sway people either way is the cost of the cable cart (€27 euro return) to access the restaurant but honestly completely worth it. It has started to rain as we were waiting for the cable car so we were worried our outside table and view would be for nothing, but thankfully the rain stopped quickly. We'd booked for 3.30pm but because of the rain there was a bit of a wait as the restaurant can't cater to as many inside as it does outside, the waiter and manager was very nice and helpful, offered us a drink while we wait and a seat whilst they prepare our outside table which had to be dried and cleaned due to the rain. We didn't wait long and the ambiance inside the restaurant is lovely with equally amazing views as it does outside, small inside but a window seat would be ideal if you don't fancy booking outside. It wasn't long before our table was ready and the sun was shining again, we ordered the steak sandwich with fries which the waiter reccomended, it was delicious food was lovely and very reasonable, the staff are lovely,attentivitve and inviting. No concerns or issues at all, you can walk around outside the restaraunt too and take in the views for as long as u like before heading back down, you can also buy a single for the cable car if you wish to walk back down. My advice would be to book a table for panorama in advance as there was a big queue for walk ins on this particular occasion.

Booked months in advance but we were unable to sit outside due to it being cloudy and at one point it rained for about 5 minutes, so we were really disappointed about this and the hostess couldnt have cared less, her attitude was appalling, however the day was saved by Ivo, our waiter, who sat us at the front and gave us first class service. Food was good, drinks were better and the view was spectacular. Highly recommend!

Great food, service and views! The wines not bad either! 

Marco put the extra effort to make the lunch extra special and take in the great views across the old town.
5 stars fabulous food, view and service. Cheese, prosciutto, and olive platter outstanding along with great red wine.

Amazing views and beautiful food for lunch. We were waited on by Marco who was very attentive and had a great sense of humour. 
Altogether worth the visit.

Get a taxi up and go down via the cable car!

A great location with a breathtaking view of the city. I had the impression you can enjoy the view in front of any table relatively well but that is a matter of taste. For front row seats, it is best to reserve as early as possible! The food was good and delicious however we were there very early for lunch and had some of the small lunch menu and the choice was not so great. In terms of taste, everything was perfectly fine. The service was very accommodating and nice. Tip: if you have visited other restaurants in the chain, you get a 10% discount ;).
BTW a taxi to the mountain is cheaper than the cable car and you don't have to queue forever.

Stunning views but service left a lot to be desired. 
Although we arrived in the hope of having a drink and got a table without a reservation (thank you), the wine was chilled and delicious however the table service from the waiting staff was inattentive at best.

We visited Panaroma for brunch in April. The views are absolutely breathtaking. The restaurant is cleverly laid out so everyone has a good view. The food was very nice and the service (Petra was our server) was excellent. She was polite, efficient and spoke excellent English. Due to the amount of steps, it would be difficult to get a pram or wheelchair there although they may offer accessible seating. A definite ‘must visit’ place if you are visiting Dubrovnik.
Beautiful views with all fresco dinning, lovely food and very friendly service. Considering its a premium spot the food was still reasonably priced

Amazing views of Dubrovnik and the surrounding islands along with delicious food whilst watching a stunning sunset. I highly recommend the orzo risotto! We were very well looked after by Marco and had a wonderful evening, it was the perfect end to our holiday.
Incredible venue, beautiful views. Excellent service - ask for Marco. Food presentation was exceptional. Cocktail menu was creative.
The view was amazing and the food was excellent! Our server, Marco, was very personable and professional. Thank you for everything, Marco!!!

This place is a must if visiting Dubrovnik. Not only do you get stunning views from the highest point along the coast, you also get to enjoy a lovely drink/food in a truly beautiful setting. Marco was a great host.
The views were absolutely stunning, amazing service from Marco! I would definitely recommend a cocktail at sunset. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Beautiful location with super friendly staff and tasty food. We stopped for drinks and a light snack. Marco especially really looked after us :)

My husband and I have recently dined at the panorama restaurant, we couldn’t have picked a better day the weather was glorious. We booked our table in advance and in my opinion it was the best in the restaurant, on the edge looking out over old town Dubrovnik
I had the chef special, which was king prawns served in a big pot with the most amazing soup, I even had a bib put on, my husband had the premium burger which he said was delicious 
Views to die for and truly amazing views

Had a front row table, which has amazing views of the old town, the islands and the coastline. Worth booking well in advance. We booked for 18:30, so got a great view of the sunset, whilst being able to have a leisurely dinner and comfortably finish before the 9pm final cable car down. Staff were good and the food was remarkably good, considering where it is. It’s not cheap, but it’s well worth it if you have a sunny/clear day!
Excellent venue and view, wonderful service. Special shout out to Petra who made us feel at home and welcome. Lots of variety, our drinks were great and the experience was unforgettable!
Was a lovely meal tonight, visited from england! Petra our waitress was wonderful and so friendly to speak with tonight l would recommend xxx

The spot is amazing for everything. The view, the atmosphere, the welcoming vibes of the team of waiters, truly amazing people.

I honestly think the price of the drinks is very acceptable for the level of service and this spectacular view.

We booked well in advance to avoid finding full being a very renowned place for the location and the view that you can admire. Very good food, both fish and meat, relatively high prices but probably fair for the place where it is, except for the bottle of water at 7 euros, as if we were in front of the Colosseum.
We visited Panorama Restaurant for our 22nd Wedding Anniversary. The food was exquisite. Highly recommend coming here.
5 out of 5. Food, view and service can’t be better. Amazing and a must see for Dubrovnik. Would highly recommend for any trip to the city. We will be back!

Great service, great food, great views. 
So relaxing. 
Just bring a jumper (they do give you a blanket though).
Access through cable car or uber.

Just stunning! 10/10.

Mario made the day. He was so amazing! Put the umbrella up for us and even brought the drinks within seconds. Kept asking if we were ok. I just loved this experience. Get that cable car and get up there. Not even expensive! Xxx

Diamond above Dubrovnik. What a gorgeous last night we had at Panorama . Delicious food and excellent service . The views are just spectacular and a fitting end to a magical time in this gorgeous city ❤️❤️
Great view and amazing service. Highly recommended! Great food and cocktails too, second time back and can’t wait for the next
It is a beautiful Place and the Restaurant is very nice. We can Highlight recommend it. Service was also very good. The view is stunning.

Had a really lovely evening here. We chanced a table even though it had not been possible to book inline (booked out). Luckily we were seated straight away and enjoyed great food with the amazing views across Dubrovnik and beyond. Our table server (Petra ?) was excellent. She served every table in a friendly, helpful, efficient and never intrusive way. 5 star service!

Absolutely stunning scenery. All the tables are set on little terraces overlooking the sea. 
The waiter and staff were so polite and attentive
Amazing experience. Food was delicious. Views were to die for. Cocktails very nice. Staff so helpful and very attentive. Would definitely recommend and would definitely come back.
This is an amazing place!! I would highly recommend eating in the Panorama restaurant as the food and service was excellent. The views are outstanding and it feels like you are on top of the world.
Beautiful day, cable car is a must do, didn't think we'd get in the restaurant, we did with a window seat, amazing service and views stunning.

Lovely spot for a drink, excellent service. Highly recommended. 
Didn't eat, but the food looked excellent. The views from the restaurant are to die for.
Absolutely breathtaking views and extremely welcoming staff. It is one of the most beautiful places I have ever eaten and the food was quite nice too. Delighted with the whole experience
Outstanding service, great range of delicious food and some wonderful cocktails all with a breathtaking view overlooking Dubrovnik old town.
Great experience. Food was outstanding and Marco provided great service! If you are in Dubrovnik, make it a point to have lunch here.
Food and view were amazing. But Marco made the difference in his professional yet friendly service. Thanks for a great experience!
Amazing food, amazing service, amazing views. Would definitely recommend taking the cable car from the Old Town and visit this gem.

A brilliant place to have food, couldn't have been any kinder to our little boy and catered so well for food. The food was amazing and we enjoyed it so much we will deffo come back! 
Petra our waitress was fantastic ☺️

Beautiful view, staff were very welcoming and friendly. Food and drinks came quick. Make sure to book a reservation. Would definitely come again. It is windy up on the mountain but they do provide blankets and heat lamps

Be sure you find an uber to take you to the top! Incredible views on the way up and at the top. Food was delicious and loved dining outside next to the edge. Blankets are provided when it gets chilly. Took the cable car down at the end of the night.
Failed to honor reservations. Got sat on the side of the restaurant with little to no view. Reservation was for 2nd row. Had high expectations.

Excellent food and service
We initially had a second row table but were offered a table by the window by our charming and efficient waiter. Food that was recommended was excellent and the service friendly and professional. Would recommend.
The view and service are next level! Worth it alone just for those too aspects- Lovely food a bonus :) Petra our waitress was amazing!
We came up the cable car for a look at the view and a piece of cake. The service at the restaurant was friendly and the cake was excellent. The view is incredible!

So pleased I booked my husband's birthday meal here months ago, even if the weather prevented us from sitting outside. 
The staff were friendly and very professional, the food excellent.
We shared a tasty cheese platter, Mike then had the pork (excellent) and I had the fish dish (also very good). We shared an extremely tasty cheesecake, though all the desserts looked lovely. 
The ambience in this out of town restaurant is delightful, and the views over Dubrovnik are superb, even in rainy weather. Sadly the cable car was shut due to high winds, so we took a taxi there instead which wasn't a big deal.
I'd definitely recommend Panorama for a special occasion...

Great views! 
It was quite windy when we were there for coffee and cakes, but the friendly staff were there with blankets if we needed them.

Normally you would think of a tourist spot, on the second hand, due to the cable car, at the end. No I have visited many other places in Dubrovnik and I consider Panorama among the best. Great eat well prepared excellent service (a thousand thanks to Mr. Sinisa .. a gentleman) and very reasonable prices. I really recommend the experience!!
Great spot, nice views, food was amazing, staff were very friendly would definitely recommend, for dinner and drinks.
Loved the place. Vedran was our server. He was amazing. Fantastic service and extremely warm. Food and view is the best in Dubrovnik. Definitely recommended.

Amazing view, amazing drinks, amazing risotto.
We got the cable car up, but taxi or a hike up is an option too!
Service by Marco was perfect.

The most amazing view and excellent service. We were served by Marco and he was so helpful, friendly and funny.

We will definitely come again.
Lovely views with incredible food. Food was quick and great quality, menu has a great variety. Staff were incredibly helpful and friendly. Would love to come back.
Perfect location and excellent service. We were offered blankets and a heater until the sun came out. Couldn’t fault our experience.

The restaurant was perfectly situated to appreciate the breathtaking views of Dubrovnik and the sunset. Beautiful views and a very attentive waiter who was informative and friendly. A wonderful experience that I would recommend.
Food was great, view was amazing, highly recommend doing this when in Dubrovnik! Service excellent! Gorgeous setting. I ordered an old fashioned ( not on menu ) but they happily obliged.

We booked the front row of this restaurant for lunch but were very early. Delighted when they were able to accommodate us with a table with the most amazing views over the Old Town and the Adriatic Sea. 
Really enjoyed our food and service was fab. 
It was quite a changeable day weather wise - sunny then windy then chilly then rain so we took advantage of the wraps and heaters and the umbrella was put up quickly when we needed the shelter. 
As the sun did come out we were allowed to stay at the table past our allocated time and experiences the most incredible sunset which made our visit extra special. 
The staff were so friendly too. 
Would most definitely recommend a visit.

Views from the pictures really are what you get, fantastic. Sat outside on an incredibly windy day but it was worth it for the views. Staff very good especially in worse conditions and food was excellent.

The service was excellent, and the view was absolutely stunning.
The price is affordable
 We’re definitely coming back!
Marco is the best!!!!! Ask for his section. The views are amazing. All the food was paired well with a great wine selection.

The best view from a restaurant we ever had the pleasure of visiting. Very reasonably priced for the amazing location. The menu is not confusing and the food we had was all made from scratch. The service is impeccable here and our server called Marco was so professional but very personable at the same time. I would 110% recommend Panorama as a must visit if you are in Croatia.
Delicious meal, amazing wine, and spectacular dessert. This all accompanied by an unbeatable view made this a highlight of our trip. Would absolutely recommend to anyone visiting.
Delicious spot for lunch with beautiful views of Dubrovnik and the old town - would highly recommend! Great service and atmosphere.

The restaurant location is excellent (at the top of a cable car overlooking the whole of Dubrovnik). The staff were friendly and efficient and the food was excellent. The only negative point for me was the lack of vegetarian options (no main course), so we had to make do with starters and sides instead.

The most breathtaking view of my life!!! I was so happy to experience this with my sister and the staff made sure we had an amazing experience! Ivo and the whole team were fantastic!! The sweetest! The music complimented the view perfectly! And of course the food was DELICIOUS!!! Amazing gluten free and vegetarian options!! Our only regret was that it was too early to call our family and friends to share this experience with them (time difference)

Wow! Stellar views are unsurpassed! Every seat on the terrace has a view -either the sea or the mountains. Varied drink menu, nice food selection and views, views, views! Highly recommend the tuna salad. Simple but full of yummy veggies!
Not inexpensive but can’t beat the location.

Stunning view, excellent food and even better service.

Fantastic choice on the menu and all dishes were cooked to perfection.
Fabulous food, views and service. Great place to be on a slightly cool windy day. Services were really helpful. No need for a quick visit here!

Superb view
Very friendly and smiling service
Correct price for place and drinks well served
Easy parking
Feel free to

We had lunch at Panorama restaurant today and didn't regret it. Following a change of plans ( not or fault), we turned up without a booking for lunch, and were taken straight away to a table with a brilliant view. The restaurant wasn't rammed like it would be at summer time. 
We got an Uber up the mountain for about 10 euros each way.
The food was good. I had orrechiete and my husband had a chicken burger. We had a beer, two glasses of wine and a large bottle of water. We also got fries and a basket of bread. The bill was under 75 euros. I don't think this is at all bad for such an amazing view. The staff were excellent. Our server moved us to the front row when a table became available, for an even better view. 
If you're wondering whether it's worth it, just do it. You won't regret it.

We visited while staying in Dubrovnik as a family of 4. We were very lucky as the cable car opened the day after we arrived from the winter season. The cable car takes a couple of minutes to take you to the top where there are stunning views of The Old Town and the ocean. It was still fairly out of season so was quiet and the outside area wasn’t quite open as not warm enough. There’s a museum at the top which is good to look around. The restaurant was lovely, really worth the trip and I didn’t find it too expensive considering the location. Food was amazing and coffee was great too. Would have happily gone back again. Staff were attentive and friendly. 5* would recommend.
Absolutely loved my experience! The ambiance was stunning, and the staff were super friendly. Every dish was a delight, bursting with flavor. Can’t wait to come back for more! Highly recommend!

We booked front row reservations for lunch months in advance. Dinner was already booked for the days we were there, but honestly I am so glad we did lunch, so we could enjoy the breathtaking views during the day. We checked in as soon as we arrived and had a very short wait. Just enough time to enjoy a pre lunch drink with the views. As promised with our booking, we were seated at one of the front row tables with nothing obstructing our view. They clearly let you know you have a 90 minute time window to enjoy your table, but service was efficient and we never felt rushed.

There was a line for people waiting to be seated without a reservation which seemed to be moving fairly quick again because of the table time limit, they just were not seated in front row tables.

Yes the meal was pricey for lunch and then add in the cost of the cable car, but it was a wonderful few hours and a great experience. We shared a nice bottle of wine, the burrata (which was excellent) and two fish dishes. All in all, it was a very enjoyable afternoon!

Panorama Restaurant & Bar in Dubrovnik is a must-visit! The views overlooking the city and coastline are absolutely breathtaking—perfect for photos. The food was fresh and flavorful, and the service was great too. A bit pricey, but worth it for the incredible experience.

We had prebooked for an outside table several weeks ago. We were so pleased that we had as the restaurant was very busy. Our table was great with the most amazing views of Dubrovnik way down below.

I had thought that the experience would be more about the views than the food but I was wrong. The food was delicious. The service was excellent too.

We had drinks and a main meal each - a Violetta salad and a lasagne. We were both very pleased with our choices. We had an allocated time slot for the table (90 mins?) but we didn’t feel rushed at all. The waiters were friendly, efficient and good fun. They were quite happy to chat with guests, take photos etc 

The restaurant is located at the top of Mt Srd. You can walk up, use the cable car or Uber up as we did.

Very highly recommended. Worth going out of your way for.

A surreal experience dining in this breathtaking restaurant with stunning views over Dubrovnik. Staff are attentive, food is good and the location is beautiful. A very special night. We were lucky enough to be here in the afternoon, watch the sunset and experience the ambient glow of nighttime.
What a fantastic location! The view was spectacular and we were lucky that our booking also allowed us to watch the sunset. Great food and wine and friendly and helpful staff.
Lovely views, lovely food and friendly staff. Reasonable price given the views and location in comparison to old town and other restaurants.
Great view. Food was good. Service was good. It felt a little too crowded and impersonal and rushed but it was worth it for the spectacular view

Dining at Panorama Restaurant was an unforgettable experience…..The views of Dubrovnik’s Old City from above were simply breathtaking….like something from of a postcard….with extra sparkle ✨…The cable car ride to the restaurant added to the magic, offering a unique perspective of the stunning landscape….combined with its historical positioning…just adds to the ambience….and the food was just divine! 🤌🏻

The service we received was second to none. Every detail was thoughtfully taken care of, making us feel like we were on top of the world…both literally and figuratively. If you’re looking for a dining experience that combines incredible scenery and food with impeccable service….Panorama is a must visit….

Absolutely breathtaking views, such an amazing experience and enjoyable meal. Service was great, and so was the food. Make sure you reserve early! It is a well deserved reward after hiking to the top.
The view is exceptional but the food and service lives up to it. Book ahead to get an old town view and time it for sunset. Magical.
Absolutely fabulous. Had a gluten free meal that was outstanding. Excellent wait staff- thank you Vedran. Highly recommend.

Probably the restaurant with the best views of Dubrovnik.
The restaurant is situated near the War Museum on top of a mountain. It offers outstanding views of the city.
The service was great.
I had the octopus salad with bread ( the bread is extra) and it was very good and tasty, but over priced. But you are paying for the view.
Overall I was happy.

Everything was excellent, the staff was so friendly, the service was the best in Dubrovnik, we tried cheesecake and American macchiato and both of them were perfect 10/10. Prices are affordable, a little expensive, but trust me, you must visit this place if you visit Dubrovnik. You must see the sunset from these windows.
What an amazing combination oh history and great service. Petra is a treat and a professional. What a great way to end our trip!

Fantastic experience. We booked in June for October and managed to get a front row table. The service was top notch, Marco looked after us really well and recommended some delicious Croatian wine.

The food was delicious, but the setting is 100% worth it.

Would recommend for a special meal in Dubrovnik.
wonderful views and sunset, would highly recommend, the best cocktails, great food, Marco super friendly excellent server
Fantastic food, recommend the apple pie, great location, wonderful service from Marco. Brilliant to watch the sunset.

The restaurant is reached by cable car, with magnificent views. On one side you can look out over the mountains and the other you can see Dubrovnik old town. 

The food was excellent with an extensive menu of option’s, tasted delicious and was beautifully presented. 

Our waiter Marco was very welcoming, friendly and attentive.

We did not book a table but were lucky enough to get one. It gets very busy, so it might be best book so you don’t miss out. 

Also a great place to watch the sunset over a nice cocktail.
The views were spectacular, the food was amazing and our server Marco was fantastic. This is a must if you are in Dubrovnik. Book well in advance to get the best table!

This restaurant is a bit of a long drive up hill but when you get here The views are amazing and worth the effort . The service and food were excellent. The servers were attentive and pleasant. I will definitely be back.

I had booked a table here months in advance for a time best to enjoy the sunset over the Old Town. Unfortunately, on that day we had a full on thunderstorm and had to get an uber up and down to the restaurant, as the cablecar was closed due to the storm.

Obviously disappointed that we could not sit outside as hoped, but thankfully, we were provided with a perfect window table inside. Even though the view was mostly blocked out by the cloud cover, but we did manage to get glimpses of the Old Town below during breaks in the cloud. The thunder and lightning storm outside provided us with additional entertainment.

The service we had was all wonderful and the food served was all nicely presented, tasty and delicious. 

The ambiance inside was lovely and we both thoroughly enjoyed our meal despite the stormy weather.

This restaurant is a little gem the heart of Dubrovnik - it is warm and welcoming. the staff are excellent, the food choices broad and everything served was very tasty, well presented and value for money. Not to be missed - highly recommended - well worth a visit! Would recommend to family and friends!

We took the cable up to see sunset and checked to see if we could get a table while there at the Panorama restaurant. Luckily, we were seated right away.

At first, we had a view that was beautiful, but one table back from the ledge. As soon as a better table opened up, the server had it cleaned and moved us. We didn't even request the new table. It was the sweetest thing.

I couldn't believe how good our food and the service was in Dubrovnik. Almost everywhere we went was an example of what dining out should be with Arsenal and Panorama being the best.

Our server, Dragana, at Panorama was so kind and knowledgeable. I really appreciate all she did to make our evening special. My only complaint is that I don't live close enough to dine here more often.

Good food at a good price and Great views, waiter /Waitress were very helpful in taking photos for you well with doing.
Emailed them to make the booking got back straight away and were really helpful

Reserve a view top table. Gets windy. They do provide blankets but trousers and a jacket advisable attire, as gets breezy. The sunset is amazing. Food and wine delicious but the view and sunset, makes the evening.

I have seen a few reviews saying that the food here is nothing special, but our whole experience from food, views, to service was absolutely amazing.

I spent €40+ euros on my main (the beef with truffle) which is one of the more expensive options, but it was one of the best meals I’ve had. Definitely worth it.

It was my partners 30th so they upgraded us to a front row table with the most amazing view, and surprised us with a cake for him which was such a nice touch. Watching the view while the sun set was lovely, and they had heaters for when the sun went down. 

We followed it up with the cable car down which was worth the price for us. A really special experience that is now a favourite memory for us.
Stunning location, with the best views. The service is great without being over powering. And the food was some of the best we ate in Dubrovnik.

I had booked a front row table to visit for my partners birthday. Upon arrival my partner was wished a Happy Birthday and we were then informed due to bad weather the outside area was closed and we would have to sit indoors - and that we should of been sent an email to inform us (which we were never sent). I asked if there was any way to still get a good view from the inside as that was the whole point of choosing this place to dine on his birthday - we were seated in the middle of the room and them moved to a window where all I could look at was the outside seating area we should of been enjoying and tourists walking around taking photos. We have no view of the old town, and the umbrellas and trees and a wall blocked the left. A few minutes after being seated here two tables woth way better view opened up but we were not moved. Our waiter barely spoke to us, and we were really disappointed, the steak sandwich was nice but due to the atmosphere and disappointment we ate our food paid our bill and left as quickly as possible to not waste our day - I was particularly upset about this day as I had this planned for over a month and was looking forward to surprising my partner - I felt defeated afterwards, had I of been informed beforehand I would of chose to visit the top for a look and then go and treat him to food somewhere else.

Actually, the food was very good and the view was unbeatable, but unfortunately I still couldn't score it out of 100 because the day we went to eat, it was so windy! The clerk was kind enough to bring the blanket, yet it was still cold and couldn't arrange for an indoor location. If you pick a windy day to go it's perfectly fine!

Visited during a storm! 
Accommodated in the restaurant as opposed to the terrace. 
EXCEPTIONAL food with brilliant service - def worth a visit. Get an Uber here or a cable car if you’re feeling a bit extra 😉

Where to start?
What a wonderful end to a super holiday.
The ambience at The Panorama Restaurant was warm, friendly and yet sophisticated.
The menu choices cater to us all, even the fussy one😉. 
And from the starter to the desert the food was beautifully presented and absolutely delicious.
The staff were really 
great - friendly, professional and very knowledgeable AND great fun.
Then the view, absolutely stunning and we were lucky to witness sunset that won’t be forgotten.
Five stars all the way.

Well if you want the perfect view in Dubrovnik, this is definitely the place for you. The setting itself would be worth a 5 star rating as it sits on top of the mountain overlooking the stunning city and the view is breathtaking taking.

The food was as good excellent as the view. We had the lamb chops, forest risotto, a pasta dish and the pork chop. Everyone enjoyed their meals very much. 

The service was fantastic as well - attentive, helpful and cheerful.

Loved this meal.

Amazing Restaurant, views and service . Could not rate it enough. Thank you Petra and team for your service and food recommendations. 

A fantastic place to dine and the views are awesome
We drove up the mountain - an adventure for sure- hoping for a spectacular sunset. We got that and a really lovely dinner. Food was excellent and service was top notch. Such a special evening.

Highly recommend this gem! There were 5 of us and we came for coffee and dessert. Every single thing we tried was prepared with such love and care, it was perfect! We live in Dubrovnik and can confirm this was one of the best coffee and definitely amongst the best desserts we had in Dubrovnik. The quality of food is remarkable, the view is unbelievable and the staff is excellent, it was a delight to visit.
Would highly reccomend!
Beautiful view of Dubrovnik. The service was very good, we had not made a reservation and had to go a bit wa until there was room, but that went very smoothly. You have to pedal a lot
This spot has incredible views, delicious food, and amazing service would highly recommend. The vibes are incredible here !
We had the most amazing experience ! The service , the view and the food was phenomenal!! Would love to come back again one day !!

Only sad thing is they don’t do breakfast.
As my tip is to get the cable car as it opens to avoid the crowds then you can get a front row seat.
It’s beautiful just to sit and watch

Amazing service, amazing food and dealt with our giggles. The food was beautifully presented and tasted just as great. Our waitress was so attentive and wonderful.

The views were unbelievable.
Thoroughly enjoyed our Panorama dinner. Great food and a gorgeous sunset, what’s not to like. Do come, it’s a memorable evening out!

This was the most magical night! I didn’t have a reservation, but I wanted to dine at this beautiful location after catching sunset. The staff was incredibly friendly and were able to seat me fairly quickly. The food was delicious! Most of all, Vedran took care of me that night and he kept me entertained helped me pair the food and wine perfectly. I couldn’t have asked for a better evening!

We had our holiday cancelled a few times due to Covid so when we rebooked, I booked Panorama at the same time as our holiday. You definitely need to book early and we had the most amazing table on the front row. 
We booked for 6.30pm to see the sunset and this was just gorgeous. Food was lovely, especially the prawn and courgette risotto but be warned , the portion sizes are huge. Staff were very pleasant and happy to take photos. 
It wasn’t a cheap meal but we weren’t expecting it to be and the experience made it worth while. 
It’s probably a one off experience but so glad we did it.

Wow, what a view. Not the cheapest venue, but you pay for quality, service, and 'that view'. With the sun shining, there is no better place to have a drink, eat some food, and relax. Cable car from just a short walk from Old Town, definitely worth the visit..!!

Great food and service by Panorama and our server Ivo! Amazing food, view and service! Keep the 10% coupon if you go to other restaurants in this group during your Dubrovnik stay- we didn’t and should have!! Also love the coffee shop by the water.

Be sure to make a reservation weeks in advance. We could not get a reservation; however, when we visited Mount Srd, we did manage to get a nice table for lunch. The food is excellent. The service is excellent. The staff are very friendly. The prices are high; however. The views and atmosphere are spectacular.

We had an amazing meal at panorama. We managed to reserve a front row table for 6pm so we were able to see the sunset. Strawberry daquiris were excellent and the best I had in Dubrovnik. We had the squid and the lamb ragu, both delicious. The view is amazing and well worth a visit.

Interesting cocktail menu. Local food was fresh and tasty. Dinner at 7pm. Caught a little view before it went pitch black. Windy and cold. Blankets and overhead heaters readily available. Check off the list. Been there/Done that. Re-visit? No.

Book early and get ready to be in awe. The view and the setting for Panorama is just fantastic. I corresponded with Anita several times and she was super responsive and best of all, hooked us up with a front row table as we were celebrating 2 birthdays - It was a great surprise and totally made our day in Dubrovnik!

I booked as a special evening for our best friends birthdays. They were overwhelmed with the whole experience. Food is amazing and our waitress Petra was so accommodating making the experience so memorable.
Our waitress was so nice and accommodating. The views are spectacular. Had the best time ever I suggest everybody does this.

you are going here for the view. We were unable to book for sunset, so we booked for lunch. It was a lovely day and the views are picture perfect. The food is consider more “fast food” but this is not fair….we had a chicken burger and it was very good. 

The views are worth the price of admission. 

Remember to book well in advance….if you want sunset, then at least three months ahead.

Fantastic location; views are spectacular and food was very good - highly recommend adding this to your "to do" list if you are visiting Dubrovnik. We took an Uber up to the Restaurant - very windy and narrow road, so glad I wasn't driving and there is a car park at the restaurant (there were 8 of us in total), but some of us took the Cable Car back down to Dubrovnik. 

You will likely need to book in advance if you wish a "sunset" slot, we sat down at 3.45pm as that guaranteed us a table on the terrace directly overlooking the view - some tables are further back, however there is a lovely area next to the restaurant where you can enjoy the views before/after the meal too.

Great all round experience. Had booked a table but we were informed that it wouldn't be one with a view. However, management went out of their way on the day and we got a table in the shade with a view. Food was lovely, drinks great and service good, what's not to like 😊

This is an experience not to be missed. Although a bit pricey, the views and the food are definitely worth it. We loved the burrata and focaccia bread. We had the pork and cauliflower steak for dinner and we were extremely pleased with both.

Toppy here with a nice view and very ugly waiters
petra was nice
and aad too
Pigeon was married to me for 25 years
odette had to pay

This is also a must do when visiting Dubrovnik. The setting is serving to none. We took some friends up who have never been to Croatia before and they were speechless - they had never eaten at such a setting. There are no better views of Dubrovnik. You can walk up or drive up, though catching cable car is easiest (see separate review). Prices whilst high are acceptable given the quality of the food and more so the views.
Amazing view and food! Service was excellent - I highly recommend! It was the perfect end to our trip in Dubrovnik!!!!!!

Really didn’t expect much from this restaurant on the top shelf f the crowded cable car lift. Usually the quality of food is inversely proportional to the altitude at which it’s served (best example is airline food) but we had very good food here.

The steak sandwich with fries was excellent, as was the cheeseburger. Good drinks too, with attentive service. Not easy for how busy this restaurant was.

So if you’re going to take the expensive cable car ride up (really not worth it), definitely stop here for a good bite to eat.

Great location for drinks and/or food with amazing views.
They offer bookings and some walk ins.
I had a really great aperol spritz.
The light lunches are a really good option on the menu.
Good service
Beautiful view, and the staff were amazing, knowledgeable and very personable. The service was impeccable and the food delicious.
Excellent food and breathtaking views 🫶🏻 one of the top restaurants to visit when you’re in Dubrovnik. Highly recommend.
One of the best meals I ever had! Every single dish was delicious and beautifully presented, beautiful scenery and amazing service by Goran. A must go!
We loved our dinner at the Panorama! They found us a great table with the view! Great service from Goran, good recommendations for cocktails! Thank you for the great evening!

Restaurant was very nice, but beware!! The road leading to it is treacherous, and apparently hire cars are not allowed to drive up there, if you have an accident the insurance won’t pay out, if there are signs telling you this we did not see them ! The cable car is 30 euros so getting there is a nightmare
The food is excellent and staff are very accommodating, but you pay for the experience, and check the temperature at the time of our meal it was 35 and the shade was not on all of the seats. All in all I think there are better places to eat for the cost.
Spectacular views and nice cooling breeze on a hot day. Matejo was very friendly and helpful and we really enjoyed the lamb ragu.

Fabulous lunch at Panorama, booked online via Instagram, and on arrival received a warm welcome and advised as we had pre booked had one of the front tables with a spectacular view over the old town, and surrounding islands. It really was the most beautiful view. Our lunch arrived promptly - the salmon fillet and tofu and salad bowl were both presented well, and tasted fabulous. One of the best meals of our trip to Dubrovnik.

We were on the way back from the zip line tour located next door when we accidentally came across this amazing restaurant. Unfortunately the zip line tour wasn't great for us (but good for Toddlers) so we were very pleasantly surprised to find one of the best restaurants we visited in Dubrovnik... 

The location and views are stunning - especially at sunset! Set at the top of the hill overlooking the city you can see for miles. The food was fantastic - we ended up picking multiple starters try as many things as possible - they were all great! 

Special thanks has to go to Mara and Petra who were fabulous... they found us a table (when normally you have to book weeks in advance) and were very helpful and attentive. Thank you again!

I would highly recommend coming here if you are in Dubrovnik. We had booked for a second row seat and when we arrived we were placed in the front row. The views were absolutely incredible, service was great and the food was delicious.
Stunning views, amazing service, probably one of the best wines we have tried Royal Dingac. Service was perfect. Our waiter was awesome.
Prepare for a pricey experience. I understand being a captive audience but 7€ for a Fanta and 10€ for a beer. I don’t think so. Don’t bother.
It has really nice view and beautiful sunset. The restaurant was good and it has really fresh fish and delicious drinks.

We visited it twice, first time they gave us second row so we left. It was sooo hot in the middle of the day. Second time we went at 9 am, we sat first row because the food dont start until 10. We drank orange juice and cappucino. Nice view over dubrovnik but very crowded

We had seen reviews of this restaurant online and were very excited to dine here. we booked a reservation online in advance and we’re glad we did as it was very busy when we arrived. We did bring our daughter (3 yr) and all the stuff were so friendly and welcoming to her. The views were absolutely stunning. Our reservation was for 3 pmso we availed of the lunch menu. The portions were very generous and the price was very reasonable. The lasagna was extremely flavoursome and we would definitely recommend.
Lovely service, enjoyable food and fantastic view. Recommend the cable car to the top and then enjoying a meal or at a minimum a drink overlooking Dubrovnik.

What a place! Great views, fantastic food and wonderful waiters/waitresses! We had a fantastic meal - we were a party of 6 and chanced our visit and didn’t book a table. Lucky for us there was a cancellation and they fit us in straight away. We got served very quickly with our waiter being incredibly friendly. I had a burger and my boyfriend had a steak sandwich- both were very delicious. The views were amazing from any angle and we loved our time here.

I liked it 👍🧌. We went up a cable car and saw the top go a mountain, the view was nice. I had a steak sandwich (no veg I don't like them) it tasted yummy. My dad had some beef which wasn't cooked (deliberately) but it wasn't the best. My sister had a chicken burger (no veg) it was alright. The staff were nice 😊. Thanks for reading, Lewis 😀🧌

Reserve for the sunset.
Very nice view of the old town of dubrovnik and beautiful map with very good products. 
Good service

The Resaurant Panorama is the pearl of the beautiful city of Dubrovnik. 
Fantastic food and extremely friendly and courteous service! We were there twice. There is a seasonal menu with a colorful selection of Croatian specialists. 
The restaurant has a huge terrace with a magnificent view of the old town.

We had a great time at the panorama. The situation is idyllic just outside the funicular. The welcome was very warm, impeccable service and friendly. Yet we had only 2 dishes for 2 adults and one child. No worries... The waiter gave three seats without even asking. The burger and caesar salad were delicious and hearty. The Award very reasonable. Do not hesitate!!!
Amazing setting. Lovely service. Stunning food. An absolute must. Not as dear as you might think (by Dubrovnik standards).

We had planned to do the cable car trip to Mt Srd for the views and get back to Ploce gate entrance for lunch. But once we reached the top and saw the beautifully set up oudoor restaurant we couldnt resist ourselves. We quickly got the table we wanted. Btw if you want the sea view corner row sitting which is the best you get 1 hr time if u order just drinks. However if u select any other rows there is no time limit even if u r just there for a drink. The staff is wonderful. All the staff members were so charming cheerful and always ready to help.. we asked them to take around 10 pics and also at different spots and they obliged each time with a smile. We didnt order food but I got a few beers while wifey tried a couple of cocktails and she loved them. We ended up spending over 2 hours and we were never bothered by any staff unless we would.call them. Overall a memorable visit with lovely panoramic picture memories of Dubrovnik. Tip of the hat to the lovely servers

I don’t think I’ve ever eaten a meal that’s had a better view than in Panorama. We were seated at a table at the edge and on a corner which offered amazing views over Dubrovnik and the islands. 

This is a lovely restaurant. The staff were really pleasant and the two waiters we had were very attentive. We didn’t feel rushed, despite it being really busy. 

Foccacia bread to start was tasty and arrived warm. I had the best tuna salad ever. My husband had the premium burger, which was huge!! He really enjoyed it. The coleslaw was delicious.

Had a couple of cocktails which were fab. I’d definitely go back and have already recommended to friends.

Here's the thing; when you have something special, you need to ensure you get the best you can for it, and this restaurant certainly does.

They must have one of the best veiws from any table I know of, and they know how to market it.

You have to book 3-6 months upfront for a table, and then you can choose where you want to sit. I wanted the front line off the front terrace, obviously the most popular, as it offers the best view down to the Old Town. Because of this, I could only get the lunch time slot, before 18:00. In a way, I'm glad of this, as the prices go from expensive to astronomical for the evening meal times.

We had a simple soup, and tuna salad, 2x drinks and this came to a tad under €60; bit steep really. Add into that the cable car tickets of €54, and it turned into an expensive meal.

In all you pay a premium to get there, a premium for the meal, but is it worth it - probably to say you've been there and seen that..

Saying that thought, what a view..

We booked a front row table 5 months before we visited as we’d heard just how popular it was. Glad we did as the table was in a perfect position for watching the sunset and enjoying the views of Dubrovnik and the surrounding areas. You are given your table for 150 mins so never feel you are being rushed which made the whole experience even more special. The food was amazing and was presented beautifully. The restaurant was very busy with lots of people in the standing area drinking cocktails and watching the sun set. My advice is to book as early as you can as it’s a view not to be missed!

Amazing second visit to celebrate being engaged for two years. Proposal was actually at Panorama! Staff, food, location, weather - everything was perfect. Nothing too much trouble. Staff went out of their way to make the experience as good the second time as it was the first. Thank you to all the team, we will be back to celebrate future anniversaries!! 🙌 Nik & Jemma

Popped into this lovely restaurant after going up on the cable car. It was early around 10.30 so only stopped for a drink. The view was amazing, it was fully air conditioned and classy. Well worth the price of the drinks just for the lovely experience we had.
Fantastic view over the city, absolutely reserve well in advance. The food was delicious, only at dessert I would cut corners

This restaurant is in a stunning location with views of Dubrovnik Old Town. We drove to the restaurant, there is car parking. Alternatively a trip in the cable car, which is next door, would be a good option. 
Food was excellent with a good selection. 
I absolutely loved the whole experience of this restaurant!

We sat outside with a fantastic view of the sunset. The food and service were exceptionally good. The restaurant is located just by the cable car, which runs until midnight. This is The place to be to watch the sunset and have a great meal.
Excellent service, if your here for the view and a desert or the whole nine yards. You get treated like your a millionaire! Definitely coming back for another awesome experience.

We hadn't booked but asked if they had spaces for lunch which they did.
Our waitress was amazing and looked after us very well.
We ate inside and had a brilliant view of Old Town.

The food was lovely and I would thoroughly recommend coming here and asking for a table even if you haven't booked.

We had lunch consisting of steak sandwiches, chicken burger and beef burger. The batata fries with the chicken burger were fab!

Nice Aperol spritz too.
We had Vedran as our waiter, he was such a pleasure. Fantastic place, service and views 10 out of 10. Thankyou for such a great experience

So much more than we expected! The setting is elegant and relaxed and you’re made to feel special from the moment you arrive. Lots of staff and attention to detail is spot on. Our waiter, Marco, was very knowledgeable on the menu and didn’t try to upsell once we’d made our choices. Food was exquisite and simply couldn’t be faulted, coupled with a reasonably priced bottle of wine. 
It’s certainly a great location for relaxed dining or for a special occasion. 
Our table was 6.30pm which was perfect to watch the sun setting over the islands. 
Absolutely first class experience.

A stunning location with views over the city and the bay. Excellent quality food and great service. You must book a few months ahead if you want front row table at sunset. Not cheap but so worth it. They have a bar area if you haven’t booked. A real treat.
Matija gave exceptionally good service in a restaurant that didn’t need any more enhancing due to the stunning location. You can’t visit Dubrovnik without a meal at this amazing restaurant.

Went to this spot with my family after my mothers brother suggested this place. The service is awesome, food is great, you also get a discount it you're a local. The view is awesome and the vibe is great, i would definetly go here again.

Amazing food - pricey but the whole experience was wonderful! 
The waiter was amazing and so attentive with the table. 
All of the food was amazing! 
The view is superb!
Amazing view for a 40th celebration, with a lovely atmosphere. Mateo looked after us. Highly recommend this for couples and travellers alike.

A very pleasant dining experience with very attentive staff. Nothing was too much trouble, the staff were very pleasant and friendly. The food was stunning and excellent quality. Would highly recommend a visit.

Great experience. The 10-15 minute Uber drive from downtown Dubrovnik is time well spent. For more than one person Uber is much less expensive than cable car . There are gorgeous views of old town from the top . Get a table on the rail for optimal views. Very good food and drink. Service a bit slow but friendly

What an amazing evening. The food, the view and the service were first class, had a totally fantastic meal.

Special mention to Mateo for superb service and insight.

The price isnt cheap, however that is in line with the rest of Croatia.

Need to book months in advance, go up the cable car, although u can apparently get there by taxi.

A one off worth every penny.

Besides unbeatable views, right at sunset, we were exceptionally served, from beginning to end. We ate very well; very creative and different dishes, with unusual ingredients and combinations, making everything a great and delicious surprise. We stayed at a privileged table, but we knew that the restaurant will go through works so that everyone has the right to the wonderful view of the citadel! The end of the dinner was in the kitchen, with direct thanks and compliments to the professionals and the chef!
Food was very delicious!!! Amazing view!!! However was impossible to call them. We were lucky that someone wasn't on his reservation time, so we got a table.
Hard to find fault. Food, service and view were all excellent. If possible aim to book a table on the first or second row just before sunset

Great service, amazing view -we made it for sunset, Food top quality, though our starters were huge!

Take the cable car, the road is 
narrow & busy
Food was excellent and the view was stunning ! Especially the lamp chops and the veal risotto. The staff was also really nice.

We booked well in advance to have one of the best tables. It was well worth doing this.

We ate the veal risotto and steak. All food was really good and our server Peter was brilliant, friendly and very professional. Would definitely recommend.
We booked the front terrace in advance. You also need to reconfirm on the day by 11am for lunch. Stunning views and the food was simply delicious! Excellent service too.

We had a beautiful night at the panoramic spot hovering over Dubrovnik. The dinner and drinks were exquisite and the view breathtaking. The restaurant team was attentive and made sure that everything went smooth at all times.

A fantastic night. Stunning views, fantastic 
food, great service from Mateo. Could not be bettered. Not to be missed. Thank you.
Beautiful view, fantastic octopus salad, and amazing service from Mateo! He made the experience even more lovely. Recommend to kick off or close out your trip to Dubrovnik.

Mateo is really nice and hospitable. Professional service and quick response.
The dishes are good and views are wonderful
We had a lovely lunch here, views were amazing and the food was absolutely delicious. Our server Mateo was so lovely and helpful.
Great lunch spot! The views are incredible and the breeze felt very nice. The food and drinks were delicious! Our server Nikola was so nice too.
Incredible views. Sad to miss breakfast menu (arrived 1030). Food solid - I think the sister restaurants slightly clinch it

I booked the restaurant 5 months before our trip to Dubrovnik and I wasn’t disappointed. We had an amazing front row table with unobstructed views of Dubrovnik. Not only was the view stunning but so was the food and the service. Do not miss this wonderful experience when visiting Dubrovnik.
Excellent food and experience with the spectacular vew! Very friendly staff including Matteo our server. Everyone enjoyed the meal.

This place is an amazing restaurant to visit with amazing views of the entire Dubrovnik skyline. The food and drink were very nice if a little overpriced but the extra is worth it for the view. The service was very very nice and they couldn’t be more friendly or helpful. Our waiter Pero was particularly nice and very attentive. Definitely a must for a visit if in Dubrovnik
Stunning views of Dubrovnik, very relaxing enjoying brunch and a cocktail. Friendly service. This is a must for visitors to Dubrovnik.
The most amazing views and the loveliest food! We absolutely loved the whole experience and the lovely waiter Mateo couldn’t do enough for us! Highly recommend! Thank you

What an amazing dinner, this was our last night and couldnt have wished for more beautiful evening. Views were incredible, and we were able to watch the sunset which was breathtaking, the service was 10/10 from Vedran, and food was perfect, even given tickets to the wine museum with a card from the team for my partners birthday which was so lovely! A must visit when in Dubrovnik, thankyou!

I consider myself a foodie, and while Panorama didn't have THE best food I've ever had, it was certainly worth the visit. We had a delicious charcuterie board and basket of bread to start, and the drinks were also great. Our entrees were not bad by any means, but they weren't my favorite. But the service and atmosphere were incredible. I was bummed because even though I made my dinner reservation about 3 months in advance, the only time we could get a front row seat was at 9pm which was after sunset. But I figured we'd go early and have a drink and enjoy sunset before dinner. We really lucked out and got there about an hour and 15 mins early to find out that there had been a cancellation and that they could seat us right away! So we ended up having a gorgeous sunset dinner. Heads up that it is chillier/windier up there vs in old town, but no worries because they have blankets for the guests which was a really nice touch. Definitely recommend making a reservation here!

The best view ever!

Wow this place was stunning. Short cable car ride up the mountain, we sat at one of the best tables in the house. Food was outstanding and service efficient. Waiters doubled as photographers! I would go again in a heartbeat.
Thank you Matteo.

Exceptional.
Yes the views are amazing however this restaurant and quality of staff stand on their own.
Even without the view you will have exceptional food, attentive and friendly staff.
A stand out in Croatia and surrounds.
Many a restaurant and staff manager could learn from this team!
You will not be disappointed.

Wow, what an amazing night! This restaurant felt unobtainable with our last-minute Croatiabooking in the middle of July, but we managed to book an Incredible table overlooking the Old Town and The Adriatic Sea.

Our Dear waiter Josip went out of his way to make the rest of the premium restaurants in Dubrovnik fade away and the food held the highest of standards!

If you have the opportunity, treat yourself with a visit to Panorama when in Dubrovnik! We cant wait to come back!
Amazing service, they went above and beyond. The food was fantastic, they view was beautiful and we had great service from Nikolas, our waiter.
this spot was lovely for lunch!! the views were incredible, food was delicious and our server mateo looked after us!!! hvala!!!
So awesome! Went at 6:30 and was perfect time for golden hour and sunset due to the 2hr limit. Gorgeous views and delicious food. Make sure to make reservation far in advance.

Fantastic place to have lunch with panoramic views . Your can eat outside or the air conditioned restaurant which we chose with first class service . After leaving the beautiful but busy streets of the city I would recommend to anyone
Absolutely stunning view with great food and service. Was there only for a light lunch but really wished I had the time for more food.

Incredibly poor service and average food.

Feel sad for the staff who seem to be doing their best just not enough of them.

Gave up the wait outside for drinks as it appeared to be totally disorganised.

Inside we had a long long wait for anyone to come to the table. A bottle of wine and a bottle of water should not take the same time to arrive as the food!

Food was average, nothing wrong with it but certainly not the best we have had in Dubrovnik.

Nikola, great waitress. Great food, drinks and service. 
We'll be happy to come back. 
Got a table right away, we had not booked in advance. 
Beautiful sunset

We booked a table of 6 six months out and it didn't disappoint. We were given a table at the front with the best view. The lady server was fantastic. Being best know for its view we werent expecting much from the food. Wow were we surprised! It was amazing!

We went to the restaurant with my three-year-old, five-year-old, wife, grandmother, and wife. The kids stayed at the restaurant while my wife and I tried the skybike attraction. The food was okay, the view was amazing, but the service was not that good. Nevertheless, I would still recommend the restaurant if you decide to dine there.
Food and service see awesome. Mateo knew his stuff. If you are smart, get a taxi up to the restaurant. It’s half the cost of the cable car

Today my partner and I travelled up towards the Panorama restaurant on the cable car to enjoy the beautiful views overlooking the old town, and shortly after doing so, I took a knee and popped the big question - 10 years being boyfriend and girlfriend and months of planning for this proposal… a lot weighed on this moment!

Now, the trip up and around the area where the restaurant is located is beautiful itself, but I wanted to make our special moment extra special by celebrating with a glass of fizz!

Upon arrival we were quickly seated to a table of 2 which allowed us to continue looking over the old town - the views really were stunning and we were so grateful to have been seated at such short notice.

Waiter Vedran came to our table to take a drinks order, and upon reaching our table he noticed the fuss that we were making about being newly engaged, and without hesitation, Vedran disappeared for a brief moment only to then reappear with 2 glasses of fizz, each with a strawberry in!

This was a complimentary celebratory drink provided by not just the restaurant, but by Vedran personally himself, and that very kind and thoughtful gesture went a long way.

2 glasses of champagne and a few purchased cocktails later, my fiancé (get me!) and I left the restaurant feeling amazing and like our special moment was made even more special.

It seems like a small thing to leave a review on, but sometimes the smallest gestures go the longest way, and taking that gesture into consideration aswell as looking at all the amazing meals, service and experience being provided to others, it was a no brainer to come on here and leave a 5 star review.

Proposal or not, this restaurant is the place to go if you’re wanting a special moment in Dubrovnik.

Vedran, thank you so much!

This was amazing experience. The restaurant is very cozy and the views are breath-taking. We took perfect daiquirys there. It was worth it though high prices. The relaxing music in the restaurant was just right choice.

Unbelievable experience. The gondola ride was only the beginning. Great menu, excellent service from server Petra and her colleagues, and excellent execution by the kitchen. Easily one of the best dining experiences we've had in years.
Expensive, but very much worth the cost. Reserve well ahead.
There are good vegetarian options. We didn’t pre-book and still managed to get a table without having to wait long. The views are amazing and the drinks are good too!
Wow what an unbelievable setting! And they upgraded us to the front row when we arrived. The waiters were super attentive and food and cocktails were delicious. Best view in Dubrovnik!

Had the most amazing meal at this restaurant on Sunday 30th June. Actually didn't want our meal to end! You have to book this months in advance due to location (views of old town and surrounding area are to die for). Book a table at sunset, so check times for this. Staff were very attentive, food was delicious, what more can I say other than keep up the good work. You won't be disappointed, if you manage to secure a table!
What an amazing restaurant. The service was excellent and the food incredible. The views were so beautiful and we could have stayed there all day it was so nice! Definitely recommend!
Great food, great view and great service from Matteo. Would definitely recommend for the best view of Dubrovnik. We will be back

We booked 630 pm last week for myself, husband and 2 children age 12 and 15. We were lost for words on arrival. The view is spectacular! Just amazing. 
The light lunch menu finished at 6pm . There is Burgers and mains starting at about 21 euro. So we had the aka carte. There is nothing on it kid friendly. My 2 children had chips each and my self and my HB had a steak and a chicken main. The steak was 47 euro. Now it was lovely food and the setting is to die for . The desserts were epic in fairness BUT id go for the light lunch if I was going again due to cost and choices for kids. It got cold and windy too up there so earlier in the day is probably more comfortable temperature. 
I'm envious of anyone going for the first time because quite honestly the view is mind blowing. ENJOY !
One of the best restaurants I’ve ever been to. Truly spectacular views. Food was lovely too. Not too expensive. Staff very friendly & helpful. Cable car was great fun

Absolute must, food was fantastic, perfect table with a truly stunning view, great service all round. Celebrating my sisters 50th and the staff looked after us so well, you must book for the best tables
The location, the food. This place is amazing. We had the chefs king prawns and sea bass. Goodness. The staff were also so great. You go here for the experience and you get it

By taxi to the restaurant and by cable car back after a delicious cappuccino and enjoyed the view!!
For lunch or dinner all summer fully booked!
You have to book 4 months in advance or this great place.

Beware 

Booked 3 months ago and given a view of an umbrella. No ability to swop it was this or nothing. Such a shame as we had been looking forward to this meal.

A fantastic restaurant with lovely views. We were transported to and from with the restaurant's own car for free. 
The food and service was fantastic! 
This must be experienced!

Fabulous meal fabulous staff beautiful view. The restaurant is so accommodating. Joseph Has been my waiter for more than once at this restaurant and he works so hard to make everyone feel welcomed and special. The rest of the staff as well was friendly and special.

Chief Andrew prepared the most amazing meal of Dubrovnik Cutlet with salad & bread selection with balsamic & olive oil. Meal was as good as the food, dreams do come true. Thank you Croatia for looking after us & memories to last a life time. Our waiter Ivo looked after us so well, thank you for our memorable visit 💖

Chef Andrew made me the most delicious squid dish. And our waiter Ivo was absolutely amazing 😉🦑
The view is to die for. I’m glad I booked so early to get the front row table.

Beautiful restaurant. Manager was amazing and gave us a table even though booked. Nikoli was our waiter. He was great, attentive and recommended food to us. Lovely guy, good service and great food. The view was amazing too. Would 100% recommend this restaurant. So happy we got to have our dinner here this evening ☺️ 😀😀😀
Beautiful setting and amazing food. The service was really great and we were so lucky to get a last minute seat. Steak and lamb chops were insane!
An absolutely beautiful meal in the most perfect setting. Our waiter Robert was lovely; very friendly, attentive and knowledgeable. Would highly recommend!
Such an excellent place for the food, service and view. Petra & Tony went above what’s necessary to make our lunch excellent. A special delight!

Excellent food, view and service. 

Petra was our server and was fantastic.

Would highly recommend a visit if you are in Dubrovnik.
We were able to score a table as a walk on mid day after a hike up Mt Srd. We had tried to reserve a month out so were pleased to get in. Excellent food, service and breeze/view. Highly recommend!

Just had the most amazing lunch at The Panorama Restaurant in Dubrovnik - the staff were very friendly and so helpful in accommodating us today and made our experience very special. Special thank you to Petra for being so lovely and making my birthday lunch a memorable experience and one we will treasure forever. The views and food were top class. Highly recommended if you are visiting Dubrovnik.

Unbelievable 
Fantastic, could not recommend the view, or the restaurant, or the staff any higher, made my 60th birthday celebration a memorable one.

Very nice view a bit bobo very high price for Seville 8 euros 1 mini glass of Spanish wine 
Not at all comfortable it is really only for souvenir photo
Fabulous restaurant with such great service and of course amazing food with a stunning view. Perfect place to celebrate our recent engagement
Fantastic food and great service (thanks Nikola) in a fabulous location. We sat inside in a first row table - the view is superb all round.

This spot is great for taking in the view while enjoying a cold drink and bite to eat. Nikola, our waiter, was very attentive and we enjoyed his sense of humour. We were a large group of 10 and turned up without a booking and the staff did a very good job of accommodating us.

We really wanted to eat here during our week long Dubrovnik trip, but unfortunately after emailing we found the restaurant fully booked for over a month in advance. 

We trie dour luck on the last night of our holiday as we wanted to drive to the view point to watch the sunset, and thought we would just grab a drink. We asked for a table and were offered one inside at the back of the restaurant, but politely declined. after around 20 minutes of enjoying our drinks at the standing tables with lovely views, we were offered an 8pm table with a view due to a no show - so lucky! Very grateful to the lovely and accommodating hosts. 

Peter was our waiter and he was great! Very attentive and knowledgeable, food was delicious, the Dubrovnik style pork cutlet especially

A stunning end to our holiday with the best views, food and atmosphere, 100% recommend

We took the cable car to the top of mount Srb and stopped for a drink at the lovely Panorama restaurant. The views were fabulous and it was a beautiful setting to enjoy an afternoon cocktail or two. Staff were friendly and despite the restaurant being busy with diners, we were not rushed. Definitely a must when visiting Dubrovnik and I look forward to dining here at sunset at a future visit.
Incredible food, fantastic views, nothing more you could ask for, it was a little expensive but that’s what you expect for such an incredible venue. Food was better than expected
Dinner was fantastic, Aleksander was a great waiter and the food and views were incredible. You should not miss….Enjoy!

The view is incredible we were sat at the back and it still has an amazing view! I was given the suggestion of the pork cutlet and it was hands down one of the nicest meals I have ever had! My girlfriend said the beef was incredible and Mateo was amazing and gave great suggestions for the food and wine! Must do if I’m Dubrovnik!

A beautiful restaurant with stunning views and fabulous food! This has to be on your top 10 of things to do while you’re here. Mataeou our waiter was attentive and friendly. Great place to view the sunset.

This place is so unique! Beautiful views, delicious food, friendly waitstaff (shout out to Nikola)! We had 2 gluten free folks in our party and almost everything on the menu could be altered to be gluten free. We loved everything. That includes the picky teens in our group! Definitely a recommend!

Nikola was amazing! We booked this reservation months in advance. Well worth it: ride the cable car up- it was amazing. He made excellent recommendations: the menu is delicious. Hard to choose just one item. The view is absolutely incredible. Our table was ready at our reservation time. We were not rushed.

This is a fantastic spot that overlooks Dubrovnik. Despite what I would consider being an "experience" restaurant, the food did not disappoint and the staff was great. Even though they seemed to be fully booked on the night we went, no one rushed us. I would recommend the 7pm-9pm slot if you'd like to take in the sunset. Just be aware that many other people take the cable car up to watch the sunset, so you may have to wait for awhile to get back down. Overall, a wonderful experience that I would recommend to anyone heading to Dubrovnik.
Panorama restaurant was absolutely wonderful! Our server Robert was so very personable and friendly! The food was great and the views from the restaurant are incredible. Would visit again!!
Everything about this spot is beautiful Apart from the view of the old city it’s a great menu and the staff were exemplary. They made our day special
Amazing experience with incredible views. The staff were so lovely and welcoming which made our dinner all the more enjoyable! Would definitely recommend
We had the best time celebrating our friend’s birthday! The view was absolutely amazing and our waiter Ivo was very kind.

I came to Dubrovnik in 2021 and due to storms our reservation here was cancelled. Ive been itching to come back ever since! It did not disappoint. The most AMAZING views! Whilst on the slightly expensive side it was worth every single penny! Our meal was spectacular and Marco our waiter was so lovely and helpful and even sorted a phone charger for my husband. Honestly would absolutely recommend this restaurant. Oh and definitely go by cable car. Views breathtaking

Came with a group of girlfriends with two of us celebrating our 50th birthdays which the waiter forgot. Views are stunning and the food is excellent but everyone’s dish was cold which you don’t expect when you are paying high prices. Views are amazing but was a little disappointed this time.
Sensational views of the Old Town. Wonderful food. Excellent, friendly, efficient staff who could not do enough for you. An experience to not to be missed.

Very good service! Our waiter Marko was very nice! 
We took olives and bread to start with and Marko asked when we wanted the main dish so he wouldn’t rush us. 
The food was really tasty and the view was amazing!
Absolutely incredible setting - our waiter Marco was fantastic, felt so welcome. Food was amazing - well worth trying this restaurant!

Stunning view of the entire old town and more! Wonderful wait staff, our server Marco was so kind and attentive. Highly recommend the cable cart up and at very least a drink to take in such wonderful views.

Food and wine were phenomenal! The view is breathtaking!!! This is definitely a Bucket-list experience. Thank you so much Marco for providing us the best service and memories of a lifetime - we appreciate you! Do not hesitate to book a spot on the terrace for the best views.

We had the best dinner of our entire Croatia trip here. The ambience and the view can not be beat, it just doesn't get any better than the Panorama Restaurant & Bar. Our dinner was perfect, my lamb chops were to die for. This restaurant and the cable car ride are a true 'not to be missed' experience in Dubrovnik.
What an amazing place …….. stunning restaurant. Marko was super friendly. Lovely and friendly with exceptional service x
Beautiful place and friendly staff. Marko was very helpful and served lovely gin and tonics in a very kind way. Thank you so much
Fantastic food, fantastic views. Very polite lovely waiter Marko. Thank you so much. Highly recommend a visit. You won’t want to leave.

Very attentive staff and delicious food with amazing views!Can't wait to come back and enjoy all mentioned again!
