Thank you for making unforgettable memories for our holidays!

The view especially in the evening is spectacular. Ordered two gin and tonics which were high quality but a little expensive. I guess you pay for the view. Can’t comment on the quality or price of the food.

Breath taking views, Marko our waiter was exceptional, helpful and friendly. Food was delicious and reasonably priced. Considering the location I was expecting to pay much more. Tried to book on line before we travelled but it was showing as fully booked. Turned up about 10am and was lead straight to a table, guess we were lucky!
The view is amazing! And the service is 100% good! Robert is so nice and we have a good time here🩷definitely will come back
The food was delicious and the ambience of the restaurant was perfect. Mateo provided excellent service making our dinner a most memorable experience!

Panorama was amazing! I made a reservation well in advance, and I’m so glad I did. The food was great, as was the service, but of course the star is that view! I’m already wishing I were back sipping a glass of Pošip and looking at the views!

What a fantastic experience we had, it will remain a very special family memory. We booked this restaurant as a surprise for my husband’s birthday and were not disappointed! From the warm welcome when we arrived to every waiter/waitress that served us wishing my husband a happy birthday it was a wonderful experience. The food was delicious too! The view amazing! Cannot fault and would highly recommend as a special destination. Thank you!

Arrived by the very expensive but dramatic cable car and the views did not disappoint! After a couple of minutes taking photos on the viewing platform we made our way to the restaurant. In front of us at the matre D there was a young solo Japanese girl begging for a table as she would post her review on instagram. Five minutes later she realised that the very polite staff weren't going to accommodate her as the restaurant was full. I almost interrupted her to tell her we booked 10 months ago! Anyway, she finally moved on and after announcing our arrival we were taken to the closest thing to heaven on earth, our table for the evening!! Well it was spectacular! Sitting on the edge of the cliff with a stupendous view of Dubrovnik below and a 180 degree view of the breathtaking coast! We were blown away! The view was matched by impeccable service, delicious food and the most beautiful and serene sunset! Thanks you so much for a lovely meal for our wedding anniversary. My advice to visitors is book it regardless of cost. Make it your number one on your to do list. Our evening with Ubers, cable car, meal and drinks was around 180€ for the two of us but was so worth it! There aren't enough superlatives to describe the place (and I've used a few!) we will definitely be back!

Nice restaurant with fantastic location and view. The service was very pleasant and professional, and the food was good. The restaurant was actually fully booked when we arrived, but the manager still managed to arrange a table for us. The prices were not too bad, considering the quality of the food and the waiters.
Petra and Mario were amazing!! They made our 21st birthday very special and one to remember! Very friendly staff and very beautiful restaurant
Amazing views and even better food! Our server Robert was incredibly kind, we loved being served by him. Hope we will come back soon.

During my annual holiday to Dubrovnik i had made a reservation to revisit Panorama following a fantastic meal last summer. Once again my experience was fantastic. Upon making the reservation i know a specific table cannot be guarenteed upon arrival, however i did request one and once again my request was granted. The service was 10/10 and the three course meal was absolutely delicious. The view was simply amazing. Thankyou to everyone at Panorama for making this another meal and experience to remember. See you next year!
Excellent food even better view. Overall just a class restaurant in Dubrovnik, Mateo our server was excellent and so helpful!

This was honestly the highlight of our trip so far. The service was amazing from start to finish. We had pre booked a table on the 2nd row and was upgraded to the front row with the most beautiful views of the whole city. The food and drinks were amazing. It was also not too hot under the canapés. 1000% need to come here if you’re going to Dubrovnik!
The view on its own would make this a special place to eat , but the food and service were also excellent, a memory we won’t forget
Amazing views. Very friendly staff. Petra our waitress was so nice and personable. Food was wonderful. Would definitely come back!
Food was delicious. Beautiful view over old town Dubrovnik. Our waitress Petra was wonderful. Definitely recommend.

Fantastic views and setting, just make sure you book well in advance to get a front or second row table. Food and service were on a par with the view and don’t let it down.

Not cheap, but well worth it for a meal to remember.
A fabulous evening…the food was exceptional, the views stunning (booked a front terrace table well in advance…a perfect setting) and the service was attentive and friendly.
Best spot. The most amazing view of Dubrovnik. Went 5:30 most perfect time of day to go for an early dinner. Usually these places with the view are usually just for view/ but the food was delicious.
Great experience! Highly recommend. Salmon and pork cutlet were great. Must start with the bread. Be sure to make reservation far in advance.
Great service. Amazing food. Better than Proto. Fantastic. Truly surprised. As usually view does not come with good food.

We arrived at this place after taking the cable car and it was truly a pleasant surprise. We were outside and although it was incredibly hot in Old Town, in Panorama we were freezing to death! But thanks to the fact that they give you a blanket we had a great time!
The food was very delicious, although the price did seem expensive to me. 
I recommend it as a must if you go to the city so you can see the incredible landscape.
Amazing food, amazing views. Pork cutlet highly recommended . Staff was extremely friendly. Very satisfied. Mateo our server was excellent.
Our meal was beautiful - fresh, well presented, great service, stunning view of the city and then the sunset. Thankyou for an unforgettable evening.

Our waiter was amazing, he made the experience so much more enjoyable. 

The steak was perfectly cooked and fell apart in your mouth. It was a mouth watering steak and very tender. 

The chicken was perfectly seasoned and was so juicy. I would eat this chicken for the rest of my life. 

Dessert was glorious, the cheesecake was divine and the pistachio cake was the best pistachio dessert I’ve ever tasted. 

Would definitely recommend to order a cocktail as they were perfectly made and the presentation was 10/10.

The view was amazing.
Lovely dinner with a view. Beef cooked perfectly medium rare as requested. Waiter Marko very attentive and helpful. All staff very friendly. Great experience. We would recommend.
Food was absolutely terrific. Service was first class and the view and sunset were spectacular. Highly recommended!!
Mateo was a great server, good recommendations, very professional service. Good service without hanging over us, let us linger and enjoy.
Beautiful location and fantastic. Food and drink. Book well in advance to secure a table on the front row for the most amazing views. Lovely friendly waiting staff. Would highly recommend.

What a great way to wrap up our trip! Spectacular view! The food was very good and the wait staff were very courteous. We let them pick a glass of local wine to go with our meal and they chose well. We got lucky with the weather with rain in the morning but sunny skies and a nice sunset in the evening!

Fantastic views of either the Dubrovnik old town or mountains. A little pity with the sunset on the side but still wonderful. 

Food wise, lamp chop was tender enough yet the salmon fillet was overcooked. 

Cocktails & red wines were nice.
Fantastic service in the most wonderful location. It’s our second visit and was as good as the first time, we will be back!!
The food was good, the view was even better, but the service was great! Although it’s a bit expensive, I would really recommend this place.

This views from this restaurant are stunning. We ate here on the final day of our holiday. The staff were attentive, helpful and friendly. The food was delicious. We had the bread selection, sea bass and veal risotto. You will need to book in advance, I booked a couple of months before our trip. Thank goodness I did the memory will stay forever. Thank you.
Best meal i have ever had in my life. Everything we ate was absolutely amazing. This place deserves 6 stars. The location is perfect for sunset dining. The white won is bery light and tasty.

You need a reseevation for dinner to guarantee a spot! We had one on Monday for sunset - other than this it was fully booked for 1 -2 weeks. Food was more pricey but extremely good. All the small things on the plate worked amazingly together. We had the steak and sea bass. Around 110e for 2 with drinks.

Fantastic food, great hospitallity. And an amazing view over Dibrovnik Old Town and port. And right far over the Adriatic sea!

All best, 10/10! 
And an great salute to our host,

Had the lamb ragu and focaccia bread basket to start with. Bread, oil and balsamic were very nice. Ragu was hearty but lacking any depth of flavour and seasoning - bland. For the main course, we had a pork chop with potatoes and pancetta which was juicy, well seasoned and tasty however the red wine jus was oily and again, bland. The second main course was a rice and squid dish with a lovely yoghurt dressing however, the rice was heavy and stodgy. We were recommended a local expensive red wine which was vinegary and undrinkable - which we left half the bottle. The venue and view were stunning and the staff were really attentive. Recommend more for an afternoon/evening drink but have dinner elsewhere in the city. Blankets and heaters are provided but worth bringing extra layers as location is exposed and windy

If you want to eat with a good view, you are in the right restaurant. However, being simple hikers, we saw that we weren't really welcome... We couldn't book, we waited a long time and a lot of people passed in front of us... Then, when it was our turn, we were rushed with a comment “you must not stay more than an hour and twenty minutes”… 
Finally, the prices are high for what is served…
Really great view but service not great. Food was okay. We hated that the toilets were not part of the restaurant. A little overrated honestly.

Had two cocktails here and they were the best we had in Croatia.
The views are incredible and the service was good too :)
Recommend!

We only stayed for a few cocktails and the meat and olives platter which were enjoyable but the real selling point of this restaurant is the view, a beautiful aerial view of Dubrovnik and the surrounding area, the restaurant is located right on the edge of the hill with tiered seating so every seat feels like you are on the corner overlooking the city. We tried to book for dinner online however they were fully booked for months so we just went for lunch and were seated right away. I would recommend booking in advance if you want to visit for dinner.

Am so glad we visited this beautiful restaurant....our waiter Mateo was very attentive and couldn't do enough. The service professional and food very tasty! The views are amazing, one side mountains and side old town....what's not to love surrounded by this for a lovely first day lunch in Dubrovnik.

Highly recommend a trip here! 

Note that it's worth taking a cardi as if you catch the breeze could be chilly. 

I truly hope I get to visit again!

We visited for lunch, I had a chicken and pumpkin seed salad, followed by chocolate mousse.. both were delicious! The view was stunning and the staff were great. Special mention to Mateo who was very attentative and friendly! We will definitely be back

We paid to see the view which never materialised due to the cloud cover. We decided to stay for a drink which was served by Marco and that was the only positive! The drinks were nothing special and expensive!

Amazing place with breathtaking view of old town.
Service is great, they really make the effort to please you and make you feel good.
Delicious and fine food worth every penny.

Fabulous views, staff were excellent and service was top quality. The attention to detail was fantastic. The only down side for me was my food wasn't quite as hot as I'd like it. That aside I highly recommend here!

5/5 from start to finish, the views, the food, the service was amazing! Worth every penney! Booked for my partner for his birthday and we had an amazing night, the staff are very friendly, as soon as it got cooler in the evening they gave us warm blankets, they brought out a slice of cake with a candle for my partner, very nicw touch, would return in a heartbeat!
The food was delicious and service was great! It was a great meal to just relax and take your time. No hurry. We loved they moved us to the window when it became available.

When we arrived there were many open tables but we were asked if we had a reservation. Since we didn’t we were offered a seat in the sun. Our French fries took forever and arrived cold. The view is the best part.

Highly recommend that you make a reservation, even if you’re just popping by for a drink after coming up to observe the views. 

There was already a queue at 11am, and after waiting for around 20 minutes I was eventually seated. It wasn’t the “best” table in the restaurant, but I was more than happy with it.

My cocktail was superb, and the whole experience was enhanced by the lovely surroundings and excellent hospitality.

Highly recommended.

The food was beautifull and fresh.
The cocktails were amazing and the staff helpfull.
A window side table makes the scene perfect!

Mateo was fantastic. Food good. View to die for. 
Will be back next time for lunch. Loved the night views. Cable car ride up gave beautiful views.

The views, the food and the staff are all brilliant!

We got a cancellation the day before for a prime time and front row seat, which really didn’t disappoint. This was the best evening of our trip as it enabled us to go to the viewing platform next door beforehand, which is where we got engaged!

They also do a 10% discount if you have been to other restaurants owner by the same company.

Would definitely recommend this restaurant!

We were lucky that a table in the restaurant suddenly became available. We were able to enjoy a wonderful table in the front row with a wonderful view of the old town, even though the restaurant is usually fully booked six weeks in advance. The prices are high, but the food is of high quality and very tasty, and the service is friendly and attentive. The portion sizes are rather small but just enough for us. We are happy with our visit; the view alone makes it worth coming here.

An amazing view from the top of the cable car. I tried to book for lunch or dinner a few days before and it was fully booked. We went up at 9am on the cable car and had a great table for coffee and cake. We were able to sit for an hour and enjoy the view. Thank you.

We had an amazing experience at Panorama in Dubrovnik. As it was a busy evening, we only were able to book a table for inside, but when we arrived, we were able to sit outside overlooking the cliffs and watch the sunset which was so beautiful. From the Maître d' to the servers, everything was 100%. Dinner was so delicious the desserts are fantastic.
Beautiful restaurant. Ivo was a great waiter- he was very attentive and efficient. Would recommend as food was delicious and lovely atmosphere
Amazing view, food and service. The staff is so helpful and friendly! Loved it here! This is a must visit for everyone, food and drinks are amazing
Beautiful location with an amazing view, and super friendly staff. Food was absolutely delicious. Recommend for everyone!

good food, pleasant service.
Pleasant and welcoming place, ideal for business dinners and with friends.
The tartare is good

Four of us bought cable car tickets to go from Dubrovnik up to the Panorama Restaurant on the hillside overlooking the old city. The cable car will set you back 27 euros each but it is quite an experience. 
When we arrived at the top we were warmly greeted by staff who found a table for the four of us which had brilliant views over the old city. At first we just opted to have drinks but then as time flew by we decided to have some food as well.
Service was very good, efficient and friendly. Pricing is a little steep compared to other places in Dubrovnik. For example a Karlova 0.5ltr of beer is 9:40 euros. A bottle of 0.25ltr Sprite is 3:35 euros and a 0.125ltr glass of Casa Rose Kutjevo 9:20 euros. Our bill for just a few drinks and two portions of chips was 147:20 euros and that was without any tip included. Make sure you have lots of cash or a very good credit card as you will need it😒. Having said the negative about costing I would still give it 5 out of 5 as the service, atmosphere and magical views made us all smile😋.

We were made to feel welcome as soon as we stepped foot into the restaurant - All staff were very helpful and nothing seemed too much trouble. The food was exceptional and reasonably priced considering the amazing location overlooking Dubrovnik old town. A 10/10 experience!
Amazing view service and food. The best day ever x we had the best time. Been here for six hours!! The food was brilliant and the drinks. Staff are super fabulous and it’s just perfect x

Wow
What a location 
This is a Super special place 
Amazing staff and food
Yes it’s expensive but it’s worth it 
An absolute must if visiting Dubrovnik- make sure you book in advance 
Loved it
To die for views. Excellent food, wine & service. A memorable evening spent in this incredible old world town. Wkul recommend to all for a once in a lifetime experience.

Booked the panorama for lunch top of the mountain we went via the cable car 27 Euro round trip. Ordered the steak sandwich with fries and latte’s which was delicious. A bit windy but cosy blue throws to keep you warm and a heater above you to keep you cosy too.

The views are amazing and well worth the visit to the top ensure you book as very busy. Sat leisurely looking over the City and enjoying the views. The staff were amazing and service was great. 

Would like to say will be back someday. B

We booked a table well in advance to watch the sunset 
Unfortunately the weather was stormy and we could not get the outdoor table we had booked 
The staff ensured we got a front row indoor table and they did accommodate us and everyone they could and could not be more apologetic despite being outwith their control 
The food was excellent, the capacio octopus was the best starter I have eaten , and my main course with squid octopus and rice was outstanding . 
The service was perfect attentive but not overbearing
Well worth a visit and excellent value for money for a special night
A perfect night! Despite a bad weather, they provided us a fantastic table and view inside. The food was very good and the service was excellent!!

THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU.
We had our meal at your panoramic restaurant last night (29/04/24).

I cannot recommend you guys, the place , the view, the food enough.

Our waiter (forget his name) apologies. Was so attentive. The ladies very kindly brought my reservation forward as much as they possibly could as we arrived early.

Everything from start to finish,

OUT OF THIS WORLD.
Lovely food with an even better view. We drove up and the scenery was stunning. Robert was our server, he was so lovely and enjoyed the chats. I would definitely recommend a visit.
Our waiter marco was excellent. Recommend he pork and seabass which were super!! Here for a city break for my boyfriends 30th and it was such a wonderful experience. That view, wow!! Loved it!
Wonderful venue and location. Marko made us feel exceptionally welcome and pampered. Excellent waiter. Food was glorious. Looking forward to returning
Amazing place for our engagement so so happy. Marco was amazing! Super great service. Been here twice and always as amazing

Made a reservation for the second viewing row the night before. Didn't have enough time to grab the cable car up so we got an Uber. It's quite the perilous drive but we made it safely. Excellent service - we were upgraded to a front row view and it was stunning. The food was delicious and our waiter was so kind. They were able to accommodate my celiac disease which of course was appreciated. Like any touristy place it will be pricey but we highly recommend!
Very nice view and very nice cocktails nevertheless the waiting time till someone notices you was way too long. It diluted the experience.
The most beautiful views! Food and cocktails were delicious and service was great! Thank you I would definitely reccomend to family and friends.
We came here for the view. The restaurant, the food, and the service provided by Vedran were EXCELLENT. Highly recommend.

We booked for lunch and it did not dissapoint. It was lovely and staff were lovely. We also went back for drinks after going the museum and staff remembered we had been in earlier so offered us a front row seat untill the next booking arrived. Was really lovely views

Absolutely phenomenal! Had the waiter chose for me and ended up with seafood linguine to start and the pork chop for main. Honestly it was the most amazing food and the view even on a cold and overcast day was amazing! Staff couldn't do enough to help. I would definitely recommend a trip here and definitely need to book! 

If I come back to Dubrovnik I will definitely be revisiting!
Lovely food and an outstanding view. The staff were very friendly and attentive. Would definitely recommend for a visit.

Staff friendly polite and attentive. 
Amazing views and very unique position of restaurant. Good drinks. 
The reason I’ve given 4 stars is due to the food. The breads to start were delicious, but our mains were tasteless or not what is expected for the price. The chicken burger was probably the worst I’ve had in a restaurant. My husband had the cauliflower head which at €28 was very bland. No flavour running through it. We have had this in other restaurants and it’s been a taste sensation to very disappointed. 
On a positive this was refunded by staff without request as they observed quite a bit was left on plate. This was a very good gesture, also got 10 percent discount on bill.
Stunning views and amazing service. Thanks Tino :) would defo make a stop here and enjoy. They even provided me with a portable charger as I was running out of battery.

Better to book as early as possible. We left it a bit late, which meant we could only get 10am! My god was it worth it!! Absolutely stunning views of old town. The food was delicious! The staff were very friendly and attentive. We were unsure of what wine to pick and the lovely lady recommended well! She was also very knowledgable on the scenery, telling us a bit about the surrounding countries. 

The cable car to get to the restaurant is not included. It's an extra €27 for a return trip. It's a short journey, so if scared of heights, it's over quick enough.

Great view, delicious food, lovely service!
Unfortunately the weather wasn’t great but they reserved us a table in the indoor restaurant. Would highly recommend when visiting Dubrovnik!
Great food and attentive staff. Despite the weather closing in and obscuring the view, it was still a great experience.
Amazing! Staff were so polite, friendly and obliging. Nothing was too much trouble! Wonderful views and food! We will be back
The view was amazing, the food and service were too. We enjoyed so much and had a memorable evening! The drinks were very pretty and tasty. The meal was fabulous!
We spontaneously asked if there was a free table and were served very well. The staff were very friendly and professional. The food was beautifully presented and tasted excellent.

Portions that do not deserve the prices charged!
 I had linguine...the flavors were good...unfortunately I was far from full! You are paying for quality of service and a view above all...and this, as long as you are in the first row!

A beautiful restaurant with a breathtaking view of the city. Food was exquisite, my partner had the beef which was cooked to perfection and I had the salmon which tasted amazing, accompanied by a glass of Prosecco each. Thank you for a wonderful evening, it was so worth it 🌟

Not a lot to say about this restaurant except...... absolutely wonderful the food is exquisite,the waiter and waitress were fantastic they made us feel really welcome even though it was a busy afternoon. The view of old Dubrovnik town from this vantage point can only be described as brilliant. Would recommend a visit here if you are in Dubrovnik or even if you are visiting nearby. 10/10
We went for some cocktails to enjoy the views. The atmosphere is wonderful and the terrace is very good: the staff is very friendly. The cocktails were delicious.
Delicious food. Great service. Our waiter Marko was excellent! I had the sea bass (so good) and my bf had the lamb (also good). Of course the views were great. Highly recommend!

A delicious lunch in a beautiful setting. Marco our waiter was so helpful and charming. 
It is definitely worth staying and enjoying the view.

Fantastic food and beautiful location! Everything was perfect and the food was delicious! The staff were so kind and thoughtful, love that they had blankets on the chairs for when the sun went down and they came round with heaters! Perfect for people like me who feel the cold very easily! There was so much choice with food, it was amazing I would definitely go again; we were there for sunset and the table layout gives everyone a brilliant view no matter where you are sat.

Additional great experience; there’s a cat up there that was really lovely and friendly

We had a reservation on 4/9/2024 at 6:30 p.m. for a couple of months in the front row. When we arrived at the restaurant, at the indicated time, exactly 6:30 p.m., we were assigned table 13 and when the girl served us, she deleted that table and put us at table 32. (We don't know why)

Once there the waiter took our order around 6:40 p.m.
Around 6:50 p.m. they brought us drinks.
and until 7:31 p.m. they didn't bring us the 3 dishes we ordered.
Which one of them was a lettuce salad, which apparently they went to look for it in the garden, because an hour to serve a salad is a duty court.

We told the waiter that the service was very bad and slow, he replied that it was because they had large groups.
Which was a lie because the two large groups that arrived sat down around 7:15 p.m. and were served 5 minutes later than us.
When we asked for the bill, we saw that the waiter gave us a discount of €7.86 and told us that with that it was already solved. We did not want any discounts, but better service, because what had to be a romantic and unforgettable evening, turned into a nightmare due to the terrible service of the waiter and the initial attention. And to top it off, when we were leaving, we told the waiter that it was a disaster of attention and service, the phenomenon told us that it was the kitchen's fault, when he is responsible for putting pressure on the kitchen if he sees that it took an hour for us to wait. that they serve us the dishes and even more so when tables that arrived just 5 minutes after us, had already finished dinner when they had not even served us.

The truth is that the food is great and the views are brutal. But waiter Robert's service was terrible and without the slightest interest in making his customers feel well cared for.

The Panorama Restaurant & Bar is high above the rooftops of Dubrovnik and can be reached by gondola. A breathtakingly beautiful view awaits you in a beautiful, well-kept, upscale ambience. 
Everything there is wonderfully relaxed, friendly, attentive and delicious! 
We first just had a drink and then decided to have lunch. That was definitely the right decision!

There are two other restaurants: The Gradska Havanna Arsenal Restaurant, which is slightly elevated towards the harbor and impossible to miss. 

And the Restaurant & Cafe Dubravka 1836, right at the entrance to the old town.

That's where the buses stop. 

In all three restaurants you can expect an upscale ambience, delicious food and pleasant service.

This restaraunt is ,,must see in Dubrovnik,,..and really worth it ! Wiev is spectacular and servis is also perfect. Specially thank you to waiter Robert … he was so nice, helpfull :) . Thank you Robert :)

We were not able to get an outdoor table. We were sad until
We met our waiter inside, he was amazing. The food, drinks and ambiance was amazing!

I mixed up with the reservation .. they found us a table even if it was full.
The service was fun, beautiful view and god food. What else do you need ?
Such a beautiful place for morning coffee, cake and the most amazing views!! Robert, our waiter was fabulous and looked after us so well. Definitely worth a visit ⭐️

Take the cable car (leaves every 10 mins from near the Old Town) up and treat yourself to the best panoramic views! Reserve a table online to get the best seats. Pretty extensive menu and delicious offerings. Really enjoyed the pasta dish with pine nuts and slightly spicy tomato sauce, as well as the burrata appetizer. Focaccia bread was delicious. Good coffee drinks and service. Nice hiking, zip lining, a museum about the Yugoslav War, and jeep/ATV-like activities at the top of the mountain, as well. Very enjoyable experience!

Such an amazing location with an uninterrupted view of the old town if you book on the front row terrace. It's 27 euro return by cable car to get there but you can also walk. Service was great and the food very tasty.
Super attention from the waiter Roberto and a spectacular view, highly recommended for those who want to have a good experience and enjoy a good dish

This restaurant provides beautiful views across Dubrovnik.
The food and service were superb and the menu was reasonably priced based on the location.
We took the cable car to and from and were earlier than our reservation time and the staff were accommodating and seated us ahead of schedule, despite it being quite busy.
Booking in advance is worthwhile for this must do experience.

You pay a premium to eat & drink here but I didn't think it was excessive given the amazing views. Service was good, we pre booked & arrived a little early & they accommodated us but probably couldn't do this in high season. It's a popular place & the food was very tasty. A real must do when in dubrovnik. Top tip: vist the homeland war museum next door just 5 euros entry.

The staff and experience at panorama restaurant was incredible. 
We have had a great last night in Dubrovnik - beautiful view, amazing food (fresh fish, too) and an excellent ambience. 
We will surely come back. 
Thank you, Panorama Team!

If you can, take the walk up the there. It is stunning. I took us 1 h to get there.
Can use cable car, but if windy, it does not work.
There is a bus 17 that will bring you closer but you will have to walk for 20 min up the hill. However, the bus does not operate on weekends and Bank Holidays. 
The restorant is overpriced. 17 eur for margarita...

Our first night in Dubrovnik. We had reserved table about 3 months in advance. We took the cable car up. Our meal was artistic and delicious. The view was beautiful. After our meal we walked around and then made our way down the trail following the stations of the cross just at sunset. The weather was perfect was a spectacular sunset.
Excellent service with good selection of food!! The view is perfect for people want to have a greater look of the old city! Highly recommended!
Beautiful place, staff, food and cocktails! The view of the old center of Dubrovnik is a unique experience! A place that must be visited when coming to Dubrovnik!
One of the best lunches and cocktails we’ve ever had! The wait staff were so kind throughout our visit. The views were amazing!

The perfect spot to catch a stunning sunset over Dubrovnik’s coastline. We went mainly for the beautiful views but the food certainly matched up too. We had a couple of cocktails which were delicious, well made from fresh ingredients, not just cheap syrups like some other places. We had the pork dish and it exceeded our expectations, the garlic mushroom side dish was amazing too! I would recommend booking in advance as it does get busy here and it can take a little time to get up and down in a taxi as the roads are so narrow, so allow plenty of time. It’s on the pricey side but I feel like Dubrovnik wasn’t particularly cheap anywhere that we visited. It’s perfect for a special occasion and it was one of our highlights of the trip. It is possible to just go for a drink at sunset too, so I would recommend this if you didn’t fancy food. Although the food was worth it!
Spacious atmosphere, beautiful view, well-trained staff and delicious food, especially the tilapia with canasta cheese.

Yes, the cable car isn't cheap, and yes, the food and adult beverage isn't cheap, but where else.would you get to sit and view a city from above whilst drinking a long island ice tea. We had reserved a second row table, but they put us on the front row
 Amazing view and the food/service was excellent. A must do in dubrovnik.

Excellent choice in every possible way. Very good menu, not easy to choose a reasonable amount of food. Absolutely delicious and well presented food, big portions. Nice service. Beautiful place with a lovely view. Very nice atmosphere.

Visited mid October for lunch and was highlight of visit to Croatia! A visit to the Panoramic restaurant whilst in Dubrovnik is a must due to the amazing view, fabulous service and great food and drinks. I booked a table for the front row but had to move back a few hours which the restaurant accommodated straight away. The view from the table was magical and was an experience thst will stay with me.

Ordered the foccacia selection and burrata to start (both wonderful) then the ham/cheese toastie which was like a 5* toastie! Strawberry frozen daiquiri was one of the best had also. On top of the fabulous meal, service was wonderful and attentive. I would visit the area again just to be able to eat at the Panoramic restaurant again which puts other restaurants at higher price points to shame. Well done to all staff! You should be very proud.

Stopped for a drink and snack. Great setting, service was great and they offered blankets as it was windier and chillier up at the top. 

Cocktails were great. I love espresso martini and theirs gives my top one a run for their money.

We visited for an evening meal in August, we booked a front row table and the views were absolutely stunning despite it being dark. The food was delicious and service was fantastic. We got a cab there & back it was a fabulous evening spent in a lovely restaurant

We had a lovely visit. In addition to a very beautiful views that can be seen from the restaurant, customer service was good and waiters were friendly. Food was delicious and cocktails were amazing. I recommend to visit!

Placed at the panoramic window, it was a very pleasant lunch with a view of the old town. The other major asset of this restaurant is the service: fast and courteous. The calm atmosphere inside contrasted with the excitement outside and the heavy traffic getting there on this sunny Sunday. A welcome gourmet touch to end my weekend in Croatia!

We are here on our first night in Dubrovnik and the food was unmatched on the rest of our four day break. Staff are attentive and friendly and the food is utterly delicious. Views are incredible and worth visiting the restaurant for alone but the chance to eat cliffside was incredible. A wonderful start to our honeymoon and the little touches like blankets to keep you warm in the winds (if they pick up) or patio heaters are perfect. We ate at 5:30 and enjoyed a spectacular sunset over the city.

VERY deceiving. I booked a table as a surprise, months in advance, outside on the terrace to celebrate a special birthday. The images on the website are not an accurate portrayal of the quality, location or ambiance - the dining area is incredibly casual, as is the majority of Dubrovnik (everyone was in trainers/ some were in sports wear). I must admit it didn’t help that we were moved inside due to poor weather conditions - I can imagine it to be a beautiful location in the summer months. Overall, the food was delicious and the staff were friendly but I would personally not recommend this restaurant out of season, especially if you have to sit inside - it’s nothing like you would expect from the website.

Amazing views fabulous food and made even more special by the waiter who moved us to a table at the edge with the best views of the harbour for our second course.
Couldn’t fault anything about this visit so book up early as it is a wonderful experience for a romantic dinner

Omg the best view in Dubrovnik, beautiful view, excellent food and great cocktails service was excellent, we don’t have reservations but they were able to acomódate a table for us woth a beautiful view.

Wow wow wow ! 
Can’t fault the service, the views and the food. All round brilliant.
Cable cars weren’t on due to the wind so we drove up (takes approx 15 mins drive). It’s quite tight but absolutely do-able. 
Worth a visit!

BREATH TAKING VIEWS. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS RESTAURANT. THE SERVICE WAS IMPECCABLE AND WE GOT TREATED LIKE QUEENS. 

Driving up was really fun. I would have really enjoyed the cable car instead. However, my friends were scared. We were warmly welcomed even though we were running late. The FOH was lovely and showed us to our table. We had heaters and blankets to keep us warm. Our drinks came on time.amd our order was taken swiftly. I can't fault the food one bit. My salmon dish was delicious, and a few ladies ordered lamp chops and steak, which they all thoroughly enjoyed. 

We also got a celebration sweet brandy on the house and a slice of cheesecake birthday sparkle for the birthday girl. Thanks to our waiter, who did an excellent job. 

Hopefully, we meet again.

Having read about Panorama restaurant on a Dubrovnik Facebook group, I was desperate to visit during our Dubrovnik trip. I had booked the table around 4 months in advance to ensure we’d be there at sunset. 
We took the cable car up - luckily we allowed plenty of time because it was busy with sunset viewers - a quick, less than ten minutes ride and great views. 
Panorama is a beautiful restaurant. Obviously great views but also a lovely ambience and excellent service. 
And on top of that the food was delicious. 
It wasn’t a cheap meal/evening but it was very well worth it. 
The only fault I have with the restaurant is that there are no vegan dishes on the menu. My friend had grilled vegetables and fries and she said they were also delicious.

First of all, this one of the most STUNNING place I’ve been to and I’ve traveled to over 40 countries. We took cable car up to the top and had reservations for 5:30pm to catch the sunset, and let me tell you… it was unreal! Ivan was our server and he made some fantastic suggestions. We tried so many new things on the menu like the octopus carpaccio - wow. Some of the best service I’ve ever had and could not recommend this place enough! It is so romantic but also an amazing place for any celebrations! We will definitely be back! Hvala vam!

Views to die for! Delicious food, even better wine - you must take the cable car to the top and visit this place and walk around the ruins and the museum. So much history up here, the best photo opportunities and views of the adriatic and nearby islands. Stunning!
Book at Sunset and make reservations in advance. Ask for a terrace table. View and the food both excellent! Exceptional experience. Can provide gf options
A small(ish) wonder with full view of Dubrovnik from Mount SRD the view is definitely worth it and the location is fabulous.

What an incredible memory!! I booked this restaurant for our anniversary dinner many months in advanced and asked for the best possible table. They did NOT disappoint!! Everything about this experience was fantastic, from service - big shout out to Tiho (hope I got that right), to wonderful cocktails and wine and excellent food. So fresh with enticing presentation. And of course THE VIEW..man oh man the VIEW! Got there to watch the sunset….breathtaking. Perfect romantic anniversary. Thank you Tiho and Panorama staff…what a night!!!!

We made a last minute booking a few days prior to our visit & were advised that we would be sat on the left of the restaurant with minimal views, which was fine, however, upon arrival the staff went above & beyond to seat us at a table with better views, we were so grateful for their kindness! We were in awe of the views, they are truly breathtaking! The food & wine were all excellent quality, my only feedback is that a Vegetarian main course would be beneficial, however, I ordered a vegetarian risotto starter & a side of rosemary potatoes & found that it was more than enough food!

Our server, Pero, provided the best service, they were attentive & professional & happy to take photos for us throughout the evening! They even invited us to be seated on the front row tables when they became available later in the evening, to enjoy some complimentary liqueurs! This made our evening so special & we will always remember the kindness of Pero & the rest of the staff here at Panorama. We will most definitely return next time we visit Dubrovnik!

Absolutely fantastic restaurant! Could not fault it! Booked cable car and restaurant in advance of visit to Dubrovnik and so thrilled we experienced this! 

Beautiful setting (name speaks for itself)! Quality of food was exceptional! We both had Pumpkin Soup to start, I had a beautifully cooked Salmon Fillet on a bed of puréed potato with a caper sauce which was divine! My husband had the Chicken which he raved about also! 

The staff were very attentive and polite and we didn’t have to wait too long for our meals!

Would highly recommend if you are visiting Dubrovnik! Book a seat near the front! Scenery is incredible! 

Great place for a special occasion!
The best view of the old town, but you certainly pay for it. Very friendly and helpful staff. Coffee was €6 . It’s probably something you should do while in Dubrovnik just for the view.

What a fantastic view with staff so friendly and accommodating we couldn’t have been more delighted. When our hotel booked we were informed we would be on the side with limited views. When we arrived they advised they had kindly moved us to a well positioned table on second row. Wow what a view. The starters were amazing my wife had Burata and I had the beef. Both first class. After starters they asked if we would like to move to better seat being right at front which we did. Amazing service. We both went for prawns which were very good. We highly recommend this restaurant for views, food and service a must visit!!

Everything in Panorama restaurant is just perfect! Delicious food, breathtaking wiews, stylish drinks, athmosphere, they even take care of not beeing too cold in the evening - with coats. But the total good impact is made by employee - we missed the reservation with another restaurant but the general manager was so kind and find for us table anyway - in first row, uauuu! Big thanks also for waiter Vaso, he is excellent too! We will be back soon!

What can I say, simply Spectacular! Booked a table here for lunch months ago & and I'm so glad I did. The view is amazing, however the staff are just as amazing, and the food is worth every cent. Yes, it's expensive, but you will never be in the same place, at the same time... worth every cent

By shear luck, my wife and I managed to get a table without a reservation when we did the cable car trip. The views were amazing, the sun set whilst we were there, and the food matched it. We had the Sea Bass and the Salmon accompanied by a lovely local white wine. Both dishes were delicious. This was the best meal of our stay in Dubrovnik. I'd thoroughly recommend The Panorama Restaurant.

Amazingly delicious lunch. We had beef capacio and Burrata for starters and the squid and pork chop as mains. All were prepared to a very high standard in terms of texture and taste. The view , of course, was stunning, as we got a front row table (have to book in advance). Staff were friendly and service was prompt. In short， a great experience .
A very nice sight. Good service, good drinks, normal food. It is worth visiting for the view and the place, but the food is a must.

Stunning location. We dined as the sun set Must be one of the best dining experiences in the world. Delicious food, attentive and knowledgable staff. 
Yes it’s pricy but the experience is second to none and would not hesitate to go again. Thank you Restaurant Panorama.

I selected this restaurant the night before our cruise with 10 friends from all over meeting up. I wanted something special and Panorama won due to views and great reviews. Since this is a very touristy restaurant, my expectations for food originality and quality were not very high. Panorama exceeded expectations with their outstanding cocktails and food preparation and presentation. They do not rely solely on their views, which are outstanding. Yes it is pricey, but to treat yourself it is well worth it!

Fantastic service & views - a Romantic setting - recommend late night visit
The cable car is very convenient, and it’s walking distance from the old town of Dubrovnik

There can’t be many places on earth with a better view whilst eating lunch can there? 
I had booked this a month in advance to request a table in the front row closest to the edge for uninterrupted views and I’m glad I did as the views were stunning!
The food was just as good and the service even better. They had so many great sounding cocktails that it was hard to choose so we decided to sample a few.
We used the cable car to get to and from the restaurant which added to the experience. 
It’s not a cheap lunch time treat but if like us you are celebrating something special then it’s perfect.

Of course, here's a more polished version of the review:

A delightful dining experience with a picturesque sea view! I would wholeheartedly give this restaurant a 5-star rating, as it exceeded our expectations in every way. Despite not having a reservation, we were promptly seated by the sea, where we enjoyed an exquisite meal. Our server, Vedran (apologies if I've misspelled his name), went above and beyond to ensure our comfort, especially considering my pregnant wife. We look forward to returning in the future; our entire experience was truly exceptional. Many thanks to Vedran and the entire team for making our visit memorable.
Went there for drinks with amazing views of Dubrovnik old town and surrounding, great service and friendly staff. Highly recommended

As stated in the subject I came here because of the amazing view I seen on the pictures and it was really stunning. The food and drink I had was really tasty too and staff very friendly and service-minded. 
Would certainly recommend this place.
Very good attention from waiter, very good view. Nice Food , little bit too overdecorated. The prices corresponds to the offer.

Panorama Restaurant in Dubrovnik is at the top of the hill where the cable bars depart from daily. Normally I would consider that restaurant a tourist trap but instead it is fine dining at its best. Starting with the wine, with a nice selection, then the bread we ordered with some tasty olive oil we knew we were going to enjoy this meal. Two of us got the daily chicken and vegetable soup which was loaded with flavor. My girlfriend and I each ordered a dish and split them so we could taste two dishes. We got Risotto w/shrimps & courgettes and Sea Bass Fillet. My husband got the Dubrovnik Style Cutlet (Pork Chop) and her husband got the Sea Bass as well. The presentation was gorgeous and the flavors were amazing. Then we split a cream caramel, which is similar to a flan with yummy cream. The presentation was eye catching. And everything on that plate had a purpose. The sauces definitely complimented the dishes. My hat is off to the chef/assistant chefs. They did an excellent job of preparation and presentation

Our server was outstanding. He anticipated our every need. The manager was going to seat us outside but the wind was picking up so he gave us a great seat by the window. He is a good friend of our driver so I am sure that helped.

The views are stunning! You can see the huge entire walled city. The restaurant itself is very stylish and reeks elegant dining. We are so glad we had the opportunity to dine at this restaurant. We are giving it five stars. There was nothing they could have done any better. BTW, reservations suggested or you might not get a table.

beautiful, good food, good service. Must do when in Dubrovnik. I got there just before the crowds in early evening, but was there for the sunset. At that time the cable car and the restaurant were not crowded at all

Wow wow wow!!!! I was nervous that this restaurant would be too touristy but it was hands down the best. Book for 6pm (book FAR in advance) in the front row. The views were amazing and the service was 10/10. Great experience!

I made a reservation 3 months before our trip. I initially reserved a table for dinner, but they kindly wrote me stating that only the first row of tables has the "full view." They then offered me first row for a late lunch, and I immediately changed my reservation. First of all, the VIEWS are amazing up there! Even if you aren't first row, you'd have nice views and is still worth going. We had this amazing first row corner table with the best views in the place. From the reviews people said the food was really good too and it's true! The food and service are top! It's nice to see that a restaurant in such a great location backs it up with food and service! It isn't cheap and once you ad in the cost of the cable car to get up there but it is worth it! I must say the mojitos were maybe the best we've ever had! The late lunch actually worked out really well too as after that we hung around up on the hill for sunset which was magical. Make the reservation and make it fast and with plenty of notice!

A restaurant with such a unique location that you don't want to miss having a dinner there. The service is excellent, the food and drinks are really good but in my opinion the price performance ratio is off. 
The get to the restaurant you have to take a taxi or the cable car. Taxi's from the old town have put their rate for the short ride at the same as 2 persons in the cable car: 55 euro.
So before you get there, that's the first part of your bill. The rates for appetizers, main dish, dessert are the same high levels as in the old town (overpriced) and the drinks prices are excessive. 
But then, the view is unbeatable. So all in all a very nice experience but be ready to pay the price.

A wonderful treat after ascending in the rather expensive cable car. The views from the restaurant are fantastic. The staff were extremely professional dealing with the large numbers of people who wish to add to their experience by dining in the restaurant. The menu choices were a little limited we both had cheeseburgers. When my wife discovered that hers was not cooked properly to her liking it was replaced with another dish and she was not charged. Very impressed by how it so wonderfully handled.

We are here on the 26th of August after reading many reviews and have to say we really enjoyed the whole experience 👌 We were lucky enough to be able to book a front row table and wow what a view. Our server was so helpful and attentive but equally allowing us to enjoy. We had a lovely bottle of local wine with our meal which was also superb, Sea Bass and the Beef Fillet👌👌No sweets but a cocktail to finish it off. Cheers Panorama restaurant and bar 👏👏
The view was unbelievable. Food was incredible, the service was 5 star! Couldn’t recommend it highly enough! But definitely book ahead as it’s so sought after

One of the highlights of an amazing trip to Dubrovnik. The views from The Panorama were amazing, as was the food and the service.

We had to book about a month in advance (online) to secure a lunch reservation (no evenings available) so book ahead.

The menus are great, something for a lighter lunch and also dinner which was perfect for us as with two fussy teenagers we were finding it hard to keep them happy.

We went for the chicken burgers and sweet potato fries, the beefburger (served plain with no salad as requested) and the risotto. All were fresh and tasty - portions were just right and it was served beautifully. As was the service - not too slow, but leaving us enough time to enjoy our view (dining slots are for 2 hours) and more than happy to take pictures for us. Our lunch for 4 plus bread, two cocktails and two beers came to 162 Euros. We'd paid almost as much for ordinary meals in the town.

Don't be put off by the price of the cable car which is 38 euros each return. You don't have to use it to get to the restaurant. On the morning that we went it was windy so the cable car was closed. We got an uber from Babin Kuk costing 22 euros for all of us and then got the cable car down when it opened later for 60 euros total. Best of both worlds!

Don't miss the Panorama - you'll feel like you're on top of the world.
A meal with a view, fantastic food, professional service, an experience of a life time, definitely recommend a must of in Dubrovnik

What can I say Spectacular. Down to the view, the food and the staff was a 15 out of 10 We were an 1.5 hours early and they were booked out but managed to have us seated within 20 minutes Where to begin with the food. Beautifully presented delicious, fresh and considered fine foods Started with beef carpaccio, perfect. Sea bass as a main again perfect and as we couldn’t decide on the dessert we shared crème caramel and chocolate cup with icecream. Again perfect. Our waiter was charming and ensured everything was to perfection Do yourself a favor and book this one in. Is definitely our favorite restaurant we have been to since we have been in Europe

This restaurant was highly recommended for its views of Dubrivnik and great food. 

The Cable Car up to the restaurant was a bit pricey at 47€ for two adult returns, and for a three minute journey time. 

Terraced seating outside but under cover and does offer fantastic views before sunset, and the restaurant thoughtfully provides fleecy blankets.  The food was amazing, particularly the chicken with sage sauce.
No time for lunch, but did stay for a Beer & Cocktail. Magical setting, worthy of spending hours just looking at the most fantastic view.

Phenomenal meal. They did a great job of presentation and the customer service was great. I got the seabass and the combination of everything on the plate really accommodated the fish perfectly, the chef did a great job!
Food & drinks were perfect. The view is outstanding make sure to book to her the perfect table. I recommend the evening as it feels extra special. Vedran our waiter so kind and helpful.

Great! The best experience in Dubrovnik. Beautiful sunset with great cocktails. Great service, waiters very friendly! Food was great and the portions were big. Delicious dessert :) If I had to criticize one thing, it would be the limited selection of vegetarian/vegan dishes.

What a setting, magnificent view. 
We just had a bottle of rosé and some light bites but it was so worth the visit. Staff were lovely and eventhough we hadn’t booked they fitted us in.
After our walking tour and lunch in Old Town, we walked up the stairs to take the cable car. We had a very tasty afternoon cocktail here and enjoyed the service, as well as the spectacular view.

Superb dinner experience. Location is amazing, so too was our meal and the service. Couldn’t fault anything. Sea bass was perfectly prepared, veal risotto was spectacular and the beef steak, impeccable! Cable car ride was pricey but pretty cool way to get to the venue.

this restaurant was excellent..the food is great but the service was even better.
we got there at 6 had drinks had starters then supper even had dessert.
all this while watching the sunset just excellent.
the place is beautiful.
they ev gave us à porto on the house.
thanks for a great night.
Beautiful setting and fantastic service. Blaz was an amazing waiter. We would love to come back one day :)

Perfect view and great food! We had booked a table as we knew we would be in Dubrovnik today and it exceeded expectations! We arrived earlier (we drove up the mountain which is beautiful if you have enough guts to try it) and were allowed to have our table earlier including an upgrade to the first row which was a lovely surprise on our final day of holiday before going to the airport. The service was second to none. Beware, wasps are a plenty and one went straight into my drink as soon as I got it. The restaurant were long enough to give me another. When our food arrived we did have a few wasps around so we asked if we could move inside to finish our food which was no problem for the waiter who carried our food up every single step (we did offer to help!) which made the experience so seamless. I would definitely recommend this place and thank you to those who served us today 🫶

We had a delicious dinner at this spectacular restaurant overlooking the magnificent old town of Dubrovnik and glittering blue Adriatic Sea. Book early! The restaurant has wonderful inside and outdoor tables.

Cable car wasn’t running. Restaurant advised us to get a taxi, which we did. The wind was so strong when we arrived at the restaurant that we and several other guests felt the restaurant should have cancelled our bookings. We were shown to our table and could hear guests complaining. The staff were trying their best, but it was a very unpleasant situation. Glasses were smashed and were blown over on the tables. The food was lovely but due to the strong unbearable cold wind it went cold after a few minutes. We asked to be moved inside but we were told it was full inside. At the end of our meal, we asked again if we could be moved inside to have a drink so we could enjoy the view. Again we were told no. 
It was very cold and windy, staff put patio heaters on the terraces by the outside tables but after a few minutes they were all taken away because they were worried about the wind making them fall onto guests. Why wasn’t the outside restaurant closed??

Everything about this restaurant is 1st class, The food, drinks staff and of course the magical view of the walled city.

We were a party of 4 and had a wonderful experience
Marco was amazing! Our trip to the restaurant was fantastic, we got engaged this night and they made us feel so special! The food recommendations were fantastic!
Excellent view, great food, and our waiter Marco was amazing as well. Highly recommend coming here.

Took the cable car up to see the view and try our chances at Panorama restaurant. They are fully booked at least a year in advance, so the locals recommend just trying your chances in case people don’t show up. We went around 4:30 and got lucky, since it was an odd time between lunch and dinner. The staff was awesome and told us we could eat as long as we were out by the next reservation for that was at 6pm, so that was perfect for us. We had a beautiful table right next to the railing, shared a steak sandwich (delicious!), and espresso martinis. The server was great and offered to take some photos of us since we told him we were on our honeymoon. Highly recommended! They have a 10% discount card they honor if you dine at any of their 3 restaurants, so make sure you ask for one if you don’t have it!

Beautiful scenery. Lovely service. Delicious meal. Worth the trip! Mobility disability note: although there is an elevator to the restaurant, there are many concrete stairs and no railing to get to the outdoor seating area and then many uneven, stone stairs in the terraced restaurant area. Also, the turnstiles to get into the cable car area are not disability-friendly. They can, and should, do better.

Although the cable car up to the restaurant is €27 return per person do not be put off. Book a table way before travelling to avoid disappointment and request front row and you will be overlooking the sea. We went for late lunch and it was the most beautiful place with breathtaking views. Food was not fancy but very tasty. We had a burger and fries and salad and fries wine and beers and it cost €80. Staff as anywhere in Dubrovnik were so nice and no rush. We were given 2 hours for our table.

Great restaurant with super food and staff are excellent. I had tried to book this restaurant 3wks before we went and it was completely booked. We took a chance and went early and they got us a table. It was our last night in Dubrovnik and it was a perfect end to a fantastic week.
You can’t go to Dubrovnik without coming here. Views are impeccable. We had the lamb ragu pasta for an app and pork chop for dinner. Both dishes were packed with flavor and absolutely delicious

Excellent service with views to die for. 
No hefty service charge although of course built into the menu price we found the price to be right for the experience we had.

The most beautiful setting for a restaurant I have ever experienced. Great food, expensive but you are paying for the views. Our waiter, Blac, was so friendly and really attentive. We hope to come back at some point!

We placed a reservation 4 months in advance and still could only get a lunch time spot albeit front row terrace which was an amazing spot .
Service was great , food was great and so were the wine and cocktails .
Wasps were a bit of a nuisance though .
It’s also an expensive treat as you need an Uber or cable car to get there .
The food was not cheap but you get what you pay for and my sea food linguine was sooo good .

We came for dinner, originally we had an outside seat for the view but due to weather we were moved inside. The staff went above to try and find us a table with a view and they did! They even gave us 10% discount as an apology.

Food was fabulous during the evening and love it however, unfortunately the food wasnt great the next day. I woke up in the early hours with food poisoning and my boyfriend was struck by food poisoning in the morning.
Ivan was wonderful. Dinner was fantastic. View was memorable. Would recommend getting reservations early on in the planning. But fantastic

The restaurant does what it says on the tin. It gives you panoramic views of the old town of Dubrovnik. The Adriatic sea and the mountains of Bosnia. The food is amazing though a bit pricey but I suppose they have to cover it's transportation. We were served by Vedran and Joseph which are amazing
We arrived early and had a seat straight away. Blaz and the team were excellent. Steak was sensational. Views immaculate. Highly recommend.

Beautiful restaurant overlooking Dubrovnik. You will not be disappointed as it’s the most stunning view. Book in advance for the best seats and time you want as the restaurant does get booked up fast. I booked this for my partners 30th birthday and it was just perfect! The service was amazing from the whole team and the food was lovely. Special thank you to Vedran for looking after us and ensuring we had a great night, nothing was ever too much!

This was a surprise birthday meal for my boyfriend. What an amazing evening we had! Food was delicious, views were amazing and the service was excellent! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for somewhere special to eat!
An absolutely amazing place! Food was excellent and views at night breathtaking! Customer service was at a highest standard! Highly recommend! Thank you for an unforgettable experience!

Such a wonderful experience at Panorama. After slight mishap with the reservation on our part, the team were great at finding us a beautiful table with a view at sunset. Service throughout was great, food fantastic and great memories for us to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Risotto especially highly recommended! Thanks all at Panorama. A must visit in Dubrovnik.

We had an excellent lunch at Panorama Restaurant. The view by the cliff edge was spectacular. We enjoyed beef carpaccio appetizer followed by Cesar salads, and seared tuna.
The local Croatian Chardonnay was excellent… mineral, dry, and chilled perfectly. Service was attentive and professional.

What an experience we had . The service and food what so so good 
We shared the cheese board to start then 2 pasta dishes . They were classed as starters but was more than enough . 
If you’re in the area you’ve got to visit this place . The views over the old town are beautiful. Big thanks to our waiter Tony you were amazing and made our visit special x
If you are lucky enough to have a table, GO FOR IT. This place is just magical!!! Very friendly and professional service, excellent food, very good cocktails. The view is just crazy

Took the cable car up and arrived shortly before lunchtime so were lucky to get a table and very glad we did as the views are amazing, the food is delicious and the service attentive. Everything about our lunch here was perfect.
A magical place! The staff is very welcoming, a breathtaking view of the islands, we ate fish or meat very well, the whole family had a great time. A place not to be missed.

The restaurant was absolutely stunning the views and the aesthetics were gorgeous the food was exquisite but the best part was Vedrans service he was so kind and attentive to our needs, suggested the best wine and dishes he is an absolute treasure
Vedran was our host for the night, and he was amazing! Excellent service and so professional, food was great and view is breathtaking <3 thank you Vedran for the best suggestions and being so nice!

Excellent service from our server Tony
Who was in our care and very good advice for our pleasures!!!!!!!!!!!
Thanks Tony
The service was very competent and very pleasant by Tony. The meal is worthy of the view over Dubrovnik.

The most stunning view in Dubrovnik! We booked here for lunch for our anniversary and it really was very special. We got the cable car up & The views were incredible, we had a beautiful front row table (definitely book in advance for this) lunch and drinks were amazing.
Food was incredible and view was even better. Service from Vedran was excellent. He was so attentive and friendly. Would highly recommend!
Amazing food matched only by the amazing views. Our waiter Marco was very helpful explaining the menu to us fully.
The view is spectacular and the food and service were amazing. Our waiter Marko was really friendly and welcoming!

Nice spot,view and ambience is great.
Food is also good althought not superb which is quite fair considering how large the space is.

Service was impeccable,thank you Stipe for attending us.

Certaintly,if you are 2 or 3 days in Dubrovnik this spot is hard to skip since it offers most spectacular view.

In general,very fair.

Gorgeous views here! Make sure to make a reservation for a terrace front row seat and to come at sunset.

Our server Marko was great too, vibes here are immaculate.

We had a lovely time at Panorama ! We were able to get a table quickly and had lovely cocktails. We tried the strawberry kiss and the G&T and they were both amazing. Marco was very helpful and made sure we were looked after. Recommend going during sunset.
Stunning restaurant, with great views of the city. Marko was particularly helpful and accommodating.
Beautiful spot with great views and service especially Marko who was very accommodating and friendly!
Fantastic place, beautiful view, great service and amazing food. Perfect for a date, engagement, wedding anniversary or surprise

We had a 6pm booking, front row of the front terrace. The food was beautifully presented and tasted even better. The views were the most incredible we have ever had the pleasure to experience whilst dining. The icing on the cake was the wonderful and attentive service provided by our waiter, Marco. He is an absolute credit to the restaurant.
Marco was wonderful! Fabulous food, service and views. The sunset views were spectacular and we enjoyed how attentive Marco was to service.
Fantastic experience and the service from Peter was top class. Would recommend it for the views alone!
The view and the food were spectacular, but the service was even better. The staff are fantastic. Thank you

Today I was unpleasantly surprised when I arrived. We came with two small children and could not get a table inside, even though we emphasized that we would be there for a maximum of 30 minutes, because "the outside tables may move inside because of the wind". It is not the first time that we have been rejected as local people.

Fabulous view complimented with great food and service. Had dinner there last night - the octopus carpaccio and burrata starters were very tasty and enjoyed with an opening cocktail. For mains, our group had the linguini with shrimp and seashells (calms and mussels our night), sea bass, pasta, Dubrovnik Cutlet (very moist) and King Prawns. Everyone raved about their food. We watched the sun set overlooking Dubrovnik - a memorable night for all. Don’t miss it. Also great for couples looking for a romantic evening

The restaurant was beautiful with quite the service, but getting there was quite a journey because of our 50cc scooter. Our waiter was quick to respond to questions and knew his stuff.
The food was also amazing and was put together in the most wonderful way.
Prices as you would expect for a luxury restaurant yet mostly affordable.
Really nice meal and view. Service was lovely. If I’m really honest probably a bit hyped up. We have had meals at other restaurants just as nice. But lovely for a special occasion.

Great place with wonderful view of the old city of Dubrovnik

Friendly and caring team

We only had a drink with my friend because we went there in the middle of the afternoon

Exceptional views, good food but pricey for what was served. Would we come again? For drinks yes, for food , sadly not. 
They did however give us a table inside by the window despite being fully booked until the end of September. They take walk ins for outside whilst you queue, which looks great because you have the views! Free brandy at the end of the meal… if you like Brandy !
Beautiful views, beautiful atmosphere, beautiful service. 10/10 recommend for anyone looking for an unforgettable dining experience. Will definitely be back.

The views are gorgeous, a must do if you are in Dubrovnik. It is quite pricy, but I had a soft drink and it was totally worthy. I went in the morning, 9am, so it wasn't too busy and got a table with the best view of the Old Town. Strongly recommend you to make a reservation otherwise.
The service is excellent, very attentive and friendly, fast with the orders. I really enjoyed it 😀
I also went to the Museum of War, which is interesting as well.

I booked panorama for my fiancés 40th birthday celebrations and it didn’t disappoint. The views were amazing and the food and wine was delicious. Waiter for lovely and captured some lovely photos. We didn’t do the cable car up but looked amazing too. Definitely a must in Dubrovnik
Very nice. Food is worse the prise. A view is gorgeous. We had a very good service, to wich thanks go to a our water Robert :)
We came at 19:00 and the sunset was breathtaking! Robert gave us the best service! Will come again!

Delicious meal with a beautiful view of Dubrovnik! I had booked a table for a front row seat a couple of months before as I’d heard the restaurant was very popular, I was at the front but I was quite high up so not exactly what I was expecting but I was 5 minutes late so maybe that could have been why. You could only book a table for the front row at 6.30pm or 9pm so just bear that in mind when booking. We got a taxi to the restaurant up some very windy roads, but it was the same price as the cable car so quite expensive to get there at around 40 euros round trip but the view is beautiful and the food lovely too. I had the orecchiette pasta which was classed as a starter but for 22 euros I assumed it would be a larger size but it was still pretty small but it was really delicious and my husband had the pork which was so tasty. We had bread to start, 2 wines, 2 mains, dessert and cocktail and beer to finish and it was just under 100 euros with the 10% discount from one of their sister restaurants which I didn’t think was too bad for the view, service and quality of the food.
I visited with a group of friends on Friday evening and the place is fantastic. It's not just about the superb views, the food is also superb!
Excellent food, outstanding service, magnificent views. What else can you ask for? We had the sea bass, pork chop and pasta with clams; all delicious! GO!

Absolutely wonderful evening. Our waiter Blaz was just fantastic and so attentive. The food was beautiful and the views were something else. The little touches like being bought blankets when it got a little chilly just shows the level of thought that goes in to looking after their guests. What a treat to end our wonderful holiday in Croatia. Thank you Panorama, we will definitely be back ♥️🇭🇷♥️

Wow! We couldn’t get in for a table in the evening so decided to head up there in the day by cable car. We had a light lunch. Steak sandwich and chicken burger. Latte and orange juice. Service was impeccable and view was just out of this world!. The cable car was expensive to get up there and back but we wanted to experience this restaurant and we loved it.

We were very luck to get a reservation at Panorama. The views from Mount Syrd are breathtaking and a must see. The food and service at the restaurant was also incredible and our dinner was incredible!
Fantastic place for a few drinks. Staff are super attentive and so refreshingly friendly. An absolute must.
Beautiful view and service, friendly staff and great service. Frozen Daiquiri to die for. Recommend the trip up the cable car for this.

A quick stop off here to take in the views after the cable car ride. The menu is extensive both for food and drinks - our visit was a flying one so we opted for cocktails and cakes … all of which was excellent, and made very memorable by the stunning views.

We are so blown away by Dubrovnik and the visit to Panorama at the top of the cable car was no exception!
Vaso was a wonderful and helpful host and shared information on the wines food and area! Highly recommend if you are in Dubrovnik 😊

The spot and the view were great. The waiter was really kind and helpful.
The staying in the restaurant has benne amazing!
Very good food and view. Ivan was very nice, great at dealing with allergies, and had great service all together.

What an amazing view 
Delicious dinner 
Extraordinary wine and great service made it all worth it 
Tino made sure to make my experience the best ! Thank you!
I just love the good food olso silvan and dieter greet us very well we love the way that we had there

The setting was wonderful, truly stunning view. We had a table booked at 1830 on the mountainside terrace, they said they wanted to upgrade us and offered us a front seat view of the city inside the restaurant, obviously we snapped their hand off at this. However when we were taken to our seat we were stunned with the massive metal bar that ran parallel with the window from the cable car, probably blocking 50% of our view. We asked to move a few tables along and we’re told they were reserved despite not having a reserve sign on, then to our annoyance another group asked to move to a similar table next to it and we’re told that it was ok…. The Food was excellent, really good quality and felt quite special to match the vie at every table but ours. The only reasonable priced thing on the menu was the bread which was actually really good for 3€. Now onto the service itself; the starter came out in quick time, was lovely and a good portion. The main however was a 45 minute wait….and only on prompting the wait staff (who completely ignored our table for the majority of the meal) did the food suddenly appear. With only two waiting staff for the entire inside restaurant, service was non existent. After trying to get their attention on numerous occasions, they bypassed us. Whenever they did come and take our drink order/ when we asked for the bill, they were completely distracted and took so long to get anything to us. 
The quality of the food brought back a little bit of credit to the restaurant, however the table service plus the blocked view left a bitter taste in our mouth (pun intended).

I visited today while traveling to celebrate my birthday.
The food was very delicious, and the staff was especially friendly. Thanks to you, I had the best birthday. Thank you so much to Claire Fontaine who was our server.
Among the menus, I recommend pork cutlets and white chocolate cake!
Much too loyal, a 0.2 Coke costs more than 7 euros and an ice cream chocolate almost 12 euros. The location can't justify the price either...

They received delicious food and nice service 
So I was having enjoy time with my friends
and Robert is very kind and nice server.
Thank you

Along with excellent food, we also had the most beautiful view of the city. I would like to thank our waiter Tihomir, who was very kind, and he recommended and presented the food to us superbly, I also thank the chefs who prepared the food superbly that we enjoyed. We ended the lunch with refreshing cocktails. I definitely recommend it to everyone who is in the vicinity.

Along with excellent food and excellent cocktails, the most beautiful view in the city also contributed.
Most of all, I have to praise the kindness and excellent service of the waiter Tihomir, who made our arrival great.

We had a 3.30pm booking and turned up quite early. We were allowed to be seated early and we was inside as the weather had been horrendous before we arrived. We were offered seats outside once the sun came out however, it was just as beautiful inside and the views were incredible from where we were seated. My Husband had the Steak and I had the Cheese Burger, the food and service were Superb and I would advise to book this purely for the experience alone. We had a Voucher for 10%. 
The Journey up by car was interesting to say the least, the cable also runs up to the restaurant if you don't fancy the car.
A candle was bought out with pudding for my Husbands Birthday which was lovely. We loved our meal. This is once in a lifetime restaurant experience and we highly recommend it!! The prices are reasonable, you would pay double in London for the same experience I'm sure.
My Booking was made over the phone. The Restaurant was showing as fully booked and I thought I would call in the hope of availability, It was worth the call.

Restaurant was good . Limited menu but food good though very expensive as paying for the view. Wasps everywhere which really spoiled our dinner and experience.
