Cable car 27 euros return so that was an added expense, better to get Uber if not bothered about cable car. In general Dubrovnik mega expensive!
Super view, nice service by our waiter Tony. Recommend. Be mindful make a reservation because it could be full.

We had a Wonderful time. Absolutely beautiful view, people and food. I cannot recommend enough. 5 star rating. Brac was our server for the night and he was top class. My mother in law was 60 and he made the night so special.

Enjoy your ride in the Gondola to reach this mountain top Gem.
Sunset is the best time to dine.
Old Town lights up and looks like a jewelry box.
The food and service was fantastic.

Lovely food and a great dinning experience. The menu has a couple of vegetarian options, but unfortunately no vegan options. However, the chef was kind enough to make me a vegan tomato pasta, which was lovely. The drinks were also very good.

Vedran offer us top notch service along with the full staff of servers despite the fact we had four children dining with us. The food, drinks and service were all very memorable! Typically restaurants in highly touristic areas are underwhelming but this was a pleasant surprise! Highly recommended for anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

Beautiful view and great food .
We could not take cable car because it was windy .
The problem was we had bees surrounding us and I am allergic . 
Otherwise wine and food and service was excellent .
Excellent spot for lunch with an amazing view of the sea and mountains. Robert was our waiter. Thank you!

Fantastic view, fantastic food, fantastic service! 
We were sat on the front row and quickly ordered our drinks. We had burrata to start which was spectacular. Our mains were also delicious!
Amazing view of Dubrovnik! Lovey food and enjoyable trip in the cable car up the mountain! Great customer service.
Amazing views of Dubrovnik old town, great food and excellent service from Tony. It is expensive but definitely worth a visit.

Sad to not have got a table for food but we were allowed to sit and have a drink which was good enough for me! My cocktail was amazing and very nice! The staff were also very friendly and very prompt, and of course, the views were incredible! Definitely worth the cable car up.

This place was amazing. We called here for breakfast, sunset would have been the first choice but it appears you need to book weeks in advance to get into this place. However luck was on our side as the forecast said there was rain due and when I re checked the booking schedule there was a breakfast availability that hadn’t been available prior. Although it didn’t rain, the cable car was closed due to wind which meant a taxi ride up to the restaurant which cost 20€. The prices were reasonable given the location and service, I would 100% recommend a visit, and if you book early enough then go up for sunset. We chose to walk back down which took around 40 mins, it was very scenic, not to steep but the ground is rough so I wouldn’t recommend flip flops.
Amazing food and service. The view was incredible! I really recommend visiting this restaurant when in Dubrovnik.
Robert was absolutely fabulous. He was attentive and extremely kind. The views were amazing and he made the experience fantastic.

Robert our waiter was amazing. He was so kind and gave great recommendations. The food was incredible. It has certainly been the highlight of our trip. The view was amazing and I could not recommend this place more for a romantic evening.

A must do experience. An amazing view of the whole town of Dubrovnik. We booked a front row table on the terrace in advance. The service and food was incredible. Petar our server was very attentive and friendly. We had beef steaks which were delicious, and finished off with a white chocolate almond cake which was amazing. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.
Top location, great food, cool drinks and good Croatian wine. Tihomir was a great waiter. It's expensive but worth the money.

Such an amazing experience. The cable car up, the view, the food - just the best. Our server, Robert, was hilarious and really took great care of us. If we come back to Croatia, we will definitely come back here.

Awesome view and very good service! Robert our waiter couldn't have been more welcoming. The complementary drink at the end went down well, and thank you for moving us to get a better view of Dubrovnik!

Above all expectations. The view was lovely, the atmosphere was calm and relaxed with perfectly calm music playing in the background.

The service was 10/10, our waiter Blaz made the experience unforgettable.

Last but not least, the food was fantastic as well!
Lovely food, great waiters and fantastic view! This was worth every penny! We will definitely be back next time we are in the area.
Cant describe how beautiful the view was, and with the delicious finner, the whole experience was perfect!

We were told not to miss going to restaurant Panorama by a Croatian friend in Australia and it did
not disappoint. Fabulous to look from our front row terraced table across Dubrovnik with a Birds Eye view of the walled city along with Lapad Bay and Mt Srd. Attentive and friendly staff ensure your every need is catered for and the menu and wine selections are excellent. A word of advice if you intend to eat here - don’t expect to walk in and get a terraced front row table - book well in advance - you won’t regret it 👌
This spot is excelent for all type of occasions, food is great, the view stunning and the service is professional. We are planning to visit the place again.
Lovely food and perfect view. Very friendly staff. We also got a free cherrybrendi. Highly recommended!

My partner and I both thoroughly enjoyed our meals. One of the best meals we have had. The views are absolutely stunning. 
Highly recommend booking a table.
This was an amazing restaurant! Marko our server was absolutely the best! Made us feel very special, the food, drinks and view were all top class! Highly recommended for your Croatian Trip

This is a once-in-a-lifetime meal if you’re a tourist like us. We took an Uber up and we’re glad to spend the same money on a 15-minute drive through the mountains. The reservations for lunch had been made by us months in advance for the front row. We were concerned as we got closer to our date because of the heat and the sun. Not to worry! Our front row table was pleasantly shaded by an oversized umbrella. There was also a lovely breeze and we never felt too hot, even though it was a hot July day. We both have fancy salads for lunch, with drinks. Our server was appropriately attentive and left us alone to appreciate our meal and our view. We thoroughly enjoyed the food and the location.
A gorgeous and lovely serving. Nice view, come before sunset! The cable cars up are quite expensive, but you can also take a cab
This was amazing! The food, The service was unbelivable!! So worth it -everyone should expirence this place!

Great view and amazing food. Thanks Ivo for our last evening in Dubrovnik! It was absolutely splendid. The recommendation for foccacia bread made it all stick together. Plava Malic is the wine to go ;)

With an outstanding view, we had a great dinner at panomramic restaurant.
The service was really good and the food was excellent.
A must when visiting Dubrovnik-Neretva e had a wonderful time, great service, beautiful views, fabulous experience!!!!

Stunning restaurant with beautiful views and fantastic food!! Ivo was a lovely waiter with great recommendations of food, highly recommend! You also get a 10% off card to use at their other restaurants

My husband and I were here for our 1 year anniversary. The website said it was it was fully booked for the day we were looking for however the restaurants booking agent was able to fit us in on the day we needed and OMG was it worth it! Marco was our server and made some amazing suggestions! 

Dubrovnik has been our most favourite destination from the ppl to the scenery
Great food, spectacular view and a wonderful waiter Toni! It was such a great ecperience having dinner at such a beautiful place with such great staff!
beautiful restaurant amazing views food was great team on site were lovely overall great experience
Amazing view with amazing food and beautiful cocktails. Perfect way to spend your birthday in Dubrovnik!
Amazing local food and fascinating views of the old town. Adriatic sea looks gorgeous in the summer. Service here is great and attentive. Overall 5 out of 5 stars.
Hiked up to the Panorama Restaurant. Beautiful views of the city, great food, yummy drinks, and excellent service by Robert.
We had a really lovely evening and our waiter Marko was wonderful. We really enjoyed the food and the view was breathtaking. Recommend!!

The view was wonderful. We booked this restaurant 2 months ago. We were seated quickly and drinks were ordered promptly. Food was delicious and service impeccable by Marko who was friendly, helpful and had a really gentle nature throughout the whole experience. Thank you!

Great place for romantic dinner for two. Book in advance to get best table and time it for sunset. Table service is very helpful. There are skilled in wasp killing and photo taking as well as serving food of course 😁 Highly recommended it.

Everything was amazing, the view the service and the food. 
Cheers to Marko our waiter, top tier 
Strongly recommend
The view and food was amazing. Marko and all the other staff were friendly and attentive. I will defintitly visit again thank you!
Great food and great views. Robert was fantastic. We loved our meals and would recommend to anyone visiting.
Good spot after a hike to get a bite! Great views! Would definitely recommend and come back in the future.
Fantastic location, excellent food and great service. Vedran and the team took excellent care of us and made sure we had an amazing evening. Thank you for the great evening!

This spot is great for a sunset dinner! The views are incredible, the staff are so accommodating, and the food is just divine! It was booked out for the whole week we were in Dubrovnik but a local taxi driver told us to go in and just try our luck - so we did and we got a table on a Thursday night right at 7:45pm prime sunset time! Nothing to fault about the restaurant and will most definitely come back

location: East Riding of Yorkshire, United Kingdom
review:
We had to get a Uber to the restaurant because the cable car was closed due to high winds, the table was ready early but they told us we would have to leave the 2 hours from when we sat down which was a little disappointing as I had booked especially to see the sunset.
All that aside the food was delicious, it got cold quickly but that was due to the wind I think.
Service was super! Worth the trip up!

Tino gave us a really good experience. Photo, advice on dishes, and the
 best conversation. 
With breathtaking views, the scallops and mussels are soooo fresh!
We are lucky enough to have the seaside place
Lovely restaurant, great views of the city below, atmosphere was very nice, food was excellent and the service was excellent also..Our lovely waiter Robert was very attentive.
Amazing service, great view. Tony, our server was excellent, explained everything in the menu perfectly.

Robert was our server and he was phenomenal! We went on a windy evening and were moved inside after our drinks. Robert was very accommodating and very helpful with recommendations. Highly recommend! We got the burrata, sea bass and fillet of the day ( tuna) followed by a chocolate orange cake. Each dish was amazing!

Everything was Perfect, the service, the view, the music and the service. 
It was also my boyfriends birthday and they sang and wrote happy birthday on the plate

Outstanding service - our waiter was fantastic. So attentive and knowledgable. Nothing was too much trouble. 
We booked plenty in advance and got a front row terrace seat (the best view) which was beautiful. 
The food was amazing we had the steak and salmon which was very generous portions and reasonably priced for the location and service. 
The music was light and welcomed. 

Would definitely recommend going around 7-8pm to catch the sunset and then start to see the city lit up. Wouldn’t get a taxi up but leave plenty of time for the cable car as there can be a queue but it’s much quicker and safer than the taxi.

Beautiful restaurant, location, food & staff!

Great food, great atmosphere, great service. Excellent chef kings prawns and steak.
Quite expensive but worth it.
We didnt get to enjoy the view since we were there after sunset.

Fab experience, heading up, up and up from Dubrovnik and you will find this beautiful restaurant with the most amazing view and to top it all fab food and service, be prepared to splurge and enjoy the ambience it’s not a place to save money but to have a treat and enjoy, after all you are on your holidays 😀
Our dessert experience at this café was made exceptionally memorable by Robert's friendly and attentive service.

Views were amazing. The food was beautiful we had burrata to start and the salmon and beefsteak for our mains. It was delicious. Cocktails were reasonably priced considering the view! The staff were the friendliest we had met in Dubrovnik, especially our waiter Robert who met our every need! Definitely a must do experience!

The venue was awesome, the service efficient and friendly. Food was average. We didn’t reserve a table in advance and that would’ve meant we would’ve had a table with a view. Definitely worth doing that.
Robert our server was amazing, everything came out so good ,drinks were delicious view Is amazing but so is the food, definitely recommend 🫶🏼

Great views but food quality, value and service is average compared to their sister restaurant, Arsenal. Also the waiter failed to honor our 10% discount card as he's already rung up the bill, which is nonsense as anyone in hospitality knows you can go back to the POS and modify a bill.
Good food, courteous staff and nice view. Tables seating is on first come first served basis. There are no bad tables! Highly recommend it.
The food was excelent, and the service by tino was incredible, very kind and helpful!! I went with my family and we all loved.

Amazing views from the front row terrace. Waiter Vedran was very professional and friendly, he was especially attentive to our needs. The food was exceptional. The menu offered plenty of variety to suit different tastes. We would highly recommend this restaurant. Worth the experience
Excellent service from Brac and team! Beautiful setting and gorgeous food. Would definitely recommend!
The most incredible restaurant. Stunning views and amazing food! Blaz, our waiter, made our evening so special. Thank you for a perfect evening!
Great food, great staff, great view - would definitely recommend! Took a trip up on the cable cart and it did not disappoint!
Everything was great! Great view, great food, great ambience, great crew! Highly recommended! Special shout-out to Blac for being awesome, engaging and helpful!

Incredible view, service, and food. Couldn’t ask for better. The tuna steak and veal risotto were so flavorful and cooked perfectly. Capped off dinner with an incredible Dubrovnik caramel dessert. 10/10
Lovely views great food and service will definitely come back, girt the cable car up however you can get a taxi I believe but the views in the cable car are worth it

It’s a great spot and if you make a reservation while you’re looking around you can have a table with great view. Either way it’s perfect at any table. The service was great, polite and with good sense of humour.

It was a walk in without reservations and was attend to with great courtesy and explain the waiting time. Once sited and Mr.Robert take our orders. Food were serve within short period of time and was explained all dishes.
Excellent food, fabulous views, the service was wonderful. Marko was very attentive. Super relaxed atmosphere.

Cannot beat the view but the food is disappointing. The couple we were dining with were vegetarian and the options are poor. My meal was average and I left my cocktail as it was mostly ice so after 5 mins in the sun it was mostly water. For the price they should do much better. Such a shame as it could be a fantastic dining experience.
Amazing views over the Old Town recommend booking prior and asking for a front row table (whole restaurant is shaded well) great service and food.
Fabulous location with stunning views of Old Town, Dubrovnik, the sea and mountains. Staff are very friendly, menu offers a good selection of food and drinks.

So you have to reserve your dinner at least 2 months in advance to get the best seats. The waiters and waitresses have an in-depth knowledge of the food they serve. Our waiters Vino and Johnny were very kind, welcoming, and knowledgeable and helped us make our menu choices. We had an amazing night and we are very grateful for having met Vino and Johnny.
What can I say, meal with a fantastic view! Food was great, service even better, location unbelievable (ask for a front row seat when you book)

Great restaurant, in common with the other two Nautika restaurants in town. It was a horrible windy and rainy day we were up there, so we did not eat outside on the terrace! The staff were so helpful when we arrived absolutely drenched (I have never been wetter) and gave us a lovely table by the window. Service was brilliant, and whenever the clouds cleared we had a great view of the town. Highly recommended, but probably would have been even better if it had been a clear day.
Spectacular views, amazing service and delicious food! Our server Luca took great care of us. I would highly recommend this to anybody visiting Dubrovnik!

What an amazing experience. We was fortunate enough to have a front row seating. We came at 7.30 and stayed for about 2 hours to watch the sunset over beautiful Dubrovnik. I would like to make a special mention to our waiter Luka, who made myself and my partners experience 10 x better. From his recommendations on drinks to the sauces on the meals this guy clearly knew his stuff. 

We wouldn’t hesitate to ever come back to this restaurant. 

Thank you Luka and staff for such a special night. 

The Prawns would be my recommendation as they’re unique with the most tasty sauce like no other!!

This was an amazing experience. The view from here looking down on the city and ocean was great. The food was delicious. Presentation was photo worthy. Waiters were incredible. Very friendly. Offered to take my photo. Made recommendations. They made sure I enjoyed my experience. I’ll come back again for sure.

Excellent service !!
You can’t beat the view as is breathtaking!!
Our waitress Peter was so kind and extra nice with us. We ordered the fillet steak and tuna, it was delicious!!
We got some complementary digestives from them.
Totally recommended specially if you are tourist!
We definitely coming back here.

Best Risotto I have ever tasted. Must try the Shrimp Zucchini risotto. I kept stealing bites from my wife. I had the Dubrovnik pork cutlet. Also the best dish. I only wish I was here in Dubrovnik longer to taste more on their menu. Fabulous cuisine!
WOW! The food and service was phenomenal (Vas was terrific). The view of Old Town was unmatched. This was a perfect first meal after arriving in Croatia.

We had a delicious meal while enjoying the spectacular view of Dubrovnik. Our server was very attentive and friendly. If you are thinking about going, don’t hesitate. It is with the trip to get there!
Wonderful experience dining at Panarama at sundown. The food and service were excellent, and the views stunning.

Views of city of Dubrovnik and the Adriatic sea were phenomenal. Very romantic spot. Prices were slightly higher here for food and drinks because of the view. Food was amazing, and cocktails were refreshing. Don't be put off by the prices! Highly recommended for couples hoping to indulge in a romantic evening with stunning views and excellent service =) Please make a reservation, and request for optimal seats 1-2 days in advance for best dining experience.

We love the view, this was excellent. The reception was warm, the restaurant is very elegant and chic.
Finally, the food was very well seasoned and we love to spend a moment with my friends and this restaurant.

This restaurant is worth the cable car ride up - the view is stunning - the food great and the service amazing - we loved it !!! You need to book well in advance for a good table and I’m glad we did - yes a little pricey but worth it

This restaurant rocks! The views are exquisite, so make reservations EARLY; some reservations are made a year in advance. If you go a couple hours before sunset, you'll get the most of the view. The food and service are top notch. Easy access via cable car, but sometimes winds and weather will close the cable car; use a taxi or drive yourself (2-way road, but single lane!) Outside dining also available. WELL WORTH THE EFFORT! (Dinner cost 300 Euro for 4 people; we got our money's worth!)
Love the view and food here. Impressed by the staff Stipe Hrkac. He is friendly with a nice smile. He helped us to take great pictures, really helpful.
Amazing view with yunmy food. A restaurant worth to visit. The staff, Stipe Hrkac served us very well, and help us to take some brilliant pictures and even video!
We didn’t make a reservation, but the host were more than accommodating to help seat us. Really great food, fresh Mediterranean food with very scenic views. Hvala!

Although the restaurant is absolutely stunning with fabulous views, and wonderful waiting staff, two of us got really bad food poisoning from seafood tagliatelle & the prawn risotto. We have both thrown up several times & have had loose motions leaving us weak and dehydrated.

Still, I have to commend Ivan, our waiter, who was an absolute delight! Such a shame to end our holiday feeling sick.

Please avoid the seafood dishes here in hot weather.

A wonderful experience - the most incredible views and truly exceptional food. It’s on the expensive side (we had a main each, bread, a bottle of wine and a shared dessert and it came out to €132) but well worth it for a special occasion. Our waiter, Vedran, was wonderful and charming, and helped make the night really special for us. Book well in advance - we booked two months ahead and got a front row table, but the only time left was 9pm so they clearly book our well in advance!
Excellent restaurant at the top of the mountain, with a beautiful 360 view of the city. The food was amazing and so was the service.

Just perfect.... food choice service. Ambience. Views .TOP Place TO EAT . 
Views to die for. Tikho top class attention .& Discreet.
The place to be
The best of the best! An amazing place with lovely food and Robert’s service! Highly recommended place!!!!

Food, view, wine, everything was perfect!
The view is the best ever, I highly recommend this restaraunt to everyone!!!

Amazing views topped off with great cocktails! 

Staff very friendly aswell!

Would say this needs to be on your list of places to visit when in Dubrovnik!
Amazing view with great food. Robert was exceptionally hospitable and provided great service. Would definitely come back next time!

This is literally one of the most amazing spots to get the best views of Dubrovnik! Additionally the food is great and the service was spectacular! Robert especially was amazing and was kind enough to take the best photos of my husband and I! Definitely not to be missed
Awesome food and service. Were planning to just go for the views, but the restaurant gave such an awesome view of the area. Zero regrets having the diner here!! Thanks Luka
My husband and I booked the tarrace front row for two and had a beautiful evening. The view was breathtaking, and the food and service were delicious. A must if you’re visiting Dubrovnik!

Amazing views over Dubrovnik caused me to book this but the food is worth it by itself. We had seafood risotto and a gnocchi lamb ragu. All excellent as were the cocktails! Essential to book if you want to eat in the evening. The views from the tables, the cable car and the fort are superb. The tables are well organised to ensure as many people as possible get to sit with the view. The service was great and we never felt rushed or neglected. Unmissable.

A great spot to stop for lunch or drinks. Booking is required. Fantastic view over the old city and easy to access by car, cable car or walk up the hill.

I had the steak sandwich, which was excellent, and another person had the squid mains, which was incredible. The staff were very helpful. Worth doing to start your trip to Dubrovnik off right.

I made an online reservation for a front row terrace table for 3:00 lunch. Our plan was to take the gondola from Old Town up the Srd hill for lunch. However, the day of our reservation was windy and rainy so the gondola wasn't running. So, we missed that part of the experience and took a 20 euro cab up to the restaurant. Once there, the terrace was also closed because of rain. But, they seated us at a window table inside overlooking Old Town and it was clear enough to really enjoy the amazing views. Normally you would think a restaurant at the top of a gondola ride would be poor quality but this is the opposite. This is a high quality restaurant that just happens to be in an amazing location. Our party of 4 all had different types of meals from shrimp risotto (which got rave reviews), to Dubrovnik style pork cutlet, to a basic cheeseburger. I had the veal with mushroom risotto and it was excellent. All meals and drinks were very good and the service was excellent - attentive but not overbearing. It's easy to make an online reservation and I highly recommend a visit.

Family meal with amazing view! … during our 4 days stay Panorama has been the best restaurant we’ve been to. Absolutely delicious food that met our expectations and the presentation on the plate were all perfection to details. 

We were originally booked on the front row terrace overlooking the old town but had to rebook another evening due to our flight cancelled by the airline. So we had the mountain view instead and loved every minute of it.

After the meal, we went further down the slope/side to watch the sunset and enjoyed the cable ride back to the old town.

Excellent meal - Marko was a brilliant waiter!
The food was delicious and the service perfect!

So glad we decided to come here! Reservations suggested. Views were amazing and menu had a lot of variety, even for our children (5 & 7). Take the cable car, it was far too hot to walk. Would love to go back for sunset.

We enjoyed a lovely meal at Panorama on a Sunday evening in June. The views are absolutely stunning! We had made a reservation a good few months before we travelled as we were aware the restaurant gets super busy! We received a friendly welcome on arrival and were seated promptly. The reservation we had made was for a table in the second row however we were seated on the front row which was a nice touch. We were advised we could only have the table for 1hr 30, rather than the standard 2hrs 15 which we were fine with. In fact, there was no rush and we were not moved on. We both had the risotto starter which was delicious, followed by salmon and steak for main course. The salmon was very good, although my partner did say the steak wasn’t as good as others he has had. The menu choice here for both food and drink is very good and the service we received was excellent. The prices are a little inflated, I guess because you are paying for the view. I would recommend Panorama to anyone visiting Dubrovnik, just make sure you book in advance.
The staff went out of their way to fit us in when we didn't have a reservation. The food was amazing and the views are to die for. I highly recommend this place if you are in Dobrovnik
Fantastic location and great food. Waiter service was excellent. We didn't reserve but manager quickly found table with great view of the old city

It was excellent experience and tiho was the best! I wanna come here again
We spent best time here during whole vacation

Stopped off here on our cable car trip, popped in for drinks.

The waiter found us a table on the terrace edge with amazing views over Dubrovnik, a sunny afternoon added to the experience.

A bottle of Croatian wine went down s treat, exemplary service and unbelievable view.
Amazing place for dinner. Service was exceptional. Vedran was very polite and knowledgable. Views were out of this world.

Stunning views await visitors but not necessarily from the restaurant itself - you will find far better ones on the cliff tops outside in the grounds. 
Many opt for eating outside - whilst it’s a novelty, few tables are where the views are - so opt for eating inside where your food will stay warmer & you can find about 6 window view tables.

I had the lamb chops which were amazing and my wife had the veal risotto - also superb!

Great food, worth the money. Would recommend and actually better than the sister restaurant Gradska kavana Arsenal - you get 10% off voucher for that restaurant here but not the other way round 🤷🏼‍♂️

Could only get a table at 4pm but this was actually perfect and totally worth it. 

Rather than take the cable car, we hike up to the top (1.5 hrs / 2.5k up hill) and were taken to our terrace table overlooking Dubrovnik Old town and coast line. Very beautiful. Our Aperol Sprits never tasted so good. Had a couple of shared octopus starters enjoying the views. 

We then visited the museum of the Homeland war in the fortress at the top… important, sad photos & memories, before hiking down again a different, equally beautiful route (3.5k).

Great experience! We made a reservation for dinner at Panorama restaurant based on the recommendation of our travel agent and we are glad we did that. Not only are the views amazing, the food, drinks and service didn’t disappoint. Would highly recommend this as part of Dubrovnik experience.

Decided a few weeks before coming to Dubrovnik that I wanted to eat here after hiking up the mountain.

I emailed them in advance to book a table (and request a good view of the old town, which they honoured!)

I honestly thought that the prices were expensive due to the amazing location and that the food wouldn't match up to the prices, but I was very wrong.

I had the burger which was amazing.
I've had a few burgers already in Dubrovnik and they've all been good so far (I check a lot of reviews before deciding where to eat my burgers!)
But the burger here was the best I've had so far.

Very good meat. Cooked well with a great meaty taste and very juicy. Lots of really strong cheese and fresh shredded lettuce. All served in a soft fresh bun.
The fries that came with it were already very good. 

My wife wasn't very hungry so ordered the side of grilled vegetables. 
Good sized portion of different veg (peppers, aubergine, courgette, onion, tomato) and all very nice.

She also ordered the 'bread selection' which was 9 good sized pieces of very fresh lovely squidgy bread. Amazing considering it was only €3!

The service was also very good and even though a lot of the tables were reserved we didn't feel like they were rushing us at all. If we'd sat staring at view for another hour I don't think anyone would have complained.

My only minor criticism is that the restaurant has no toilets. You have to walk back up the steps to the main toilets at the viewing platform/cable car station (which are very small and obviously shared with all the cable car visitors)

Overall an amazing meal and I'd happily eat here again.
This is the most beautiful view of Dubrovnik. The food was also beautiful and delicious. A must stop if you are staying in town!
Amazing food, great service and the view is unbeatable. Went there to celebrate a birthday and we can't recommend it enough. Would come back definitely.

The dinner lives up to the incredible view. Went for drinks @ sunset and ended up staying for dinner. The food was superb, great selection of Croatian wine and the services was great. Always a waiter on hand to help out. Loved it
For a celebration night book for dinner .. everyone attentive and talk you through provenance of the food and wine .. the view is to die for .. the food taste is amazing ..

Absolutely fantastic food, service and atmosphere, loved it.
A definite must visit even if just for a cocktail, staff just lovely.

Amazing service , food & views.
We took an Uber up and cable car down .It was the last night of our holiday & was by far our favourite restaurant.

Just wow…booked here months ago for a terrace seat to watch the sunset and it did not disappoint. The service was amazing and the food was beautiful. We had the table for 2 hrs and 15 mins and we were able to take our time and enjoy the view, food and drinks. Thankyou for a memorable dinner
Absolutely unbelievable. Service excellent & food delicious. The view is spectacular 😮. A must if you’re visiting Dubrovnik!! Can’t recommend enough.
Beautiful lunch. The service from Josip Vidic was great. So friendly. The food was delicious we had the almond cake and the sauce was like crème brûlée. Definitely include this on your trip.

Stunning views and good food in a nice atmosphere. We were a bit worried that it would be a tourist rip-off with mediocre food but it was very good. The cocktails were great especially the Strawberry Kiss!

We went here for a dinner booked for 2030hrs, which gave us time to watch the sunset over the mountains to the west. Shortly after we walked to the restaurant where we had booked a table on the terrace (front row) which I couldn’t recommend more. 

The service was exceptional from our waiter Robert. We had the beef cheek, which may have been the most expensive meal we have had in Dubrovnik but was by far the best quality. 

We were told several times not to rush and we had loads of time to relax and enjoy our meal as the last cable car down was at 0000. We had free drinks given to us at the end of the meal as we were celebrating an anniversary. 

10/10 overall. Amazing views and food.

We came later (20:45) had a cable car all to ourselves 
Service amazing and food was brilliant 
Chicken, beef and fish dishes all worth a taste
Great food, with a spectacular view of Dubrovnik at night, the wine options were really good and the fish cut if the day was Tuna steak which phenomenal!
Excellent service and amazing food…not a tourist trap at all, but one of the best restaurants of Dubrovnik… COME AND EXPERIENCE A WONDERFUL EVENING
We had an superb dinner celebrating a birthday. Robbert was an incredible waiter and went the extra mile to make our experience more enjoyable :)
This spot is amazing, amazing for sunset time. Our waiter TINO was so lovely and attentive. Highly recommend!
Perfect ending to a perfect holiday, excellent venue , beautiful food all made superb by Josip , thank you all will see you again .Thank You Gary & Claire
The food was absolutely amazing, as was the staff and cocktail drinks. We did not have a reservation, but still got a table in the outside area. Best food in Europe!!!
Fabulous views, food & service! Marko was so kind & took so many pictures for us & his wine recommendation was excellent! Don’t miss this place!

眺めはもちろん料理、スタッフとても素敵な時間を過ごせました。

I had a wonderful time with the view, the food, and the staff.

thank you very much.

What an amazing place to sit and take in the view.
Lovely food, attentive staff and went out of their way to offer a table with view over old town.
Would highly recommend.

This was our favorite restaurant by far. We are mostly in Old Town and right outside of old town and found all the places we went very marginal!!! Not this place. It was spectacular!!! Our table was perfect!!! The best!! The waiter, Robert, was so friendly and helpful!! Food was awesome!! On the pricier side but we expected that. 

Go here for sure!
Lovely place! Great sunset views and excellent food and drinks. Our server Robert was very pleasant and elevated our experience

I brought my wife here for her 60th birthday. The meal was fantastic. The guys delivered excellent customer service. They made this night so very special and memorable. Peter was excellent and the lady booking in out table was ever so helpful and sorted out a beautiful table for the night. The team were amazing. I cannot thank you enough. Cheers, Pat.

Our experience at Panorama was our best dining experience in Dubrovnik by far. We reserved a table at Panorama for our last night, and we were not disappointed. While we have not had great dining experiences in Dubrovnik (bad food, extremely expensive), the Panorama is a must visit. Our waiter Robert was lovely and we were well taken care of. Although a bit pricier than restaurants you see in Old Town, the price is worth it for the ambiance, view and the delicious food. If you can get a reservation, this restaurant is a must! We wish we went here on our first night so we could skip the bad and expensive food found in Old Town. I can’t recommend this place more!

The overall setting at this restaurant is like no other because of the spectacular view of Dubrovnik. It is a great place to celebrate a special occasion or simply the beginning/end of a vacation in Croatia. Our server was excellent! The food was ok, not spectacular as the views. But I do recommend coming to this restaurant once because it is memorable.

Best view in town and amazing looking restaurant. Rememver to reserve table, or else you would have to wait. 
Food was very good. Dubrovinc cutlet is recomended

We only went for a drink, but so happy we did, the views are spectacular.
Great atmosphere and ambience.

Not often do you get good food with a view like this, it's stunning.

It was nice to get some simple but very good food, had some chicken burgers and a steak sandwich. Finishes off with some cocktails and some of the best we've had in dubrovnik and we've tested out quite a few!!

Staft were great and they adapted my booking for me to a table of 4 rather than 2 tables of 2 as they didn't have availability on the day.

Book well in advance if you want a table as its very busy. Also maybe take a jacket or cardigan with you, only time we were cold in dubrovnik, there was a bit of a wind and we were in the shade.

We got an uber up and back down, the price of cable car for 4 of us would have been 120e when the uber up and down was 40e. Crazy price for 6 mins up and down on the cable car. We were going to walk but did the walls that day and it was 26 degrees so didn't fancy the pants hike!! Don't use local taxis they are extortionate, use uber it's so much cheaper.
STUNNING views!! Incredible food. Loved it here - Tino was great! Couldn’t recommend this place more.

We took the cable car up to this restaurant off the back of a recommendation. Their website says ‘fully booked’ for a week or so in advance, however (like a few reviews on here) we went and asked if there was chance of a table for 2. They went out of their way to give us an incredible table with a view over the old town and the coastline. The food was great and reasonably priced given its location and the view. We’d definitely recommend giving it a try!
Perfect view, exellent service and really good food and wine. I will recomend this place to my friends!

Pre booked a few weeks in advanced for a good table. The tables as quite close together and it feels a little crammed together. 

Food was really good and cocktails even better. I recommend the amaretto and strawberry. Service was fast so not waiting to long for food. The staff were brilliant and nothing seemed to much. I felt it was somewhere I would only go once though given it’s location.

Outstanding food and service with a view to die for! Yes, it’s pricey but totally worth it. You can book a front terrace table online which is a valuable tip. On our visit, brilliant blues skies became threatening within minutes of taking our front-row seat and sadly we had to move inside for our meal as the rain started. But as we were paying the sun reappeared and the maitre d offered us a complimentary glass of wine back at our original table. A lovely touch we really appreciated.

From our first greeting to our last goodbye it was a superb experience. Immaculate warm friendly staff, superb service and food to die for. Add the best seat in the house and my wife and I just had the most amazing time.
One of the best dining experiences of my life.
Thank you Panorama ❤️

What an amazing evening!!! The food is delicious. The view is to die for.
Staff were friendly, attentive and very knowledgable about their menu.
Thank you, we had a fantastic evening watching the sunset over the beautiful coastline and city.
Our waiter Ivan was very pleasant and good at his job. The food was good and the service was good. I would recommend this place to people who wants good food with a view

sunny cozy place overlooking old town where most scenes of GOT were shot. The food is high quality. Perfect portions that allow quality beyond the scenery. A Great selection of local wines round the experience. Do yourself a favor, get up the lift and get the best pictures that can be taken here and enjoy beautiful meal. Can’t go wrong here

We had the most wonderful time, our waiter Blaz was incredibly attentive, looking after us throughout the meal. 

If you have not been, come over sunset and order the steak or pork, you will not be disappointed.

Well worth a visit if you are holidaying in Croatia. The views are absolutely stunning. The food was delicious washed down with a couple of bottles of local Pinot Grigio. We were looked after so well by Marko - nothing was too much trouble for him, in fact all the staff we extremely polite and attentive. If you are dining after sunset bring a cardigan/ wrap as it gets a little chilly
Such a stunning view so certainly worth the visit. Front row seats were fab, food was nice but pricey as expected for the location.

Excellent because of the freshness and quality if the food.
Excellent because of the kindness and attention of the waiter.
And of course… that unbeatable view😍
Great service, great location, staff were very accommodating as far as seating. Food was amazing! Would recommend to anyone x
Lovely location. Views were outstanding and Tina’s service was impeccable and very friendly . The restaurant was very clean and prices very competitive.
Title says it all really. We had the best table in the house, ready an hour ahead of scheduled booking, and enjoyed really attentive service from Petar and his colleagues throughout.

Fabulous views, perfect service, great food. We had beautiful weather. It was a perfect lunch. We were a group of 6 and took the cable car to the restaurant. It truly was stunning. The waiters were very attentive and we really enjoyed our food and cocktails.

The food was delicious. Beautiful view and great service. Highly recommend it. It is a must go. We totally enjoyed it. The steak sandwich was amazing. Our server Marko was great. He offered the best service we have had in Croatia.
Great food and service. The view is to die for. You must come but make reservations so you don't have to wait. Marko was great. You must get the chocolate cake. Loved it.
Great lunch and service with an amazing view. We had chicken salad which was tasty and a ham and cheese toastie which was also tasty.

Probably the most beautiful restaurant view I’ve ever seen! We timed our dinner reservation to watch the sunset and it was stunning. We were originally allocated a second row table and enquired if we could have a front row table when we arrived, which they very kindly gave to us. Don’t bother with the cable car at €27pp return, an Uber there and back is perfectly fine. 
The service were very lovely and attentive, there was a small button on each table to press to get their attention which worked very well. Yummy cocktails (generously boozy) and delicious food - we both had the dubrovnik chop with potatoes, bacon and red wine sauce. The food & drink prices are the same as other Dubrovnik restaurants, so with the stunning view added in, it was honestly pretty good value for money!

We came up in the cable car during the afternoon despite having failed to book a table at the restaurant. We asked if there was any chance of a table for two. Yes if we could eat in an hour. That suited us. Very nice it was too as was the drinks enjoying the view of Dubrovnik old town and beyond. The restaurant brought out heaters and supply plenty of throws if the temperature drops or it gets windy. Don’t be put off if the website says it’s fully booked.

First of all i made a reservation and requested a specific table and i received a very prompt and polite reply stating that specific tables can't be reserved, however a terrace table would be guarenteed. Upon arriving at the restaurant we were greeted by a very polite member of staff and he showed us to our table to find that we had been given the specific table i had requested, which o thought was fantastic. Following this the waiter took our orders and was polite and even took the time to make conversation with us. The food was incredible, we ordered lamb chops with sides of grilled vegetables and rosemary potatoes... everything was cooked perfectly. For dessert the creme caramel and cheesecake were equally delicious. Overall probably one of the best dining experiences i have had in Dubrovnik, i look forward to returning here on my next visit. Highly recommend.

We had a fabulous meal at restaurant Panorama. Robert our waiter was so kind and welcoming. 5 star service from him! The food was very nice and not to mention the scenic view was perfect! Highly recommend this restaurant for anyone visiting Dubrovnik. The service from when we first stepped into the restaurant till we leave was a lovely experience!

This was a great way to finish off our vacation! We were lucky to be able to be seated without a reservation right at sunset. The view was breathtaking. The waiters were attentive and kind. The cocktails were beautiful and tasty and so was the food.

Firstly, we have to talk about the setting. The location is unparalleled, even in a beautiful city like Dubrovnik. Perched high on the mountains, overlooking the city and the Adriatic sea beyond. If you are afraid of heights, perhaps ask for a seat away from the edge. Otherwise it's breathtaking. 

Then there is the food. I had to try the Dalmatian smoked ham with olives and sun-dried tomatoes. It was delicious - the portion is significant but light enough so as not to overwhelm you before your main. My wife enjoyed the Pumpkin soup (with bacon and marscapone) very much. 

For mains, my wife had the chicken - which was cooked perfectly and paired well with potato, carrot and kale. The jus elevated the dish further. 
I had the veal with mushroom risotto. The veal was tender, subtle and everything I feel we are missing with our cultural aversion to such delicacies in the UK. 
Finally, the icing on the cake was the staff. From being greeted, to being shown our table, to being served they were always friendly, warm and welcoming. Always the most hospitalable - I could not have asked for friendlier service.

We decided to hike to the top and visit the war museum. After the walk it was so nice to be able to get a lovely cocktail and a really nice slice of cake. I wish we’d of had chance to have a actual meal as they looked amazing. Staff really friendly and the view from the restaurant was amazing

Omg!! We had the most beautiful seat of the restaurant. Overlooking the Old Town. You could see the beauty and magnificent architecture from above. The service was impeccable and the food superb!! If you want to experience this, please make sure you book ahead as they are always full

For our last evening in Dubrovnik we had booked a table at this restaurant. Took the cable car to the top earlier and enjoyed the views from the top then ate. We were sat in a lovely position overlooking the city. The sunset was amazing. The food was delicious we had mixed cheese and olives to start and then the chicken and pork for mains. Our waiter for so helpful and friendly talking us through the dishes nothing was too much trouble.
There were fleece blankets for when the sun went down and patio heaters were brought out for each table too. All in all a wonderful last night.

Outstanding view for the evening. For 5 of the 6 of us the meals were great. Unfortunately, my wife who had the lamb chops got food poisoning and spent the next day in the hospital….. We travel tomorrow so hopefully she is feeling better.

Excellent in all aspects. We arrived in the dark but the view is still spectacular with the lights of Dubrovnik twinkling below. 
Food exceeded all expectations, this is not a restaurant resting on its lofty laurels. 
Superb ambience and friendly staff where nothing was too much trouble.
Special thank you to Peter our table hero for the night 😍

An amazing view! We were recommended this restaurant mainly for it's view and with that, it did not disappoint! In regards to the meal, we were a bit disappointed. It definitely didn't blow our minds. If you live in the UK, a Miller & Carter meal is actually better. The steak was good but not amazing for what you are paying for. The cocktails however were something we did really enjoy. I wouldn't recommended this restaurant for its food as there are better restaurants in Dubrovnik.

In my experience, restaurants with spectacular views rely on that to attract customers and the service and or food can be a bit ordinary. This was not the case with Panorama restaurant. The view is amaaaazing, but the service and food were also excellent. There was a little bit of a mix up with one item in our order, and the waiter and restaurant manager were so apologetic that they comped us one meal and offered an additional couple of glasses of wine and a dessert on the house. They are a very professional restaurant that is perfect for a special night out in Dubrovnik.
Robert provided excellent service. So friendly and thoughtful. Would definitely recommend all friends to come for the views and food plus service.

Robert our server was a great host
The food was great as well , really recommend the king prawns 

The view up top looking down at the old town is also amazing
Amazing view, polite staff. Higher prices but if we consider the view it is worth it. A must visit if you are in Dubrovnik.
Here you have very kind waitress and waiter. Also, you can enjoy your delicious meal with excellent views of “King’s Landing”.

Spot is good for a view, but is not the only place where you can get good views. Felt it was a bit overpriced but we were there only for a coffee. There are other places on the top if you are just after the views
The view is amazing, of course but Tiho and Blaz were excellent servers. We would not hesitate to recommend this to our friends!!

Fantastic location to have a meal! 4 out of 5 stars as we thought our meal was nice but not fantastic, we had the steak and salmon. It was really nice but maybe expected better, we didn't find it much better than your cheaper restaurants in the city and for the price we thought it would stand out more. 
Keep in mind if you book outwith the sunnier months it will be windy and cold as you sit but the restaurant do have baskets at your seat and heaters over the top of you which helps. 
If your on a budget and we not bothered about the cable car ride to the top then an uber can get you to the top also. Cable car ride is around 27 euors return per person.

Fantastic location for a drink or food. Can be busy but in May we waited 15 minutes - you can have a drink and enjoy the views while waiting. Staff very friendly. Prices are high but normal for the location. Worth it.

The restaurant is only worthwhile if you can reserve first row terrace seats, as you can't much of anything at all if not seated in the first row. I made a reservation for a party of 2 over a month in advance and only got row 2 on the terrace. I had read that sometimes it's possible to get "upgraded" to a first row table, if those who reserve those tables do not show up. Alas, the restaurant was not able to move us to a first row terrace table when we arrived for our reservation. However, what not the only reason we were disappointed with our experience. It was a chilly evening and heaters were brought out for tables. Staff were bringing out individual heaters for each table. No one ever brought a heater for our table. The only heater close by was aimed at the table next to us. Later, the couple at the table next to us was offered to be moved to a first row table, even though they were done with their dinner and was just getting some drinks. The staff then quickly cleaned that table and seated another couple there. Not sure why that other couple was moved instead of just seating the new couple at the first row table that was vacant. Also, not sure why we weren't offered the first row table instead as well. After we finished dinner and our plates were cleared, no one came to check on us to see if we wanted dessert or the check for more than 20 minutes. I had to track down a server to ask for the check. The food was actually pretty tasty. If only the service could have been better.
Most beautiful view I’ve genuinely ever had at any restaurant throughout my life, the server Ivan is great as well
The best night! Great service, food, drinks and the sunset was amazing! Beautiful Croatian wine. Thank you Ivan!

Our server Ivan recommended me a delicious dish, the chicken rustico. It was cooked perfectly, amazing sauce, flavourful gravy, and the potatoes were amazing. I do wish the serving size was a bit bigger, but overall, great service and great food. Oh also the VIEW is incredible.
I highly recommend this restaurant. The staff are very friendly and the food is delicious. I had the seafood linguine which was to die for. The views from the restaurant are fantastic.
The views from this restaurant are indescribable! It is so beautiful and our meal was a great way to end our trip. Ivan, our server, was so courteous and pleasant. Highly recommend!

Stunning views of Dubrovnik Old Town. Amazing food but don't let the title of light lunch fool you as substantial meal! Couldn't get In to book after 3pm as fully booked for next 7 days but didn't spoil the enjoyment. Take a light jacket as can be breezy

Me and my friends arrived in Dubrovnik on a Tuesday afternoon and looked at booking for the Friday evening. The website said it was fully booked and wasn’t working properly. I sent an email and the same day I received a reply from Anita that she could fit us in on the terrace! Such good customer service received! The view of sunset was amazing, making for great photos. The cocktails and food were also great and the staff friendly! 

Thanks Anita was getting us in at short notice ☺️

Had lunch here on a crystal clear day in May. Took the cable car up, which I highly recommend. We were seated at a table with an amazing view of Old Town Dubrovnik. In the US a restaurant boasting such an amazing view would skimp on food quality and service. Not so at Panorama. Our food was wonderful and service impeccable. Do make a reservation. My daughter wanted to book us for sunset and couldn’t get one a month out during the shoulder season, so plan accordingly, although our lunch experience was delightful.

Panorama was filled up with reservations but my friends and I went to see if anything was available. They were able to fit us in and it was an amazing experience. The view, the food, the drinks - all of it was incredible. Marko was a fantastic waiter and made it a great evening!

Can't recommend this restaurant enough...breathtaking views, amazing food and the staff are so friendly and attentive. Petar our waiter was fantastic and nothing was too much trouble! He even brought my husband a card and sparkler for his birthday. First class all round.
Robert was an excellent host. He looked after my wife who has a severe nut allergy. Thank you for the excellent food and lovely sunset view.
What an amazing experience! We had the best table in the house! Staff couldn’t do enough to make our experience wonderful! Highly recommend

Stopped here for lunch. The service was superb and the food good and fresh plus you get rather good views. It is quire expensive but is actually the same as its sister restaurants by Pile and the Harbour (if you visit one you will get a 10% discount card for the others).
Would eat here again.
We had an amazing experience in Panorama restaurant. The food, the scenery and the atmosphere was exceptional. Vlaz and the rest of the staff were very friendly and attentive. Would recommend.

This evening at Panorama Restaurant was a wonderful experience. The ambience, the view and the food was amazing, and our waiter, Blac was the best photographer for the sunset photos. I will not come to Dubrovnik again without coming to this restaurant.

Such a great location. The staff were so helpful with recommendations and making sure everything was great overall experience 

Had the Dubrovnik styled cutlet, delicious

Very very good view!
and very kind staff, MR.Tiho
Thanks a lot!! 

너무 멋진 뷰!
Tiho 씨 너무 친절해요!
감사합니다!!!!

This restaurant has the most stunning views, but you must book a table for the best seats. I e-mailed a few days in advance to secure a reservation, and we were given a table right at the front of the restaurant's outdoor terrace with a 5* view of Dubrovnik. They did accept walk-ins but you will likely be given a table nearer the back, away from the best views. The staff were friendly and professional. There was a button on the table which you could press for service. The food was delicious, I would recommend the Dubrovnik style pork cutlet. It's a bit pricey getting to the restaurant as it it at the top of a very steep hill (small mountain!), the cable car was 27 euros per adult, but was worth it for the views and to experience the restaurant.
Great spot to enjoy a bottle or two of wine with a great view, the service was exceptional, the food was great, and our waiter was engaging with enthusiasm and a great attitude...thank you

We came for a lovely sunset dinner and it did not disappoint. Peter (our server) was attentive, knowledgeable and kind. I definitely recommend a cable car trip up for sunset dinner and enjoy a bottle of Croatian red wine.
Such a beautiful location with the best service. 10/10 recommend to anyone visiting croatia.. you will be pleasantly surprised!

Absolutely recommend a visit to this restaurant. Amazing views, fabulous food and the waiters were extremely attentive, efficient and pleasant. Everyone in our group of six really enjoyed their meal and the entire experience was one we will all remember.
Best service from Vedran!!!! Amazing food an View but the local people are so amazing like vedrelan it adds to the beauty

Lovely restaurants, wonderful food and the service was impeccable. 
We took a taxi up to the restaurant ( 40e ) and the cable car down ( 15e each )

Nicest food I’ve had while travelling around Europe. Really lovely customer service and our waiter Blaz was soo lovely, we couldn’t believe how great the service was. We asked to move tables to a nicer view and they did it straight away with no hesitation. Very accommodating and the steak sandwich was the nicest steak sandwich we have ever had in our 64 years of life. Thank you Blaz and the Panaroma Restaurant 😊😊😊
Fantastic service and great cocktails with an incredible view, would highly recommend for a nice day
Wonderful experience. Get a front row terrace table if you can, which requires booking in advance. Great food and excellent service to match, and the views are unbeatable.
Definitely recommend. We went for a birthday meal and it did not disappoint. Amazing view and great food
Amazing service, amazing food, amazing view. Really good atmosphere, and an amazing experience would definitely recommend for couples and families.
Very nice service, they even brought me a cake and card for my birthday. The views are the best thing though! I highly recommend!

5 out of five for food service and view.
The waiting service are excellent. The food is excellent. I had the veal risotto. My daughter had chicken rustico as a main and for dessert I had the apple pie with vanilla ice cream and my daughter had the Dubrovnik caramel.
Views are outstanding, and it was nice to see the sunset over the city and old town light up
Amazing service from Blaz Majcia. Even though the cloud was crazy had the best time. Cocktails and drinks flowed nicely

As restaurants with a view go, this is right up there on the list! 
400 metres above the old town, the tables perched on the edge on the cliff have the most stunning view. Essential to book ahead to get the best tables. The tables have umbrellas and IR heaters. There is an inside dining room within the cable car station.
The food and service was excellent, with a good choice and also a good selection of Croation wines. 
A particular favourite was the Prawn and Courgette risotto starter, which was extremely tasty and easily enough to share. Prices are on a par with the old town, but with the added benefit of the view, makes this a "no brainer" to visit.
The cable car return is 27 euro per person. As a group of 6, we took an Uber up from the old town for just under 30 euros, which was very good value.
This is one of a group of three restaurants in the town, and when paying the bill, they give you a card showing all three. The card gives you a 10% discount when dining at any of the restaurants. We had already dined at Arsenal, and used the card successfully here.
Highly recommended on a nice day.
A Beautiful setting with wonderful views of Dubrovnik and surrounds. Food was good and service from waiters was excellent

We decided to go to this restaurant for my husbands birthday and wasn’t disappointed. I told the restaurant it was my husband’s birthday and they gave him a birthday card and cake . The food mains was fabulous and very reasonable. Amazing views and the staff was 5 star so happy and helpful. Definitely a must if your Dubrovnik.

My boyfriend and I chose Panorama restaurant to celebrate our 10th anniversary. The view as well as the overall atmosphere were so heartbreaking we both got profoundly moved. 
Food was great; we shared carpaccio as a starter and we got a sea bass and a filet with veggies and potatoes as a main. The beurre blanc on my fish was the best I’
Service was impeccable, too. Our waiter Blaz was super attentive, he offered to take a picture of us and made sure everything was perfect!
Price-wise, Panorama is way more honest than all the places in the Old Town where you get bad quality for a ridiculous price. At Panorama the price equals the high quality and the stunning service/atmosphere. It’s like eating in Paradise.

It’s really a must-see if you’re visiting Dubrovnik ❤️

We travelled up by cable car (€27 per adult) and were very lucky that it was sunny day, the views were amazing. 

We had booked a table on the outside terrace, when we arrived the sun was shining, but half way through our meal the sun went down and it because really cold. The restaurant did provide blankets which we were very glad of.
We ordered the beef lasagne and Chicken “Rustico” with potato mouse, marinated kale with sage sauce. The lasagne was quite a large dish, but it was very good. The chicken arrived with a separate jug of sage sauce, the chicken was really tender it was lovely.
We had 2 Pina Colada cocktails and they were one of the best I’ve ever had.
It’s a shame it was so cold it would have been nice to stay long as the scenery was amazing. I would definitely recommend a visit.

The bill came to €74.50 if only we had kept the return visit from the Kavana restaurant we would have been able to have 10% discount.

We came to watch the sunset - it was fantastic, Vedran was a brilliant host, nothing was too much and he even moved us to the front row when he could. The service was second to none and we really enjoyed ourselves. If you get the chance do come, watch the sunset and enjoy the evening twinkling lights of the old town.
Amazing views, service and food. A must for visiting Dubrovnik. Our waiter was excellent and we enjoyed eating great food whilst watching the sunset
The scenery, the staff and the food were all excellent. Couldn’t fault this experience and would recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik.
A nice meal in beautiful setting. Good range of food and choices. Worth visiting if you are taking the cable car trip up to the top of the mountain.
100% recommend, the food was incredible and the view was wonderful. The service was great, we would love to come back!
Beautiful view, delicious food and drinks. Service was perfect. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. Blaz was great host
The view is unbeatable and while it isn’t cheap, the food is fantastic and the staff are all so polite

Absolutely fantastic experience! A must go to restaurant with a breath taking view. Robert our waiter made the whole experience brilliant. Can not reccomend this restaurant enough, quality food and service.

Ivan gave us The best experience, great food and amazing view!
A trip to remember! Go here! The food is unbelieveable!
Beautiful restaurant! The staff are lovely and provide great service. The views are amazing. Would definitely recommend the cocktails.

This is the place to go!!! Amazing place with fantastic staff with humor, who did the extra for every one! The food was hevenly! The amazing view was the cherry on the cake! 
You need to go here!
Best place in Dubrovnik 🙌🏻 it’s an unforgetable view, staff and food! Well worth a visit! This is the place to go!
Lovely lunch that We never wanted to end! Carpaccio best We ever had! Linguine to die for! Beef and risotto; amazing aswell! Staff five star service!!!! And a breathtaking view on top of it all!

Amazing food and view, great service and an absolut must see when visiting Dubrovnik! We have had such a great experience and this restaurant. The waiter made us feel special and was very attentive to our needs. We enjoyed every minute of our stay!
Good food. Most beautiful view. Great staff mahalo Ivan, your the best! A bit chilly but they gave us blankets and brought us a heater without even having to ask.

Spectacular views from every table, brilliant atmosphere, comprehensive menu and delicious food. This will be one of our best memories of our time in Dubrovnik. Our server - Ivan - added an extra quality to our experience through his friendliness, humour, knowledge and efficiency.

What a wonderful view! The food was delicious. Interview was phenomenal. Ivon was our waiter and he did it to manage job in with very pleasant to work with. I would highly recommend this location and clearly come again.
The view at the restaurant was outstanding. We stopped for a quick snack and were very happy. Our waiter Ivan was very friendly and helpful. We would certainly ask for him again.
Beautiful view and great service ❤️❤️ delicious food and drinks. I recommend this restaurant. Well done.❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

We had a wonderful dinner on the terrace with a great view of the old town from sunset till night. The dinner recommendations by Robert were spot on and his service was great throughout the night. Thumbs up!

We booked a table from online and travelled by taxi to destination. The view was amazing, definetly worth wisiting. The restaurant itself, not worth it. Have to say that the staff was super kind and we got the food fast. For a place like this, we were expecting some fine dining a’la carte but the food didnt amaze us and it was pricy. There were no seasoning and it was ”something from a family fast food place”. 
I ordeded a medium stake, it came complitely done. My friend ordered a seafood with rice and now he is sick. Has been vomiting the whole day and has fever. The seafood tasted a bit old.
Read another review about foodpoisoning but didnt believe it. Well, should have.

But if you love a good view, walk around the premesis and wait for the sunset. Definetly worth the time!

Amazing service. The server was on top of serving us water, refilling our wine glasses, as well as making sure everything was perfect during our stay. He even took a picture of our experience after our food was served. His wine recommendations were on par for what we were eating! We WILL be back!

The view! The view! The food was very good and the service was good. But the view! It was a cool evening (breezy) but we were very distracted by the amazing view of Dubrovnik. My sea bass was excellent and my wife's pork loin was, too. The chocolate cup dessert was delicious. We enjoy a French coffee and an Italian coffee before ordering a Croatian dry white wine. We would definitely go back! Be aware that if there is much wind the cable car won't run and you'll need to taxi there.
An absolutely outstanding dinner. The view unlike anything else and the food was superb. Our server Robert went above and beyond. Over all best part of our 3 week vacation. Highly recommend.

Very attentive service with good food and drinks. We had their ''light'' lunch of sandwiches and burgers but there were lots of other more substantial options that looked good as they passed by. View is amazing and they give you plenty of time to enjoy without any rush to turnover tables. Would highly recommend. Travel Tip: We took a taxi to the restaurant which was fast and without waiting in lines for the cable car and then back down by cable car with only a very short wait from the top.
Amazing food, amazing service, here for a special occasion and were treated extremely well! Highly recommend and will definitely be back x
Perfect dinner with the most special and spectacular views. Excellent and attentive staff. A very wonderful moment

Such an awesome View and quality food

The macedonian waiter in particular did an excellent job.

Beautiful and friendly restaurant! Our waiter Vedra (we think this is how you spell it) was second to none, my partner wanted no salad on his burger and this seemed to be an issue explaining this in other restaurants so we where so pleased that he took the time to listen and understand our requests with no fuss, nothing was a problem for them. Such an easy going vibe allowed us the time to take in the magnificent views. Overhead heaters and blankets ensured comfort throughout. The views are spectacular and the food was delicious! We will definitely be back again.

After walking to the top from the City which took 75 mins, we had a coffee/beer/snacks. 
The service was attentive and thoughtful as for example, they brought tomato ketchup and mayonnaise without having to ask. 
In addition, without saying anything to the restaurant in advance, they brought a lovely piece of cake to celebrate my 62 years! 
It made a memorable touch to the whole experience. 
A thoughtful and much appreciated gesture. 
Again, wonderful service, which is sadly lacking in many places.
Even if the price is high, the food is of great quality and the service is fast and friendly. I recommend the cheesecake if its in the menu (most deserts change daily)
Very nice view, great location… great food and services..Robert is very considerate and helpful. Enjoyed our dinner very much
Fantastic meal. Our waiter Plac was fantastic. Food and drink were lovely. Great views, during the sunset

A wonderful experience all round. Delicious, fresh and beautifully presented food in the most relaxing restaurant with spectacular panoramic views. Staff were wonderful. Very lucky to have experienced this beautiful place.

Great meal and fantastic view. Service was top notch as well. Really can’t ask for much more. Not the place for super budget conscious but worth the treat. They were kind enough to find us an amazing table with a view even without a reservation.

Very good meal, we got to enjoy with amazing views, they had warmers and blankets to stay comfortable with the cold. Robert and Tino were the best, always asking if we needed something else and very very nice.
so good! the best view and food; recomend watching the sunset!!! the burger was really good and Tino was the best waiter!! Tino rocks!
Spent a great afternoon!! The food is delicious and the service is amazing! Definitely the best part is the beautiful view!

A magnificent experience with the best view over Dubrovnik! 
I had lunch here with my boyfriend and the service is incredible! Vedran served us, who is a very competent, friendly and especially attentive waiter! 
We will definitely come back as soon as we visit Dubrovnik again! A must to visit when in Dubrovnik!!! 🙌🏼

Up there with Nepenthe in California or the terrace in Ravello. Gorgeous view, nice food and chilled music. Tables laid out across various levels and positions so for us on the first level it felt so private yet with this view in front of us. Loved it.

amazing restaurant. both the food and service was 10/10, A special mention to our waiter Robert, very attentive and made sure that we were happy with everything. highly recommended if you visit Dubrovnik.
Excellent food ,service and value. Spectacular views. Our waiter Robert was so helpful and friendly, highly recommended.
Good service, food, view, & free digestif. Would recommend. Cheaper than many similar restaurants in Dubrovnik. Try it!

The food was as spectacular as the views. I had the mushroom risotto and fillet steak, both were cooked to perfection with nicely balanced flavours and excellent presentation. The staff were friendly and attentive but not intrusive. I would highly recommend to anyone for the experience of looking down on Dubrovnik and the sea and for the excellent food and service.

Amazing food, definitely worth the price and amazing veiw, 10/10
Recommend for all couples, family’s etc.
Brilliant spot for amazing food with great views! We received wonderful service from Robert and the rest of the team. Would definitely come back and recommend to anyone.

Beautiful lunch with absolutely stunning views. Excellent service by Robert - very friendly and attentive throughout our lunch. I had the steak sandwich and my partner had the chicken burger. Very tasty and plentiful
Great view and meal, service perfect. Thank you steak was cooked to perfection and dessert was more than enough to share.

We had an incredible dinner! The wind caused our reservation to move inside, but the staff was accommodating and gave us a seat inside right next to the window. Our waiter, Blaz, was so kind, and the food was incredible. We definitely reccommend.
Absolutely amazing Ivan was a brilliant waiter. Book in advance. The food and drinks were absolutely worth every penny

This just ended our holiday to Dubrovnik with a high ..views to die for, food and service (Blaz our server-was so generous with his time and his recommendations were spot on. ) 
The food was amazing and the sunset over a Baileys coffee was a moment to remember.
Excellent views and food, staff extremely helpful especially Blaz who served us through our time up at the panorama
Ivan was the best waiter we’ve ever had! Meal & view were equally fantastic- highly recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik

Absolutely beautiful!! Blaz our waiter was very friendly and professional, could not do enough for us. He recommended a lovely Croatian wine. Food was awesome- I had sea bass. If you come to Dubrovnik it’s a must!

Amazing scenery, service and food. 

Was served by Blaz who explained all the amazing food, gave us great recommendations and let us try different wines before we bought a bottle. Must try G&T on the cocktail menu, best cocktail I have ever drank. A must when visiting Debrovinik. Just had an amazing time.

Beautiful views with delicious cocktails. There were many food options. I had a cocktail and a coffee that were tasty. I would highly recommend this restaurant as the view was lovely and the staff were delightful.

location: The Royal Town of Sutton Coldfield, United Kingdom
review:
We visited the Panorama restaurant for lunch and a lovely family meal. Fantastic steak sandwich. 
Great waiter, Blat.
Very polite and great service Thankyou

Firstly I'd like to thank Verdant who works behind the bar. Our paths cross in the morning whilst we were on the way to the old town. He made our booking for us to mark our special occasion. 

I can only describe it as the best table in the restaurant to watch sunset.

 Nevertheless, everyone that looked after us that evening went the extra mile. Nothing was too much for them as we asked to move inside at the end just to have our desserts due to the wind. 

The food and drinks were exceptional. Plenty to choose from. 

Highly recommended. Thank you for the complimentary drink, which was such kind gesture helping us celebrate.

I attended Panorama with my friends for my friends hen party. It was a fantastic experience from both the staff who served us to the atmosphere in the restaurant. The staff were very attentive, polite and well knowledgable on the wines and foods they served. We had a fantastic experience and recommend. Thank you!
We really enjoyed the food and the service especially the king prawns! Our waiter Blaç was very carrying. We will come back in summer!

Lovely food, service was great and friendly. The views are incredible! 

As a vegan there were limited options but what they did have was delicious!

Very good food and service! Blaž was very good and attentive! Amazing view!
You can see all Dubrovnik from the highest point of the restaurant.

The most amazing view and the food and service was amazing. Ivan looked after us very well. Book a front row seat and you can see the city and every direction. The veal risotto and the king prawns were awesome
Beautiful view in a wonderful setting. Staff super polite and welcoming. Food was very nice, as well as the strawberry amaretto cocktail. Complimentary cherry liquor a nice touch too 😊

We went to Panarama for lunch. It was excellent!
The food was great and the view was beautiful. 
The staff are welcoming and friendly, especially Ivan who was our server. 
Highly recommended.
Breathtaking views and wonderful food with very friendly service - if you visit Dubrovnik, this is a must on your bucket list
Great service, fantastic views! Recommend this restaurant for families. You can see the entire Dubrovnik from up here!

Very nice meal and view.
Especially Staff Robert is very kind and nice to us.
Thanks again. 
From South Korea women.kkkkkkk
Great view and great food. We had a very warm welcome and it is kid friendly. Delicious meals with something for everyone.

No words can describe the view you get from this lovely eatarie. The staff were very welcoming and attentive.
One of the staff offered to take our photo, with the lovely scenery in the back ground.
If you are ever visiting this amazing city, you could do a lot worse than visit this lovely restaurant.
Service personified!!
Wonderful experience - splendid view, delicious food, very nice service. Would certainly recommend it!
Fantastic lunch with the most amazing view over Dubrovnik. Ivan was excellent too - very attentive. Well worth the walk!
Ivan took great of care of us. The meal was delicious and the view amazing! Order the prawns and be prepared to get messy!!
Amazing service! All the waiters were great and the food was absolutely incredible 10/10. Would highly recommend to everyone!
