By coinsidence we found this restaurant on the top of Srd. We went up the path from the city in wonderful weather - not warm not hot! Since it was a little bit steep we deserved a beer, even though it was only 10.30. We asked if we could drink only and that is no problem this time of season. Two hours later we stil sat there and ate a wonderfull shrimp risotto and traditional creme dessert. Loveley atmosphere, kind waiters, fantastic view!!

Amazing lunch with even better views. We travelled by cable car up to the restaurant and all I can say is wow. The views were incredible. We were shown to our table which we booked prior, we had amazing views of Dubrovnik old town and the sea. We had lunch and drank beer and strawberry daiquiris which were delicious. The service was excellent, despite waiters and waitresses having to run up and down a lot of stairs to each table! We also received discount to their sister restaurants in the area which were equally delicious with great choice. Anyone visiting Dubrovnik needs to visit here, it’s a must.
Excellent place to eat, amazing view and the friendliest staff. I would recommend to anyone that wants to have a great time in Dubrovnik.
Food was very good. Generous portion and not overpriced. View of course is fantastic. We ate outside which can be a challenge depending on wind/weather.

Booked in advance which is advisable. I had issues with booking on the website but emailed directly and had a reply within 20 minutes confirming a booking in the seating area 1, which has the most spectacular views of the sea and old town
Service was attentive, food good quality and portion sizes plentiful 
Cable car costs extra but the whole experience was a highlight of our trip and would recommend

Such a beautiful view! Absolutely loved the experience! We rode the cable car up which was amazing, ordered some bellinis, chicken salad and steak sandwich. The weather was beautiful with a gentle breeze and sunshine. The staff was so nice too!

We arrived at 12:15pm on a Saturday afternoon after a long walk up the hiking trail to get there. We asked if we could have a table with a better view, we were told they had a lot of bookings at 1pm but we could take one of the tables in the meantime. The views from the top really are incredible. A nice cold beer was perfect after our hike and the food was absolutely brilliant. I was expecting a usual tourist trap place with overpriced average food but this was far from. We both had a burger and they were beautiful. It gets very windy up there as you would imagine, so staff were rushing about all the tables with heaters (you also have blankets on the chairs). At the end we were also given a 10% off voucher for other restaurants in the same chain, so we headed to Dubravka 1836 for dinner that evening (also highly recommend).
Wow!! Visited two of these bars, very popular but limited seating available. The views are amazing espically the sunsets.

My husband surprised me with a visit here for our 8th wedding anniversary last Monday (24th October) and wow! What a place! We took the cable car up to the restaurant which was an experience in itself (I’m scared of heights but it wasn’t so bad!) and once at the top, it’s just unbelievable…wouldn’t have missed that view for the world and not that bad even if you’re scared of heights like me! 
We sat down to eat whilst the sun was still up and ate and drank as the sun went down, watching the old town below start to light up and it was beautiful. Very romantic too! The most gorgeous location we’ve ever eaten at (and we went to Hawaii for our honeymoon!) 
The service was fantastic, Vedran! What a lovely man! Very attentive, friendly and funny; kept cracking jokes and made the experience even better. And the food!!!! Oh my goodness, delicious! Portions were very generous and because we got up there a little earlier than planned, we had time to let out huge two courses go down before sharing a delicious dessert (chocolate walnut cake…*drool*)
Thank you all for an amazing meal and experience. It’s the thing from our holiday to Dubrovnik that we’ve talked about the most and thank you Vedran for being so lovely too!

The perfect place to book a table for cocktails and food at sunset. 
They provide blankets at the table and have outdoor heaters for when the sun sets so you don’t feel the cold. 
Food was lovely, and cocktails were a winner. 
Not the cheapest place to go, but you get what you pay for at the end of the day.
The food presentation and taste were so impressive and the service was so warm and welcoming. But you just can’t describe how impeccable the view is! This is a must when visiting Dubrovnik!

Amazing wiew, great food, great wine and great service. We were lucky to sit at the table right on the edge but all the tables offer fantastic view. With such location / view it is a massive tourist place and it often means that the restaurant does not have to care about the food/menu too much - NOT the case here. Go for the local style pork chop!
Great food, great service, great view. This place has a monopoly but doesn’t behave like it does. Thoroughly recommend the cable car trip; the restaurant and the museum.

Lovely place to have come drinks and food! Beautiful to watch the sun set. 

I had the premium burger I do recommend if you love a burger
Amazing experience, views out of this world , food and service first class, highly recommend it to anyone visiting .
Had lunch here. The staff was professional and attentive. The food was great and the view was amazing! Highly recommend!

An absolute must for incomparable views of Dubrovnik. Food was by far the best we had during our trip, albeit pricey (to be expected given the fact that it is, in part, a tourist attraction all on its own). 

We had the steak sandwich (seems to be popular) and a ham and cheese sandwich. Really loved the steak sandwich.

Very nice place. Delicious food and nice waiters. We had made a reservation to the front terrace, and we recommend that. Beautiful view. We did not freeze bc they provided a heating lamp and blankets. We loved the kittens playing around our table.

Took the Calle car up to the top and went for a lovely afternoon’s light meal was amazing food delicious views amazing. We had a steak sandwich and a chicken salad and some drinks. Would recommend to go a must when visiting this beautiful city
Arrived later than expected but, still soo soo welcoming! Unbelievably good food and service! Thank you so much! Not to mention- the views! Stunning- even at night!

Went to see the views and stayed for the food - what a great decision. Staff were friendly and attentive and the food was perfect. We only stayed for lunch - steak sandwich with fries but it was perfectly cooked and finished a perfect experience to remember.
great views of the old town dubrovnik. Great food and drinks with a view that cant be beaten. Always worth a visit

Definitely worth waiting to eat for the day until you sample this restaurant. We only ate simple food, a burger, chicken salad, ham & cheese toastie all with fries and a couple of beers but oh my what a view. All reasonably priced too.
Very professional polite service, you’ve got to do this!!

This is a once in a lifetime experience. The views from the restaurant are spectacular and absolutely breathtaking. The members of staff were very welcoming and catered to our every need. The food was out of this world, the best meal I’ve ever had. The portion sizes are big and you definitely get what you are paying for. I would recommend booking a reservation before planning on going like I did. We had front row seat , which where fantastic.

We visited here while staying in Dubrovnik. We went up in the cable cart and had an amazing experience! The service was fabulous, food was delicious and the views incredible! Would 100% recommend and would definitely return.

We visited the Panorama restaurant on the recommendation of a friend who visited earlier in the summer. We travelled up via the cable car that gave beautiful views of the old town. We had pre-booked online for a front row table. Our waiter was fantastic and the service impeccable. The food was absolutely delicious and we will definitely be back next time we visit Dubrovnik.

Operator error, me, thought I had reservations when I actually didn’t, the were so kind and gave me the option of an earlier time, which we immediately accepted!

Panorama Restaurant will be on our list of must do every time we are in Dubrovnik!

Starting with their kindness to accommodate us, a wonderful front row table, with a view that takes your breath away, an exceptionally tasty dinner with some fine wine…this made the top three list of most memorable part of the vacation!

Thank you to the staff at Panorama for taking such good care of us! We will definitely be back!
our server Blaz was fantastic, great food, beautiful location! would 100% recommend to anyone visiting croatia!!

First, the service here is absolutely first-rate.

We’d booked for 9pm but went up earlier and they fitted us in at 6.30. 

The views are stunning. This is a must-do to see across the town and the beautiful vista. 

Menu was extensive. I had the chicken for main that could have done with a little more flavour but the burrata with strawberries was divine. 

The cats are friendly and cute. 

If you want to go for dinner I suggest you book 3-6 weeks in advance for sunset times.
Vlaž gave us great service with the best view of Dubronik without any doubt! Highly recommend the espresso martini. If possible ask for table 107!
Very good lunch with great food and excellent service from Blaz and the team. Would reccomend to all history who use the Dubrovnik Cable Car.

I was worried this would be a tourist trap type place but I’m happy to report I was wrong! Fantastic food, I can recommend the salmon and chicken quite happily. Service was great, our waiter Blaz made us feel like we were in a high class restaurant. It’s not cheap but absolutely worth doing at least once in your stay.

Great food and Drinks, amazing views. But terrible service. Was supposed to be a five star service but had to spend 20 mins trying to get a waiter attention but eventually just had enough and walked up. Moody from the start
Excellent views, food and service. Will definitely be coming back. We had the seafood past and stark sand which and definitely recommend

Me and my wife had an evening meal which we booked will I’m advance knowing how popular this restaurant is and it didn’t disappoint.

We took the cable car 🚡 up and back down which was expensive at £20 each but for us was part of the experience, locals suggest trying to find a local who will drive you up the old road for half the price but we wanted the experience.

We booked our table for 17:30hr which still mean we could order on the lunch time menu as this food was more to our liking and much much cheaper! We also planned this with the sun setting at 18:22hrs knowing we’d have a beautiful view over looking the whole city. The cable car only runs until 21:00hrs so again useful for getting back down on time.

There was a heater and blanket each to keep us warm as sadly as the evening went on the wind made it rather chilly however these added touches help perfectly but I’d advise taking a jacket.

My wife ordered a cocktail which she said was one of the best she’s ever had and I pint of larger. We both ordered mains and a pudding to share which was huge as one of the cakes of the day (cheaper than the ice cream). The total bill was £66 and the best meal and evening experience we’ve had in Dubrovnik.

The staff were very friendly and polite and always to hand if needed.

We planned this for our 1 year anniversary meal and it didn’t disappoint 🌅

Food and service were excellent. The views were breathtaking and the ride up and back in taxi was an adventure. Did not do the tram, as our guide told us earlier, it's a bit expensive and you get "the best view from the top" : ) They allow you 2 hours to eat so make your reservations around sunset.
Loved every minute of being in this beautiful place! The views, drinks and food were worth the trouble to get there!

This is a must if your in Dubrovnik, view is spectacular! Food is average at best but totally forgivable due to view 

Cons : communal toilets to have they visitors 
Pros: view

We risked it and arrived without a reservation. They were very accommodating and found us a table, but don't expect one of the best tables (with un-interrupted view of the sunset over the Old Town and coast) unless you book in advance. Food was a bit pricey, but very good quality, and the staff couldn't have been more helpful

Visited for dinner during our Dubrovnik stopover. We had a nice evening with the best aspect being the friendly service, staff do a great job. We were in 2nd row so no views to speak of, if we ever return would only do so if we could get first row views. Also bring a jacket although electric heaters and blankets are provided.

Food and the service was was all very good. We had the sun shine which made the whole experience even better.
Would recommend a visit either by car or cable car.
Blac was the best waiter!! He was so friendly and nice. He also describes all the dishes we asked about including the wine. And they even held the cable car for us!!
Book ahead to get best tables - it's worth it! Great waiter and food was excellent. Truly memorable evening and sunset views.

It was a little windy, and the front of house team were very accommodating and move us to a window seat.

Amazing service!

Thank you

Dinner at Panorama at sunset is a wonderful experience capped off with good food, wine and service. Taking the the cable car up is part of the fun experience. I highly recommend booking early and getting a "front row" table with the best views of the city at sunset. I was a bit worried that the food wouldn't live up to the overall experience, but that was not the case at all. The food was delicious and the service was helpful and attentive. It made for a wonderful evening out in Dubrovnik.

We had a lovely lunch outside on the terrace with a nice jazz music vibe in the background. Food and wine were great and service from Josep was first class. A definite recommend on a trip to Dubrovnik - allow more time than you think to really enjoy the setting.
View is stunning and service and food were great. Antonio was a great host. If your looking for a quick bite and to take in views of Dubrovnik Old Town this is the place to go.
Wonderful views, gorgeous food and brilliant service! Staff couldn’t do enough and would recommend the cable car up. Daiquiris are lovely.
Excellent service and great food. We had steak sandwich which was superb. Friendly and attentive staff. The most amazing view

Visited Panorama restaurant in the hope we could sit outside to take in the views, but unfortunately the wind took over, but we happily sat inside instead. Staff and service were excellent, nice menu and the view is incredible. Well worth a visit to relax and appreciate the stunning scenery and experience the wonderful atmosphere. Highly recommend!

Beautiful restaurant at the top of the cable car viewing platform. We were lucky to visit on a clear blue sky sunny day, you can see the whole of Dubrovnik which is stunning. Great menu including lunchtime classics like burgers and salads. Very friendly and efficient staff who were happy to take photos too. We went for lunch but I imagine sunset would be lovely too. Book in advance and request front row table.
The view from the bar is stunning, best at the sunset. Stopped there just for some drinks: nice cocktails but slightly expensive.
We came up the hill by cable car then ate dinner at panorama. Food, wine was excellent. Definitely a great evening with a view like this.

Amazing night with an amazing sunset 
I can’t recommend this restaurant more- perfect way to end our holiday
Amazing food and a stunning view. Excellent service, very well looked after and heaters and blankets are provided after the sun sets
Excellent place specially sunset view here is best in town. Simply loved the food and staff is super friendly specially Nicola. He made us very comfortable. Enjoyed each second here.❣️
Amazing food in am amazing location. Fantastic views and well looked after by Antonio.a must visit whilst your in Dubrovnik
Great food, best view EVER , Anthony our waiter for the evening was very knowledgeable and attentive, throughly recommend
Genuinely amazing views and lovely food. Blaz and Antonio were great especially as were vegan & were both really helpful. If you’re in Dubrovnik, get yourself to this restaurant

Great service, awesome views and delicious food is all you could say about this place.
Totally recommended

So glad we came here.

Our other dining experiences in the old town were average at best. Sure this place is expensive, but the quality is so high. I really wish I’d gone for the steak as there were so many flavours on my husbands plate, but the calamari and rice was also very well executed.

Service - which seemed to be a bit of an issue in the other restaurants we visited- was exemplary. It was a cool evening and we were very lucky to be able to be fitted into the main restaurant rather than sitting outside.

The queue for the cable car at sunset was a lot bigger than we had anticipated, so leave a bit more time than you think you’ll need. We caught an Uber back to our hotel at Lapad which was cheaper than the cable car for two and the gentleman stopped at an amazing viewpoint for photos of Dubrovnik at night.

The views are just amazing - pictures don't do it justice. We chose this restaurant as our very last meal in Croatia after spending two weeks there. While in Croatia we ate truly amazing food many times. We didn't feel Panorama's food lived up to our other amazing food experiences.. especially considering the high cost. If you're hesitating in deciding whether or not to make a reservation, there are multiple places to pull off the road near the restaurant to take pictures and see the amazing views.

Today me and my husband took the cable car up to the top of Mount Srd. Aside from the amazing views the Panorama Restaurant is well worth a visit. We had a "light bite" which was exceptional and very filling. Accompanied by a lovely cold bottle of croatian Pinot Grigio. The service was exceptional. We were lucky to get a table despite not having reserved but would definitely recommend booking in advance as its very popular and larger parties who hadn't booked did have to wait.

We enjoyed very much in a family lunch. Special thanks to our waitor Josip, He was so kind and made our experiance even better! Delicious food with fresh local ingrediants, beautifull ambiant, cozy fealing, nice music, breathtaking wiew… best coffee… We will be comming back for sure!

The views of Dubrovnik are incredible, so I’ve rated this place as Excellent as it really is an experience in itself to just sit here. 

Cocktails are great although very expensive, however we knew to expect high prices due to the excellent location.

We visited at lunchtime and booked in advance so we were guaranteed a table. Lunch was okay, we had a salad and a ham and cheese toastie. The toastie was average, quite dry and cheese not melted. However I didn’t mind as we were here for the views. 

Excellent experience and highly recommended.
The view is amazing, we arrived early and they managed to squeeze us in by the city view. The staff were all completely lovely and took great care with making sure we had a fantastic experience.

The views from this place are beautiful! We got given a lovely table overlooking the island. The service was really friendly and were stunned at how good the food was and the portion sizes! Lots of choice for vegetarians too.
We couldn’t get a booking but managed to get a walk in without any wait. Beautiful views over the old town, great cocktails, beautiful food and the service was top class.
Arrived soaked after walking up and they were very welcoming. Our light lunches were spot on and the views across the peninsula are superb! Service is 5 fantastic

Our travel agent made us this reservation when we booked our trip to fabulous Croatia 3 months in advance. She got us primo seats and the views were spectacular! The cable car was not running due to wind so we took a cab. Lucky for us we had a very good and charming driver! He stopped on the way up and had us pose for pictures which he took and will be using for our Christmas card:). Normally, and probably typically in the States, touristy must see restaurants are cool but not typically that good food wise. I was pleasantly surprised by how delicious the food was. Also, our cocktails were really good too! As far as price, maybe pricey for Croatia standards but for us and what we are used to, totally reasonable!! The waiter even took 10% off because we had to wait too long for the meal for his liking. We didn't even notice! My advise if traveling to Dubrovnik, get the reservation!!

I had heard good reviews of this place from friends. 

I booked 3 weeks in advance and could not get a sunset table so opted for lunch. 

The food we ordered: vegetarian bowl, beef carpaccio, seafood trio, steak and salmon fillet. 

All dishes were presented beautifully, cooked very well, had fantastic flavours and of a really high standard. 

The beef carpaccio was the best I have ever had! The flavours of the beef, wholegrain mustard, cream cheese and cheese crispies were a perfect combination. 

The service was really good and the view spectacular.

After a short trip up in the cable car, we arrived at the top where the Panorama restaurant is situated. The view over Dubrovnik is stunning. We were seated at a ‘1st row’ table with frontline views. The service was quick, efficient and friendly. The menu is fairly limited but enough to suit most tastes. Above average prices but that’s to be expected for the location. Two mains, two drinks, a salad & two coffees roughy £75. All in all worth a visit. The only thing that’s slightly annoying are the flies - and the occasional wasp much to my to partners horror who has a phobia of the wee blighters!
Breathtaking views, good service and lovely staff. Food nice too and cocktails amazing. A nice breeze, can get a bit chilly if the suns not out. Definitely recommend

Nice staff, nice food, the view of Dubrovnik is magnificent!
The ovner wass there and you can see that he cares and that he keeps everything up to par.
Staff are well dress, with smile. 
They will give you a better table if a seat becomes available. 
We came there with cable car and we pass by kitchen window and saw happy staff in kitchen, it was soo nice!
We saw sun set and then the moon rise. It was beautiful.
This was such a special evening. Service was great - complete with blankets and space heaters when it got chilly. Food was amazing with stunning views as well. Not to be missed.

We have Travelled the world & have been extremely lucky to have eaten in some wonderful locations yet this restaurant is up there with the best Views / Sunset / Food and especially being served by a wonderful young waiter with incredible knowledge about food wine and his country’s culture. 
if you able to choose a waiter ask for Antonio aka Tom Cruise look a like .
Sunset views, city light panorama and the best food in town. If you’re in Dubrovnik, this is a must. It completed our stay.

We expected a gorgeous view but were so pleasantly surprised by the superior cuisine and first-level sophisticated service! My sea bass and husband’s pork dish were particularly delicious. And our waiter couldn’t have been kinder or more professional. This is not what you expect from a touristic “view” restaurant! Such a treat. Highly recommended.

Very popular restaurant , I would advice you to book beforehand. We visited on a Saturday evening after our ride in the cable car, but we waited nearly an hour for a table, but it was worth the wait. The food was delicious and the view over the city was awesome. Highly recommend.

Had a great dinner with amazing, michellin quality food and great service by waiter Antonio. 
The views are spectacular. Highly recommend the lamb chops and the almond cake.

What a wonderful delight. Not only was the view from the restaurant epic, our wine, dinner and warm dessert capped off a great night. Our server, Vedran was so attentive, knew history, foods and warm blankets as the breeze came up. Cheers Vedran!

Food was excellent. Steak was tasty and very well presented. Salmon was huge and had lovely side dishes. Prosecco and beer we're good. Pudding of hazelnut cake was just ok, but nice to finish with something sweet. Waiting on staff were nice and the view was wonderful, great sunset over the town. Only issue is the access to the restaurant. Walk- 40+ minutes (very steep and in the heat not good if you're going for a nice meal!!) Taxi was over €45 return and the bubble car up was about €50 return (which seemed a lot considering it took minutes once on it) Quite expensive, but given food and location, was worth it overall.
Amazing view with delicious cakes. Staff was friendly and helpful. Don’t arrive before 10 am if you want to order starters and entrees. Only cakes are available before 10.

The best food experience of our trip. Food was delicious and tge view is amazing. I recommend the espresso martini. Service was perfect. It was a little windy and we were offered blankets and had a heater to keep us warm.

We had a late lunch here on a windy day when the cable car was closed for a few hours so it was fairly quiet to start but busied up when the cable car started running again

We had a reservation and were seated promptly and a couple of beers arrived shortly after. 

The service from our waiter Robert was friendly and very efficient. The food was absolutely outstanding. We shared a prawn risotto which was genuinely one of the best we’ve ever eaten. 

We then had chef’s king prawns in a pot with garlic bread which was excellent. 

Finally the strawberry cheesecake was super. All washed down with a Laroche Chablis. 

All in all with this being a tourist trap with outstanding views I didn’t have high expectations for the food and service but boy was I pleasantly surprised. 

If you get chance definitely visit this restaurant, it’s a real gem not to be missed
Lovely meal in fantastic location and marvellous view. Whilst in Dubrovnik this is a must do experience. Not cheap but in my view well worth it.
We only had cocktails, but the views made for a wonderful evening. The outdoor bar area had cocktail tables and wait staff.

Beautiful restaurant with several steps for seating areas. Not all seating can see the sunset. Need reservation otherwise you can't be seated. Be aware to request the right side of the restaurant though. Good food a bit expensive.
Located at the top of the cable car. Not the cheapest beer, but then again Dubrovnik isn’t cheap, but the views are worth visiting for. Definitely wow views sitting at the edge looking down.
Stunning views overlooking Dubrovnik. The restaurant staff were friendly and the drinks, whilst a little more expensive than the town, we're nice and you were unhurried to vacate your table.
Super helpful and friendly staff, we hadn’t booked but they gave us a wonderful table overlooking Dubrovnik, the food was fabulous and awesome service.

Quality food with breathtaking views. Waiter Antonio done a superb. Service was top quality. I’ve been well dined around the globe and Antonio was on par with other top class waiters and that off double Michellin waiters. Great experience and

The most special evening we have had all week! We ended our holiday with this wonderful meal and experience. 

Our waiter was very kind and attentive 

Thank you Blaz
Lovely food, great atmosphere and a fabulous view. We were very well looked after by Blaz! Thank you!
Amazing place, great service from Josip and the food was fantastic almost as good as the view! Would recommend to book in case it’s busy!

The views, service and food in this restaurant definitely deserves a 5 star review. Yes it is pricey, but everything is pricey in Dubrovnik and this place is worth every kuna for the quality you receive. We booked a table for 6.45pm to enjoy the sunset and the night time view of the old town. We stayed for 2 hours. The food and wine was of a high standard for dinner (the menu is a little more relaxed for lunchtime before 6pm). 
We booked this 2+ months in advance to get a 1st row table and I’m glad we did.

This is one of the best restaurants i have ever been too. The view is unmatched, the service is excellent. The restaurant is informal without losing that sense of quality. The food was excellent and incredibly filling. The menu may be more expensive than you will find elsewhere but the restaurant is one of a kind. 10/10 you must visit if you are in Dubrovnik for the view alone.
The view along with our server, Vedran, made this a dinner we will never forget. He was very helpful teaching us about the Croatian wine, along with all menu questions. Must do!!!

Day six in Dubrovnik and the best meal we have had so far, amazing views. On arrival we were offered two table options, mountain side or inside with a view of the Old Town. Staff were lovely. Cocktails are great.

Myself and my partner came here for an early evening meal, and the food was absolutely delicious! Fantastic service, great view and the drinks were amazing too. Our server Robert went above and beyond to ensure our meal was perfect, and made the evening even better than expected!
Fantastic location and very good service. Blac was our waiter and he was exceptional. Get a front row table , great views
Beautiful view, good service, delicious cappuccino but a bit expensive (€6). +You get a 10% discount at 2 restaurants in the city.

Well worth a trip up in the cable car for a lovely meal with a stunning view! Antonio suggested a delicious wine, a bottle of Frenchie. Very apt as our dear friend we are with is called Frenchy. All in all a wonderful experience for my 50th. Thank you.
Antonio our waiter was great! Wonderful service and fabulous cocktails with a stunning view! A real highlight - we recommended!
World class view. Great Service. Good food. . A memorable meal! We highly recommend! Top notch! We enjoyed greatly overlooking the old city.
Blaz was a wonderful waiter. The food and view were the best so far in Dubrovnik! Delicious fresh food and cocktails!
We managed to get a booking for 9pm for a table for 4 overlooking Dubrovnik having come up on the cable car. Brilliant food and great service. Would recommend for a special occasion.

Cannot recommend this restaurant enough. 
It has the most breathtaking views I have ever seen, literally from every single angle! 
We had a 2nd row city view table and we were in awe of the view all night.
Definitely get a sunset booking if you can and book in advance to get city view (you get the best views of everywhere here).
The food is up there with one of the nicest meals I’ve ever had, we had a party of 6 and all ordered different - every one of us loved our meal. 
Definitely worth getting the cable car up as this really enhances the experience.

Beautiful scenery. Amazing view of Dubrovnik. 
Wait staff are very nice, friendly and accommodating. We had a great time. Would be back.

Our ride up the cable car from old town brought us to a spectacular view of Dubrovnik and the Adriatic. Absolutely BREATHTAKING. 

We heard, from many people, at the top of the ride awaited an amazing restaurant, Panorama. We didn’t have a reservation and planned on having a cocktail while on the beautiful patio overlooking the spectacular, expansive view of Dubrovnik’s old town and walled city.

Much to our surprise, after inquiring for a table, we were seated immediately for dinner. Seating is available indoors and also on a large, multilayered patio, all with unbelievable views. Every table outdoors was full…we were so lucky to be seated so quickly. 

Our amazing server, Blaž, greeted us and offered wonderful suggestions for appetizers, dinner, and wines. He was incredibly thoughtful and friendly. 

Blaž asked if we were celebrating … and we told him we were! My husband and I were enjoying our 35th anniversary … with our daughter, who recently had her 28th birthday. We planned this trip to celebrate both special occasions before our daughter left for a 9month Broadway tour.

After being served two deserts with huge fiery ‘candles’, Blaž and his colleague rushed to our table, gathered our wine glasses, desert, and all utensils…told us to “get up…get up, and follow us!” Blaž moved us to a table with an even MORE INCREDIBLE view….I literally cried tears of gratitude. What an amazing experience.

Thank YOUUUUU, Blaž and the entire Panorama staff! What a magical night!

Food and drinks were amazing. Great ambiance. Blaz was absolutely amazing. The best waiter on our trip so far. Deserves a day off or a pay raise. Gave us an amazing table with a great view and fabulous service. Would recommend him and this place many times.
We had a great time. Blaz was our waiter. The food and drinks were great (cheese board, sea bass, and dessert stood out), and views were sensational.
We pre booked as recommended by a friend and wasn’t disappointed. Food and service was excellent and the views were breath taking

There's a worry with sights like the observation points on Mount Srd that they are beautiful views with an indifferent restaurant attached. Nothing could be further from the truth with Panorama. The views over Dubrovnik and the Adriatic are stunning, but so is the food. Service was impeccable. The food was the best we've had in Croatia. Reservations strongly recommended for a table on the terrace for the best view of the city. Many thanks to Nikolai our waiter.

We could not praise panorama enough. From the food to the service to the view, everything was spectacular. Our waiter Robert’s attention to detail was next to none. He was superb and could not do enough for us. 100% recommend this place for dinner. We definitely will revisit and will be asking for Robert to serve us again, a credit to the team.
Is a must! Nikola was fantastic! Book early because food, drinks, service and unbelievable views are all here!

Romantic dinner on terrace edge. Beautiful view of Dubrovnik oldtown. Saw the sunset with sea view and the city lights after dark. Nikola was amazing server, very friendly, attentive and a professional photographer when requested. This is a must.

This is a great restaurant and I don’t say that lightly. Naturally it’s location is fantastic but they don’t rely on this. As well as the amazing view, their customer service is second to none and staff training is clearly a priority to them. All front of house staff are professional, knowledgable and attentive whilst still giving you plenty of space and you never feel rushed. The range of food and drink is wide and caters for all tastes and appetites but this does not detract from the quality. The food arrived promptly and was absolutely superb. They also have a number traditional dishes on the menu and some local wines. In addition the food was reasonably priced give. The location. Just as importantly though is the customer service offered by their management. We had an issue with our reservation but it was dealt with swiftly and their response could not have been better or more profession. They clearly put the customer first. It is due to the combination of all of these factors that I have to say that in my opinion this is the best restaurant in Dubrovnik. Thank you for a wonderful meal. We shall definitely return!
One of those places you just have to make the effort to see. Spectacular views with excellent food and friendly staff
Amazing dinner ! Great service and special shout to Peter for making our friends birthday so special
Fantastic view, great food, wonderful evening. Food and drink is more expensive than many other places in Dubrovnik, but definitely worth it for a special evening
Amazing food, views and service. Our waiter Blaz was exceptional!! Unbelievable customer service it’s a must visit while in Dubrovnik!!
Wow what a view! Enjoyed the cable car to the top and had a coffee break with cake in the restaurant. Good service and good cake.

The best place for drinks and food over the beautiful city of Dubrovnik. The food is yummy! And the cocktails... Over the moon!!! We came at the sunset during summer, one of the best moments of our trip. Thank you to the manager, to Antonio (he's the man), the beautiful Ivana at the reception and the bar tender Jure for the originals drinks. Highly recommended. We will be back!

We came here for our last evening in Dubrovnik, I would say pre-booking is essential. We pre-booked about a month before visiting and were only able to secure a 4.30pm table. We decided to take an Uber to the restaurant due to the queues of the cable car. Uber cost about £15 each way and was cheaper than the cable car as I believe that works out about £20 per person, each way. 

We arrived and were seated straight away, we had booked a second row table as that was all that was available but we were lucky to be upgraded to a first row view and it was amazing.

We ordered a selection of cocktails and 2 steak sandwiches, food, drink and service was amazing. We had a 2-hour booking and the time flew by.

Prices are slightly higher than most places but I would say it is worth it as a one off! 

I would say it is a must visit while in Dubrovnik but I would advise pre-booking as when we left there was a sea of people being turned away trying to get a table.
The ambiance and the view were amazing. But the most important thing was that the food was delicious. Antonio did a good job serving our table.

We chose Panorama Restaurant for our first luncheon in Dubrovnik. Fabulous views, and great food. We had a great experience thanks to Blaz and his team. The service was spot on and impeccable! The selection of food and drinks varied for all tastes. I have food intolerances and they kindly adapted to that and the meal was perfect! Our spot overlooked the view of the old city of Dubrovnik giving us that postcard experience.
The food was great! Fresh, done to perfection. Love their wine list.. I had one of my fave wines Sant Hills Posip and my husband accompanied his burger with a Karlovacka beer. Blaz was great! No waiting, food arrived in good time and we ended the meal with a nice treat of Cherry liquor!

Highly recommended!
Absolutely beautiful food served by friendly and informative staff in a perfect location with the best view! To add to this, a lot of their menu can be done gluten-free!

The view was incredible and so was the food! The service was great as well. Two members of the staff named Peter and Dominiqua were incredible and made this a much more memorable experience. Very deserving of five stars.
Such Spectacular views. Very Friendly staff and exceptionally tasty food. Definitely worth the trip on the cable cars.
Perfect food with a perfect view. Robert the waiter was very friendly and helpful on choices of wine . Highly recommended for anyone in Croatia to visit
The food and service was amazing. The view is absolutely superb! It worth a visit but you have to book in advance.

What a beautiful location! So so stunning.
Our waiter Blaz was very accommodating even moved us to a view side seat as a reservation didn’t turn up. The most incredible views. The food was beautiful. The premium burger was the best burger I’ve had and the Dalmatian trio was lovely to just pick at as we sipped our Long Island Ices teas taking in the beautiful surroundings. This is the place to be In Dubrovnik!
It is an amazing pleasure to have a pullover after riding the cable car. We were here during lunch hour. Nice service and great view. Thanks, Antonio for your service.

This place is stunning. The service was impeccable and the views even better. The food and drink were very lovely. A perfect way to spend a couple of hours, just a shame it was fully booked for a sunset dinner as I imagine that would be the only way to top it.
The friendliest service from everyone and the most amazing view. Thanks Antonio and the lovely lady who gave us a great table.
Beautiful place to chill and enjoy the view... Antonio was really nice and attentive... highly recommend

Do yourself a favor and visit this lovely restaurant while in Dubrovnik. This is my absolute favorite restaurant. The food is always fantastic and amazing and no matter what I order I am always delighted with my meal! Servers are also great and always efficient, happy and polite. The staff truly cares about your experience. Can’t wait to return and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend to anyone looking for somewhere to eat in Dubrovnik.

Highly recommend!
Food and service was amazing, views were stunning. The waiter Vedran was wonderful and very helpful.

The views from Panorama are unbelievable. Equally good was the food and service. Our server, Blaz, made the evening really special and every dish we ate was spectacular. We could happily come here every night!

This restaurant is superb. We only waited about 10 minutes for a table at lunch time. We were given a fantastic table at the edge with excellent views of Dubrovnik. We enjoyed lunch here with was very tasty and the staff were very attentive. Would recommend to anyone looking at going!

We came to the Panorama Restaurant for a quick bite and some cocktails. The views were amazing, as was the carpaccio. Nikola our server was the best we have had during our entire month long stay in Croatia. Thank you Nikola for providing a wonderful memory for us!

*5*
Excellent service from start to finish - food was absolutely amazing (Veal and forest risotto) and lovely atmosphere. A special mention to Nikola who couldn’t do enough for us. A definite must if visiting Dubrovnik!
Amazing food, amazing views, and amazing service. I cannot fault this place. The prices are very reasonable for what you get!

This is a must when coming out o Dubrovnik! Dubrovnik itself can be expensive but this is average price compared to others and a Meal and experience like no other . Next too none in our opinion. If you are booking , book in advance and book a front row table for about 6:30 you will get the day time view and the sunset in one sitting . Amazing

We spent our 25th Wedding Anniversary here and were made to feel very special. The food and service was first class. I would highly recommend. The views are breathtaking and the whole experience from start to finish was out of this world. Some of the best food we have had.
Marvellous view with quality service and food. As I said they good serve dog food and it would still have been worthwhile. Cable car up and down 🚠

What an amazing place to have the most wonderful ice coffee. We didn’t have lunch, but the food looked amazing. 
Staff are super friendly- a real treat on a beautiful Croatian morning.

Booked this far in advance to reserve a table in the front row to get the best view, this is an absolute must. The panoramic view of Dubrovnik is stunning, can't get a better view of Old Town. The food was pretty good but nothing incredible, but you come here for the view primarily. Good beer selection and cocktails were tasty

What an amazing experience! We had a fantastic lunch with delicious food, stunning views and a very welcoming staff. The cocktails are also a must have to add to the whole experience. For anyone looking a real treat in Dubrovnik, Panorama restaurant is for you. Book it now!

Show less
GORGOUS view of the city. Food way overpriced for ok food, ok service. The round trip cable car made our total bill for two people close to $200 usd. Cool experience but not worth that amount.

We had a wonderful experience here. The views are stunning, the service was excellent and the food and cocktails were delicious. It was a perfect night. Special shout out to our waiter Petar, he was so friendly, helpful, efficient and just an all round wonderful waiter.

If you’re looking for a place to go for dinner- book here. The views are amazing, you can see all of Dubrovnik old town while you eat very nice food. The staff couldn’t be more attentive, always topping up your glass. Our waiter Vedren was lovely and very informative. Lovely place to go!

Wow wow wow ! We booked this place based on location, food was secondary for us. The entire experience from start to finish exceeded all of our expectations! 
Of course, first off, on arrival we were BLOWN away by the location, however we got the whole package ......menu and standard of cuisine was excellent, service was fun friendly and efficient. 
We pre booked our front row table way in advance, and I have to say it did not disappoint. 
The entire experience was unforgettable. 
Not the cheapest meal we had in Dubrovnik, but was well worth what we paid . 
We ll be back !
Incredible views and the food matched it! The service was brilliant too! Best meal we have had in Croatia! Definitely worth the visit!

We are a family of 3. 2 adults and one 10 year old. We took the cable car up the mountain and decided to have a drink in the panorama restaurant. Our waiter served us super quickly and was very chatty recommending things to do and giving us a voucher for 10% off at partner restaurants in Dubrovnik. We visited the war museum on his recommendation which we found very interesting and it had the bonus of amazing views of Dubrovnik from the top.

Nikola went above and beyond to ensure my wife’s birthday meal was perfect. We had prearranged cocktails on arrival, followed by beautiful starters and mains. The steak sandwich is to die for! Then as a surprise, a ‘happy birthday’ dessert complete with sparkler arrived at our table. Nikola had superb knowledge of the wine list and recommended a bottle of delicious dry white, which my wife ended up ordering an extra glass. All of this, mixed with the spectacular views made for our best evening in Croatia to date. Thank you Panorama, thank you Nikola.

Amazing views over the city. We had a few cocktails - priced seemed reasonable, they were really well presented and delicious.
Service was fine - although the waiter seemed a bit disinterested /inconvenienced up until the point when he asked us to leave a review and he perked up then.. 

Great experience if you take the cable car or hike up the hill.
Lovely setting with tables scattered so you all get a great view in the shade. We had a cooling drink and sat and took in the view for a few moments not rushed and friendly service

We had heard fantastic things about the Panorama restaurant. It had been highly recommend to us for somewhere to celebrate our 20th Anniversary whilst in Dubrovnik. 
We were not disappointed!

From the very start with the ride up to the restaurant by cable car (200 kuna per person) to the stunning vista, the beautifully presented/delicious food and the flawless service it was a meal to remember. 
A special mention is needed for Peter, our waiter for the evening. He was absolutely superb. Very attentive and nothing was to much trouble. He made us feel both comfortable and unrushed. A true credit to the restaurant. 

We found the food to be reasonably priced with the gorgeous view as the cherry on the cake!

We booked early evening to watch the sunset. This was soooo beautiful and added to our Anniversary memories of Dubrovnik. 

If you have time and are able to book whilst visiting Dubrovnik you won't be disappointed. 
You're welcome 😊
Wonderful for couple, service is really nice. We will come back again with discount this time……………..
Amazing visit with amazing staff and views, shoutout to Nikola who’s service was exceptional. Blankets are a great touch when dining after sunset!
The food, the service, the views - all perfect. Could not fault. Would return in a heartbeat. Thank you!

Amazing experience of dinner and dessert with a wonderful view made all the more greater because of the pleasant Ivan who gave us great service.

Aden
We had a great experience! Lovely view and amazing food! Highly recommend. Antonio our waiter was really kind.

an incredible view just magnificent, the staff is very friendly in this incredible place.
I recommend this place
Unreal view of the old city with delicious food. Highly recommend, it’s worth the wait in line for the cable car. Food was delicious and the wait staff very attentive.

I made this a priority whilst staying in Dubrovnik with my husband. We travelled up via cable car and thankfully seated at a great table.
The views are Wow and the ambience is romantic and the views of sunset also add to the mood.
You will not be disappointed! 
Food and cocktails are just divine and heavenly and you will be upset when it’s time to leave it’s that truly wonderful x

I booked this for our first evening in Dubrovnik so we could overlook the old town. The view was everything I hoped it would be. We were running late due to traffic - HUGE TIP do not take a taxi here, get the cable car as we made the mistake of going via taxi and it took so long and the road approaching the restaurant is a single track but two ways so it just gets grid locked... we got out and walked in the end and got the cable cart back to the old town after our meal. Luckily, I called ahead and explained and the staff were great, I was concerned we would loose our table but they held it for us. Once seated and more relaxed the service made us feel even more settled - attentive and polite. The waiters have time to talk to you and take photos if you ask. At one point my other half got up and knocked the table which sent one of our drinks flying. The staff were great and replaced it for us. The food was amazing too. The only thing which lets this place down ever so slightly is the toilets as you have to walk all the way around to where the cable cart is coming and going and the toilets have a bit of a public toilet feel to them. I would recommend a visit to Panorama to everyone staying in Dubrovnik. Make sure you book to see this in the daylight and as the sun sets too!
Incredible service, food and cocktails, very very happy! Best meal we've had in dubrovnik and we felt so welcome
Great views, great food and Blaz our waiter made our visit so enjoyable. Well worth making the effort to book in advance a real experience

Amazing lunch in a beautiful setting with views of the Old Town.
Ask for a terrace seat when you book ti avoid disappointment. 
Waiter had an excellent knowledge of local wines which were superb.

We had a nice Time during out Trip in this restaurant. Antonio was a great waiter, he anticipates All what you want. Best service, thanks antonio. And the view is awesome. Best pictures over the tops of dubrovnik

Could not fault the service or food. Really chilled atmosphere and our waiter Blaz was great. Funny and very attentive. 

Worth a visit to watch the sunset over the old town and the adriaric

The views were amazing. Definitely make sure to have a reservation way in advance to secure a table close to the end which provides the best views. Staff was also very friendly and went out of their way to take some amazing pictures of us as well. In addition to the views, the food was amazing! Our favorite was the steak, it was cooked perfectly and the garnishes were delicious as well. A must try in Dubrovnik!
Amazing staff - incredible views. The food was great too! Make a reservation to be sure you get the best view.
Went to this beautiful picturesque restaurant today, excellent service by Vedran! Food was delicious. Would highly recommend a visit

Perfect service and dishes, the risotto with shripms and courgettes was perfectly cooked and really tasty, also the octopus salad was perfect. We had also one piece of cake and one cocktail, both too were perfect.
Amazing restaurant with great food and views would 100% reccommend, Blaz was a great host! Also when if it’s cold of an evening they bring blankets and heaters
What a great experience! We took the cable car up for the view and decided to have lunch at Panorama. Excellent service and good basic food. But with that view the experience can’t be beat.

Having unable to get the booking at the desired time, we got the reservation for 10:30 am. The staff is wonderful, views are amazing and the food and drinks are top class. This place is not to be missed.

Fantastic views / great food and cocktails.
Amazing to see at Sunset. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Really made my friends 40th Birthday celebrations special. The cable car is sooooo easy, recommend pre-booking the tickets though!
Staff were faultless, as was the food. Put together with the views, you cannot ask for any more!!!!!

We had a nice lunch in the Panorama restaurant after we walk all the way to the top of the mountain, it was really nice food and service, special mention to our waitress Vedran,he was really attentive and friendly during our time there. We will come back!
It was an incredíble experience, since the view from the waitor Antonio… and THE FOOD!! It is a must!!!!

The restaurant views are stunning, especially at night when Dubrovnik city is all lit up. I managed to book a table in the front row, I booked this 1 month in advance and it was the last table left so booking is essential, especially when you need to pay 200 kuna each to get to it in the cable car. The food was amazing! Best meal I had in Dubrovnik. Highly recommend.
Our visit was very nice. The view is fantastic and the staff even better. They are very professional. I would especially like to praise the hostess Ana and the waiters Goran and Marija
Great views and great staff, Ana, Goran and Marija were very proffesional and nice! Make sure you get the table that is closest to the railling because its the prettiest
Excellent staff and cocktails. The view of the old town is breathtaking. Well worth booking a table by the front terrace for the full effect.
The food and views are out of this world. The servers were friendly, attentive and fun. Really recommend Panarama, there is nowhere else quite like it!!
Really delicious food with amazing view and fantastic service. Food portion is huge, best lasagna I’ve ever had in Europe.
Beautiful location for a coffee! Booked up for dinner at least a week in advance and I can see why as the setting is very special.
Lovely stop for a drink after getting the cable car up, most amazing view and ambiance. Highly recommend
Had a lovely meal, but what made the experience all the more better was the views from the front terrace and the service received from Robert who was attentive and very welcoming.

Restaurant Panorama definitely lived up to the expectations. If your in search of a romantic dinner for a special occasion in Dubrovnik then look no further. The views over the city from the table were stunning, the food was delicious and Nikola was a delightfully kind and attentive waiter. We got an Uber to the restaurant which was very easy but you can also take the cable car into the city.

Five stars are for the food and service. Had the best waiter in the restaurant, Robert. He was polite and tentative. He knew a lot about the food and wine options and also had some interesting facts about the local area. Couldn’t have asked for a better waiter.
Nikola was the best server. Def come here for the food and the view. Get the sea bass and the apple pie. Take the cable car from old town so you don’t drink and drive.

We had wonderful food in this absolutely beautiful setting. We visited in mid July for a spot of lunch. There was a little wait for our table (we hadn't booked ahead) but it was so worth it. We sat in our own alcove right on the front (the restaurant has terraced seating) with uninterrupted views of Dubrovnik Old Town, islands and the Adriatic Sea. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Definitely a highlight of our visit to Croatia and highly recommended.

Absolutely fantastic meal & visit to Panorama restaurant. Our waiter Ivor was so friendly & welcoming, the girls on the reservations desk were also very good & fitted us in despite no reservation. One of the highlights of our trip to Dubrovnik. 5 stars a must visit!
We had a fantastic night at panorama, highly recommend. The food was amazing and the service was 10/10
Very welcoming and accommodating staff. Amazing service! Beautiful view! I highly recommend visiting and dining at this restaurant.
Panorama restaurant has the most amazing views. Fantastic food and great service. Strongly recommend

The food and atmosphere was fabulous! When I made reservations a month before coming I could only get very late at night or their first seating in the morning. I made my reservation for the first seating in the morning. We decided to take the cable car up the day before we were coming to eat here and saw that the restaurant was fairly empty at around 6 PM. We were able to get a wonderful 
table and cancel the next day’s reservation. It seems that the reservations are just for the front tables. Our waiter was amazing the food was fabulous and everyone should come here!
Insane view and fantastic service from Ivan. The food and drinks were good and well worth a visit if you are in Dubrovnik.
A must do when in Dubrovnik food as always in Dubrovnik amazing and the view beautiful. Make sure to check out the fortress for some amazing panorama shots without the cable car and the history
The best views possible while sipping a glass of rose after a scenic gondola ride up. Also a nice breeze off the sea to cool you down.
Amazing view and service, Thanks a lot for this moment, thank to Ivan! We recommend this place if you come to visit Dubrovnik

My family and I came to Panorama Restaurant on our first evening in Dubrovnik for dinner. We had made a reservation for 6pm so we were able to get seated right away in a very nice table with a breathtaking view of Dubrovnik. Our incredible waiter, Vedran, came by to take our order for drinks and food very quickly and was really great at giving us recommendations/checking in without making us feel rushed at all. He was amazing! We got some delicious complimentary free bread for the table (three types: one with seeds, plain white, and egg bread- reminded me of challah?) with olive oil and balsamic. All delicious. For food we all shared:

Assorted Cheeses and olives: this was a perfect appetizer to share! Came with bread, olives, plumpy sundried tomatoes, and different types of cheeses that ranged in textures and flavors but were pretty mild overall and not overpowering.

Octopus Terrine: amazing dish! Has generous amounts of octopus with a creamy sauce that balanced out the flavor of the octopus. One of my favorite dishes of the night. Super fresh and high quality. 

Beef Carpaccio: another great dish with thin slices of raw beef, complimented with Dijon mustard, Parmesan chips, and this delicious truffle dip. Comes with this very light and thin bread on the side so you can pair them together. 

Sea bass fillet: in a white wine and butter sauce with clams. Literally so amazing. The sea bass was grilled to perfection and felt very fresh. Came with plenty of clams and had that delicious sauce which really brought the dish together and complimented the flavors of the fish. 

Slice of cake of the day: there were 4 cakes of the day (cheesecake, white chocolate almond, apple) but we opted to get the chocolate and walnut cake! This was out of this world. Not too sweet itself and we asked for a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Has lingonberries which were tangy and really balanced the chocolate flavor. It also comes with shaved almonds, and little crumbles of biscuit that adds a mild crunch to this dessert!! 

The food was obviously outstanding but the ambiance was unreal. They had romantic/calming music playing the whole night at the perfect volume which really enabled a great energy in this place. We were able to keep the table until 8:45 so had the opportunity of seeing the amazing sunset from up there with all the tasty food. Truly one of the most memorable dining experiences of my life! Prices are reasonable, service is outstanding (shoutout to Vedran again!), and the ambiance is unparalleled. So happy we came here and I would highly
recommend to anyone who finds themselves in Dubrovnik for the first time.

If you didn't visit this place it's like you didn't see Dubrovnik,i mean literally in this case not just because of view and sunset wich is amazing,but because of everything else,very profesional and really honest and helpfully waiters even if it's restaurant very busy it's seems calm, they have always time for you AMAZING. we just enjoyied in everything,very tasty and delicious food here you can try croatian traditional food and also delicious various of meat specialites. Place is ABSOLUTELY MUST GO and worth of every price.Just Beautiful ❤️

First meal in Dubrovnik. Booked terrace front row tables about a month ago. We were a party of four and they were so accommodating and moved us together and still with a great view, considering it was at peak times of sunset viewing, Saturday evening and high season!
Service is what I gave 5 stars for, ultimately. Professional, pleasing and highly efficient.
The standout dishes were the octopus terrine, the meat was so soft and melt in the mouth, with amazing flavours complimenting the dish, and the sea bass was just perfect! The fish was so fresh and done well. 
Breads and dips were offered generously before the mains arrived. 
My friend's Long Island iced tea hit the spot by his account!
It's at the higher end, price wise, but totally worth it for a special occasion.

We made reservations for shortly before sunset. The view was incredible! You can see a full view of the old city. The line for the cable car to buy tickets close to sunset was pretty long. You can buy the cable car tickets ahead of time, I would recommend that if you have time.
The cocktails & food were delicious. I had the Summer Dream gin cocktail, it was so pretty & tasted great. The service was great & the view even after sunset was so beautiful. I had the Dubrovnik style cutlet & my husband had the Seabass Filet. All of the food was delicious. I would definitely go back if we are in Dubrovnik again.

Wow ! What a night. We had Blaz as our waiter and he made sure that our night was perfect from start to end. The views from the restaurant are stunning and the sunset was a 10/10. The food is so scrumptious and had the best mojito of the holiday. Would recommend :)

This place is incredible! The view, the staff and the experience as a whole was just amazing from start to finish! We had one of the nicest beefsteaks ever here, as well as delicious cocktails and drinks! Our waiter Blaz was the best, so professional and friendly! Thank you so much! Highly recommend! Great end to our honeymoon in Dubrovnik!

My Mother and I can to Dubrovnik for a holiday the summer of 2022 and we were recommended Panorama restaurant. We were greeted with smiles straight away when we arrived, brought to an amazing table that we had reserved in advance even though we were late arriving. We were waited on by Blaz and he was very helpful with gluten-free options. Blaz was extremely nice, wanted us to have the best experience and he gave us the best experience. Food was amazing and drinks were perfect. We would definitely recommend this restaurant to everyone coming to Dubrovnik,

Booked online, very efficient but do book early. I couldn't get the time I wanted 6 weeks before I went. I ended up having lunch and was not disappointed. Having reserved I could see they wait for the best table, if you don't book you won't get the best seat. The views are amazing and the service equally so. Food was great, had a salad and fries, delicious. They also provide complimentary bread and oil. I was so glad I did this.
Amazing experience for lunch in the perfect location Restraunt, our waiter nikolo could be more of a help, 10/10

Well, first we have been well received as the bartenders were so calm and so careful with their clients : they were smiling and asking how you are.
Then about the plate, the service is not too long, the quantity is great. Also, the food is very aesthetic and tasteful. 
The wine tastes really really good, especially the Chardonnay Rosenberg 
The price is pretty high, nonetheless it is totally worth it.
This is a loveable place for sure, not to mention the view, you should definitely go there.

My family and I dined at the Panorama restaurant that had stunning views overlooking Dubrovnik. The food was lovely and the friendly service made the experience. 
Would definitely recommend
Excellent meal with a stunning view over the city. The staff are super friendly. Shout out to our waiter Ivan who made sure we were taken care of the whole night.

Very good food, view, and great service. The guy who served us was funny and helpful. We got a drink each on the house also. And we got a table pretty quick when we arrived. 
I recommend the place!
Great food and service. I recommend the Sea Bass filet and the King Prawns. Last but not least an unforgettable view. I will definitely revisit.

The most lovely dinning experience in Panarama restaurant. Our waiter Nikola provided a great service, attentive and couldn’t be more helpful. Cable car trip up is also a great way to see the views Dubrovnik are known for. Would recommend to a friend and would definitely make a trip back

Super service and also the food
Place with a wunderfull view on Dubrovnik/Ragusa
You could also wisit the place from dubrownik with lift.
Super Nice and werry Good Good food and reaallyGood stuff and godd vuew and everything was super nice
After climbing the hill the view and the athmosephere were breathtaking. The food and the service were excellent. We fully recommend it.

Went for lunch. Service was great and very attentive (served by Ivan). Had a steak sandwich and a toastie which were generously sized and delicious. Prices for drinks are quite high here, but for the panoramic views of the old city and Lokrum island we felt it was well worth the price.

We had a diner for six and I must say that I was doubting about the place because it is super touristic. BUT , it was an good surprise. We booked a table at 9 pm ( after the rush of sunset ) and we had a wonderful time. The food was amazing, very refined But authentic. The service was excellent and elegant. Ivan, our waiter, was very helpful for the choice of our menu and wine. It’s elevated and pricy but worth for a nice dinner. I highly recommend this restaurant. Amazing view over the town.

Walk in at sunset 
Sat indoors so would not have to wait but that was really lovely as can be windy
Food , cocktails and service all excellent as were the views
Tip though- if two of you
Uber cheaper than cable car to return and avoids queues

Food, view or service I don't know which is best...
Food is superb, shame it does not have michellin recommended.
View is one of best in Croatia
Service is professional, nice and funny
Would recommended to anyone with taste.
Fantastic view over Dubrovnik and the bay, perfect for a drink or eating under the shadows of the parasols. Friendly service.

Great restaurant, food is good the view is very nice and the service is excellent. 
Don’t hesitate to go there.

Staffs were really nice and kind
Our family could enjoy the time and atmosphere thanks to staffs.
Also, the view was perfect.
I strongly recommend this restaurant for taking a rest.

Tasty food, delishious drinks and professional staff, all with a wonderful veiw of Dubrovnik

Would reccomend making a reservation in advance, due to the high popularity of the restaurant

Other than the extortionate price to get up to the restaurant in the cable car the evening was fantastic, the service is the best we had during our 10 day stay nothing is to much trouble. The waiters were very personable, they are constantly being asked to take photos but always so with a smile. The food and cocktails were delicious, we didn’t have high expectations as the views are why most diners are there but the food didn’t disappoint, we had the sea bass, seafood linguine and Risotto all were well cooked and good size portions. I Recommend the frozen cocktails especially the BBC . We had booked in advance if you want a table with a view be sure to book, those who turn up on the off chance are seated on the left side of the restaurant where the landscape is basic
The best view in the world with great food and drinks, super service. Easy to book and table had a view to die for
So yummy, the views alone are worth it. Service was great as well ! Tomato soup was so good and we also go the Dubrovnik pork chop and the rustic o chicken, it was all very good !!!
Amazing restaurant and Antonio was fantastic! Visited for lunch while on honeymoon and it was 2nd to none! Thank you!
Having Long Island Iced Teas in a beautiful location with great service from Antonio & Tiho. Will certainly be back.
Stopped in for a cocktail after taking the cable car from the old town. Beautiful view, fast service and delightful espresso martini!

The most incredible views from our table! The view is breathtaking, the drinks lovely (especially the iced coffee which has ice cream and whip cream in it) and the food delicious. Ivo and Antonio were wonderful. Book ahead- this is a special place!
Good coffee but don't forget to request a cup of water with it. Come early in the morning so it's not crowded.
Amazing views, I had a cheeseburger that unfortunately a wasp really enjoyed too so I was unable to eat all of this. The staff were great about this. Would highly recommend
What a remarkable way to start our trip! We have never seen anything as beautiful before. Looking down at the town below with a gentle breeze along with the islands glowing from the sunset! Wow!
Great service and food and the views just top it off. The menu is big enough and offers a wide variety of options.

Great service, food and really impressive views! This is a resturant that you will remember forever. The trip is a little expensive when you take into account the cable lift transport to the resturant, but well worth it.
Excellent food and drink, and the view was amazing. I was fortunate enough to attend dinner on a super moon night and the whole ambiance was amazing.

I luckily booked this months in advance for me and my wife’s first meal after getting married. The view alone is sensational and the food was out of this world, right down to the bread and olive oil. By far the best restaurant we visited whilst in Dubrovnik and we visited quite a few. 

Highly recommend the Dalmatian seafood for starters and the beef steak for main. 

Cable cart back down to the old town after the meal completed a perfect evening.
Great location with even better service! Very friendly staff and fantastic cocktails (both alcoholic and non-alcoholic) :)

Fantastic views, great food and good service! 
We had the sea bass and veal risotto, both were 👌, its a bit on the pricey side but the view and vibe is second to none
Great view, great service and great local meat platter. (just had snack and drinks, not a ful meal).
Best meal ever. The view and food is out of this world. Service is great as well. We enjoyed it a lot.
Amazing view and food would highly recommend and cable car 🚠 is an amazing add on too for an all round great trip

Very friendly staff, and a lovelt view of the town. Would absolutely recommend, even if its for a drink. The food is lovely and delicious and the drinks just hit the spot in the heat. Very very good, would go again :)
Gorgeous food and amazing views at this place. Staff were also incredible! Definitely will be back! :)
What a place! So glad we came up here to experience the view and food. Make sure you book in advance though as it gets booked up so quickly!
Amazing dinner!! Service was outstanding and the food amazing! The view was just a plus - but definitely do not miss out going here!!! AMAZING!

We had a wonderful dinner, dessert and view from up here. Blaz our waiter took great care of us and the food some of the best on our month long trip. We had two seafood dishes and both were delicious. Thank you for making our dinner one to remember forever.

So many restaurants in this location would be mediocre at best. However, this one is a fine exception. Fabulous position with amazing views. Very clean and well organised. Staff excellent, food (I only had a snack) and drink also very good, and reasonably priced given where it is. Highly recommended.

It's a pricey restaurant on the top of the hill but you've got a great view! You'll see the islands, Lokrum and Dubrovnik as never before. All of this, while enjoying some cocktails in the shade. Must do!

We’ve been here and there are no words
The waiter, Robert was there for us, so kind and so useful 
And the food was wow, that just melted in our mouth, it was so delicious!

I emailed ahead of time as was to be part of my birthday celebrations, and got a confirmation advising they would have a cliff top table with a view waiting, and we were not disappointed. My first course arrived a little cold, but the rest of the food was delicious. The waiter was very apologetic and took the starter off out bill and offered a further discount on top. The views were amazing and the service great, and I would highly recommend coming here.

The entire experience, from the moment we were received to the final bill was 10/10. The waiter was attentive, food was delicious, the views were breathtaking, service was timely and detailed. We would absolutely book again when visiting Dubrovnik.
A superb restaurant. Great food and the waiter, Blaz provided excellent service for our table - very smiley and attentive.

Food and hospitality were both a 10/10
Blaz our server was very attentive amd couldn’t do any more for us
Would recommend

We had a wonderfully special evening here celebrating my birthday! Our waiter Vedra (hope I have spelt that correctly) was wonderful and made such an effort with the kids. The food was delicious and the cocktails went down very easily! Views were absolutely stunning. We would definitely recommend a meal here! Thank you to all the team who worked there x
This was an excellent restaurant! We really enjoyed it, and our waiter was amazing. Thank you for an excellent experience!

We started off with a par table. Thomas came up to us and decided that my girlfriend, highly reputable wasn’t really happy. Thomas saw her concern and moved us to a beautiful table. The food was excellent. Wine list very well thought of, something for every enthusiast. Antonio was our server willing to please. Above and beyond great service. This is truly a gem of Dubrovnik. I have been vacationing in Dubrovnik for the last 22 years . One of my favorite spots.

Book in advance to get a good table on the edge - we didn’t and didn’t get the view we wanted. 

Only had drinks but staff all fab and food that we saw looked great.

Amazing venue I’d really suggest you book though.

My boyfriend booked a meal at Panorama for our anniversary and it did not disappoint! The views of old town were stunning and the food matched this. Delicious fresh Dalmatian food with tasty cocktails and drinks. Highly recommend the Sea bass. Service was incredible and our server Nikola took very good care of us throughout the evening and was incredibly warm and friendly! Will definitely be back again

More than excellent place, amazing view!!!

Food was extraordinary, thanks to indications from the waiter, including the wine.

The service was fantastic as well.

I truly recommend the experience

We came here for our anniversary dinner and had a lovely time. The food was fantastic and the view from the balcony was even better. 
The salmon fillet and gnudi were both exceptional and the waiter Nikola was delightful throughout the evening. 
Can't wait to return!
Beautiful view and great food. A little pricy, but worth it! The service was really good - Thansk to our waiter Nicola. Recommend.
We booked this restaurant before coming to Dubrovnik. We had a lovely evening and the food was delicious. We would highly recommend to others, seeing the sunset also made it extra special

We went here for some ice coffee and icecream. The staff was very friendly and gave is a warm welcome. The icecream was ok, but the view and ambiance was great! The little breeze in top of the mountain gabe is just The right amount of coolness.

We had dinner in the Panorama restaurant after the cable car ride and it was excellent! The food was superb and the service was even better. After our meal our wonderful waiter invited us over to an amazing scenic seat overlooking the whole of Dubrovnik and gave us complimentary drinks. It was an amazing experience and I would highly recommend it to anyone.
The views are unreal - absolutely stunning! And the food was exceptional. Antonio (our lovely waiter) recomendad the sea bass and it didn’t disappoint. An essential when visiting Dubrovnik.

We got a walk in table here just after sunset and were really impressed with it. The food was outstanding (I had a cheese board starter and the beef steak), the views and vibe were top notch and we were looked after wonderfully by our waiter Antonio. We really enjoyed spending our evening here.
Absolutely incredible experience. I was in an ankle boot and they made me so comfortable!! Best steak I’ve ever had. Special shout out to Antonio. The wider staff were also amazing!

Food was really good but Josip’s service made a difference

Initially I thought it was a tourist trap but actually it was good value for money considering level of service and quality of food

The restaurant views, the food, the ambient and the exquisite service of restaurant staff was amaizing speciality Jossip 

Totally awesome!! Thanks so much !!
what an exceptional experience! incredible views, amazing food and the most incredible staff! friendly, amazing service!! if we can get another booking, we’ll sooooo be back

We have had an absolutely delightful lunch at the Exquisite Panorama restaurant. Antonio our waiter made our lunch with his charm and fabulous wine recommendation - Karaman, Malvasija dubrovacka. Ivo his friend was also lovely but the entire team at this restaurant is superb. Croatia truly has the most lovely hard working warm people.
Really nice experience after the cable car. Stunning views! Lovely smiley staff. Our lids really enjoyed the ice cream 🍨

Absolutely the best eating experience in Dubrovnik!!!
The vistas looking down on the old city and the Aegean were incredible and the food was as good as anything we've had. Our waiter, Blaz was the best we've had n Europe! He made sure that we had the best table with the best views. We sat with our friends ate, drank cocktails and enjoyed the perfect day. Absolutely incredible!

We have engaged in this restaurant a year ago. This year visiting Dubrovnik, we couldn’t miss a chance to go for dinner to this romantic place with a stunning views and 5-star service. Waiters and the hosts were amazing and made their best to find us a table with a view to celebrate our anniversary and to make our evening special. Thanks a lot, outstanding service 🤩
Great views and great service. Ivan was very friendly and very professional. Awesome experience and definitely worth the visit.
Amazing food and great service by antonio, and an excellent view of dubrovnik. I wouldn’t highly recommend!
Had a great lunch, Anthony was a great waiter. Kids liked the lasagne and the wife liked the local rose.
