Amazing view, even better food. Antonio served us and was brilliant with interesting local knowledge. We booked a couple of weeks before to ensure a front row table and it was definitely worth it.
Amazing location overlooking the park of town of Dubrovnik. Had light lunches and cocktails. Cannot fault the food, drink or service. Already booked to come back for dinner.

INCREDIBLE views... 
Lovely staff...
Good food...
Servings of cocktails with ample measures 😅

A little expensive compared to the rest of the country but will worth it for the experience

5 stars easily

We were served by Anthony, he was great, very helpful... Took some lovely photos for us 😁
Vedran was extremely attentive and friendly. The food was delicious and the view was spectacular. Would definitely want to return if I ever get back to Dubrovnik
Stunning views, great food, friendly staff-everything one can wish for when on a vacation. Absolutely loved the place!
Worth it for the view alone but the food is amazing too. And we got to witness a proposal! (Btw it’s a great place for it). Ivan was a lovely and friendly waiter. 10/10 I recommend!

This is a magical location with a stunning view across Dubrovnik. The staff are excellent, we enjoyed friendly and exquisite service from Vedran. The food and drinks are lovely and the ambience is relaxed. We enjoyed our visit very much, best enjoyed at sunset. A superb restaurant.

Very good food.
Just be aware don’t pay in euro until Jan 23.
We converted the fx rates was a bit steep.
Nearly 60kn difference
Amazing views, stunning food and a spectacular service. Everyone was super nice and attentive at Panorama. Definitely worth the visit.

This restaurant is at the top of the mountain, reachable by the cable car. Not only does this place offer some amazing food and drinks but some breath-taking views of the old town. Definitely worth the visit.
Beautiful restaurant setting and lovely yummy food. Tiho and Nikola in particular were amazing waiters!
Nikola and Tiho were such amazing servers and helped us with everything! They gave us amazing wine and a great time :)
great view and good food! the restaurant was a nice escape from the busy town, and the atmosphere was very calming

From start to finish the experience at this restaurant was amazing. Anita managed to organise the booking for us via email even though it was almost fully booked!! The food was delicious and so beautifully presented and the cocktails were divine!!!!! I am a general manager of a restaurant chain back in Scotland and can honestly say that our server Blaz is an asset to this fine establishment, his service was second to none and truly made our visit a memorable one. The only critique I have is we were unable to leave a tip on the card! Thank you so much to the whole team, you should all be very proud to run such a brilliant restaurant.

It was so wonderful! The food was amazing and the views were even better. Ivan, one of the main hosts made sure we were so well taken care of. He was extremely lovely! Would recommend to anyone visiting Dubrovnik!

We are from Croatia but live abroad in UK. We are very proud that visited this nice place and restaurant both amazing view .Food is delicious and staff is incredible, service is excellent! We will come back again!

The view of Old Town is exquisite, and when you have that kind of view, very often the restaurant doesn't need to have good food- people will come anyway. But the food surpasses the view and that's quite a statement. Our family of 7 enjoyed every morsel - almost licking their plates. The steaks, fish, especially the tuna were of the highest quality. My granddaughter said when we left, "I don't think I'll ever have a dining experience like that in my life" -our entire family loved every moment we spent at Panorama. Get a reservation at least a month in advance or you won't be able to get a table. You'll be so glad you did!!

Thanks to Nikola with a « K » not a « C », it was a succulent meal, the frame was just beautiful 🤩
Thanks NiKola, you were very helpful and conscientious ☺️ we come back for you a second time 😉 The French girls 🇫🇷
Better than we ever could have expected and well worth the visit. The service and food was exceptional. It is beautiful for sunset.

The view was outstanding. Every table has a great view. The food was good and also very different compared to other restaurants in the old town. The service was great, especially Nikolas! We had a great night :)
Delicious meal, the best since we arrived in Dubrovnik! Great service from Nikola. extremely worth it.

It was a very delicious dinner adviced by Nicolas!!! 
 I liked a lot the place... I recommended 💖💖
Sorry I almost finished the desert 😅😅
Great views, great food, friendly staff and great service! would highly recommend! Lovely Aperol spritz!

I had a romantic dinner with myself and was treated like royalty in this magical setting with a golden sunset all of its shades of pink and lilac on top of the world. The lamb chops were espectacular. The local red wines were delightful. My waiter Blaz was a gentleman and provided excellent service! Unforgettable!
Lovely views and excellent service. Highly recommend as a must visit in Dubrovnik. Book ahead for the best views for lunch or dinner after taking the cable car!
We sat on the patio on a warm summer evening and had a drink and then ended up eating dinner here. Food was decent and it was a fun experience.

Lovely lunch. Great service (Vedram was awesome!). Expensive cable car to get up ( 30 euro per person) but if you are a couple looking for a romantic setting and lovely lunch or dinner it’s worth it for that
Nikola our waiter was possibly the best we have ever had in a restaurant. Food was very good. Service was better. Cannot fault a thing. Views unreal. We’ll worth a visit.
Lovely views and superb service. Highly recommend as a must visit in Dubrovnik. Book ahead for the best views for lunch after taking the cable car.
Panorama had great food, wonderful service, and excellent views! Would recommend when in Dubrovnik even just for a drink!

Right up at the summit , great views, great service from Nikola. We only had drinks. The mojito was really well made. On the left of us the mountains on the right, the sea side view as well as the whole of Dubrovnik’s old town

Breathtaking views.
Excellent service.
A MUST SEE place when visiting Dubrovnik.
Cannot wait to come back again to see this beautiful place with my family.
Good spot, Nikola is the man and the food was solid. The king prawns are great and a light meal. Got to love the prices I’m Croatia

Wonderful setting 
Most enjoyable evening 
Delicious food - tuna was super

Good service 

Would highly recommend!
We were lucky to get a table last minute. Unbelievable views. Very tasty food. Cocktails are also great. Can’t fault the service. Definitely recommend

The whole experience from start to finish was amazing. Very attentive, very polite and very friendly. 
I had two cocktails, main and desert. The food was insane! And the views are out of this world, if you are in Dubrovnik I would really reccomend going here. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED 🥰

You will enjoy feeling like you are on top of the world with the exceptional service of Yosef who shows up as soon as you push the button and the most wonderful expressive and tasty meals. Everything was amazing made more wonderful by the view.

Beautiful location, food was excellent.
Would thoroughly recommend taking the cable car for some stunning views over Dubrovnik.

The view was amazing as well as the service. Antonio was very friendly and was also knowledgeable. When we asked for recommendations or questions about the history of the area he was able to provide us with it. 
If you decide to come up for a drink or food please say hello to Antonio for us.
You have to go here, get the cable car up then into the restraunt for a drink or lunch. amazing views over Dubrovnik. food and service were good got to go.

We had a hamburger - that was good. However, the salad dressing was terrible - it was like milk with some spices in it. and was totally tasteless. Beautiful panoramic view. The price of food was ridiculous for a very average quality.
Amazing food and service! We had the sea bass filleet and linguini with shrimp which was fantastic. A special thank you to our waiter Robert!
The food was amazing and our waiter Robert was so nice and welcoming. Really recommend for an amazing dinner!

If you come to Dubrovnik and don’t come here, you’re missing a trick!

We booked a week in advance and requested a front row table, you definitely need to do this! There are 3 small tables right at the front and the views are stunning! We arrived for 7pm so enjoyed the breathtaking views in the light, but also the sunset and enjoying the lit up city below when it got dark. 

The food, cocktails and service were second to none.

Tip! When I tried to book online I couldn’t see any availability, so I called them and we got a table no problem. 

Enjoy!!!

Our waiter Antonio took the best care of us. We had amazing views with even more incredible food. 12/10 would recommend - we want to come back here again before we leave. The views & the food don’t get any better than this. The service provided by our waiter Antonio was above and beyond what we were expecting.

The most amazing views and fantastic food. We came for my partners 40th birthday and they really made it special, we got a perfect table with the best view. I would recommend to pre book if you want a specific area with a view.

The service was amazing, our waiter Josip was so polite, kind and friendly and made it very special. 

The food we had was so well presented and very good. We had the beef and it was fantastic. 

They gave my partners dessert free as it was his birthday which I thought was a nice touch. 

If we come back to Dubrovnik we will definitely visit again.
We had a great experience at Panorama. The service was great and the view is breathtaking. Highly recommended. We will be back for dinner! :)
Great food, unforgettable views and amazing service. This restaurant is a must visit! Our waiter was so lovely too, this restaurant made our entire trip!

Didn't have a reservation but they managed to fit me in and the food was great the drinks a bit expensive but needed it after coming up the hard way through the trail really good location for views and very professional
A beautiful place to have refreshments. I can recommend the steak sandwich and a cold beer, but the main reason to visit is the unbeatable view.

So happy that we managed to get a table in this amazing place! No pressure to order anything expensive on the menu. We had the steak sandwich and the burger. Both were delicious cocktails were superb too. Cannot fault the place.
It is unusual when the food matches a view as spectacular as that! It lived up to expectation and more!
An absolutely outstanding experience, beautiful views, very attentive service and ultimately fantastic menus with exemplary preparation and presentation, tasted marvellous as well.
Excellent food with amazing view and good service! Definitely worth the trip! Must reserve a table ahead.

Amazing views, great service, food was impeccable. Possibly the best risotto I’ve had (the shrimp and couchette risotto)
Book well in advance

What a wonderful visit! Please try the gnocchi it’s out of this world and the cheesecake for dessert! 
Really enjoyed our visit and were so well looked after by Vedran - we will be back again!
We booked late lunch for our honeymoon here. Ivan was very attentive and professional. Stunning views and lovely breeze. Such a special place.

Lovely setting with great views. Fantastic staff that were very attentive. The food was great too and a similar price to Dubrovnik old town. 

I wouldn’t bother trying to have dinner for sunset as cannot actually see it, watch sunset from the terrace before / after
Excellent Service, great affordable food, incredible views. Absolutely stunning. Ivo is the best! Don’t miss it and oarking is for free.
Despite not having a reservation (would recommend you make one!!) a table was found for us. The staff were excellent and the food delicious
The dinner is spectacular, our waiter, Petar was attentive, and you cannot beat the birds eye view of Old Town Dubrovnik at sunset. All around a must see when you come to the city.
Went late afternoon and had a fantastic meal with an amazing view of old town Dubrovnik. It isn't cheap but well worth treating yourself.
What a beautiful restaurant and incredible view. Good food. Friendly staff. The cocktails were very tasty! Definitely worth a trip on the cable car to get here!!

Wow! Not only is the view breath taking but the food & service is excellent. We didn’t have a reservation but they were able to accommodate us.

Would 100% recommend!
A great place to stop on the mountain. The views are fantastic and there’s a nice atmosphere. Quite pricey but the food, drinks and service are really good.

Visited here on the 24th June with my husband during our city break to Dubrovnik. We booked well in advance and so glad that we did. 

We took the cable car up/down and even though I don’t really like heights it was so worth it, the views are amazing. 

We booked a front row table and the views were absolutely breathtaking. 

The staff, service and food were all amazing. We have been fortunate to dine in some lovely restaurants over the years, and this has to be up there with one of the best.

We pre-booked a table in May and as requested reconfirmed on day of booking. Our table was booked for 8.45pm and we arrived at 8pm to have a pre-drinks. We were greeted efficiently but this is where it ended! We waited 5/10 mins for a table for drinks, were then ignored for 30mins to get a drink. By this time it was just gone 8.30pm. There appeared to be no system to their bar drinks and even though it was busy and they evidently couldn’t keep up they continued to accept walk ins for drinks. Finally our drinks arrived. At 9.05pm we politely asked if our table was nearly ready (the family next to us confirmed they were 8.30pm and were just being sat down 30 mins late). We were told we were next, all being quite hungry we decided to sit it out. We sat at our table at just after 9.30pm (45 mins late) and were promptly ignored further. We again asked if we could have some service and were smiled at but no action. At 9.50pm (1hr 5mins) without any sign of food/drink or even a waiter - we gave up! 
A truly over rated and disappointing evening. Yes get the cable car up, watch the sunset and decend. Don’t bother with Panorama, very disorganised , terrible service and reliant on people willing to pay just because of location.

Lovely restaurant with an incredible view over the old town and islands. Sunsets can be stunning from here. 
Good menu choice and the food didn’t disappoint. 
Staff were very friendly and helpful. We didn’t have a reservation but they let us wait and it wasn’t long before they squeezed us in. 
The restaurant was very busy so I would recommend making a reservation to guarantee getting a table.
Lovely meal, great service. Great view. Would recommend this to anyone. Really had a lovely time. Very helpful and service was great
Stunningly beautiful setting. Really nice food. Very friendly staff. Worth a visit for the views of old Dubrovnik and beyond.

Mixed review today, we booked via out concierge, who phoned them and confirmed the time.

When we arrived there was no sign of our booking, we where asked to wait and offered a cocktail whilst they investigated, eventually the manager came over, making us feel like it was our fault and said he would try and sort a table, after an hours wait whilst he contacted our hotel he came over and said they had a cancellation and we could sit there, again making it feel like it was our fault.
We had an enjoyable meal nothing more nothing less, considering its part of the Nautika restaurant which we rated so highly, but always felt like we where the liars, on returning to our hotel I consulted with out concierge (petra.....who has been excellent with our other bookings) and her manager, who both confirmed they had done everything correctly including confirming out booking by phone.

I think the problem with the restaurant is they are so busy they over book to cover cancellations and do this quite often, as the manager as much said the hotels do it to get their commissions, something I doubt very much with out concierge

To start with, the views from this restaurant are simply spectacular, and because of the way is terraced, this is pretty much true regardless of where your table is located. Although this is what attracts many people, the menu and cocktails also are excellent, as is the wine list. We enjoyed several interesting and creative cocktails, but Panorama also has all of the classics. The menu has a nice variety of seafood and meat dishes, as well as risotto and pasta based on fresh local ingredients. It is also important to note that the service was outstanding -- our waiter was very professional but also fun and a pleasure to speak with. As others have noted, you should reserve a table well in advance -- Panorama has a lot of reasons it is one of the most popular restaurants in Dubrovnik.
Reservations are in high demand and when you dine there, it’s quite obvious why. Spectacular mountain top view and delicious food.

With the greatest view of Dubrovnik and the Adriatic the Panorama Restaurant kick of our 10 days in Croatia. Let's just say the view is breathtaking. First you need to be sure to make a reservation - we made ours a month ahead. From the gracious greeting to the professional and very informative suggestions regarding wine and our menu selections our dinner shown just like the beautiful sunset.

Best restaurant ever in Dubrovnik! Personal & food were great! The octopus, cheesecake & the cocktail Pina Colada were an orgasme in my mouth 😉😘Everything together with an amazing view gives me good vibes 🤪👍Love this place! I will come back someday!

Great food, great views especially at sunset! Would definitely recommend! We were on the second row tables so next time would definitely try to book earlier to get first row as their views were amazing!

Pricey but worth it for the views!

Service was great and there is a vast cocktail menu. 

I had the cheese and olives for starters, it was a little dry - could do with some relish or chutney. My partner had the orzo ravioli which was incredible! 

For mains I had the chicken which was very nicely presented and my partner had the steak which he said was delicious. 

Make sure you book well in advance about 6:30 for a table on the terrace at sunset.

Amazing food and experience, fantastic views.

Book in advance if you can to get a table with the best view, but we didn’t book and still managed a great view.

Bit pricy but the food is worth it, wasn’t rushed at all, and spent a lovely few hours there
Nice cocktails Best time in the afternoon Good prices very good service Excellent view of the old city

Visited for lunch with 7 people in our group as a treat on our day trip to Dubrovnik from Cavtat. Booked and requested a front edge table in advance, and the communication with the restaurant was top class. We took the cable car up and back, bit pricey but totally worth it for the views and experience.
We took in the views and headed to the shirt queue for seating. We were seated quickly and the specials explained. The waiters were really friendly, and service was great. They took any fotos we asked for too. The food was all great, and given the location and surrounding views, more than acceptable.
Treat yourself, go here

Friendly and attentive staff. The menu options were good and I was expecting prices to be much higher given the captive audience, at the top of the cable car ride. The cable car I found to be very expensive but I thoroughly enjoyed the restaurant and the views. Staff and very friendly. Would recommend

I’m not sure where to start here but everything was brilliant. The meal was not cheap by any means and I do think part of that is due to location, however it was absolutely worth the price paid. The food was delicious! My girlfriend and I had the beefsteak which was sublime along with some French fries which too were nice. Our waiter was absolutely brilliant, I think the best I’ve had anywhere! This meal was for my girlfriend’s 21st birthday and it was truly made special. Thank you very much for a brilliant meal, experience and night!

Me and my girlfriend went last week for my 30th birthday and it was absolutely amazing. I booked it few weeks in advance to get a table out in the terrace. The food was class and the staff were absolutely quality. The gentleman that served us was phenomenal although I can’t remember his name to give him the recognition I think he deserves. Great memories to bring home and I Will recommend to everyone, I most certainly will be back again soon as I can
Got the cablecar to the top and stopped off at the restaurant for a cocktail. Wow what a view from up here also amazing cocktails. We didn’t eat but the food looked amazing. Waiters very friendly.

We chose this restaurant for our last night in Dubrovnik and it was the best choice we made. We booked through the website two weeks before so we got one table on the terrace. The view is amazing but it’s not the only amazing thing, the food is too. I had the linguine with shrimps and seashells my husband had the sea bass fillet both were incredibly good. The service was exceptional. Everyone was very professional and friendly. We would 100% go back and we recommend this restaurant.

Finally there are direct flights from Oslo so we decided to visit this beautiful city again. 
Surprised my wife with dinner at Panorama for our anniversary and it was an absolute amazing meal. Would recommend starting with a cocktail and booking one of the front row tables on the terrace. Our waiter Marko was brilliant. He was very friendly and made sure we were always looked after. Thank you for making our evening so special.

Visited the restaurant with my boyfriend for some drinks after a ride on the cable car. The first round of drinks was lovely, the second were another story. I ordered a BBC which was meant to be a frozen cocktail - it arrived warm. I thought nothing of it and drank it. Paying 
We made our way back to the old town by the cable car and an hour later I was throwing up, I haven’t stopped vomiting for 3 days. my holiday has been ruined. The milk in the drink was clearly off after being warm and left in the sun. Disgusting. Will warm everyone not to visit any of their restaurants in Dubrovnik. 
I will be reporting the restaurant to Dubrovnik’s health authority.

When our friends recommended this restaurant, we thought it would be a tourist destination place to eat and see the view. It was so much more!

Unfortunately, the cable car was not working as it was too windy but Ubers are so inexpensive. Definitely a windy drive up to the top - well worth it. 

Our meals were excellent. The view breathtaking. Service continued to be as relaxed as everywhere we dined in Croatia. 

Recommend walking around the top to get amazing views and visit the museum in the fortress. Worth the history lesson!

Cannot beat the view on a lovely warm day but the food was only average. They do offer a light lunch option which is handy. Not extortionate but still expensive for what you get. Definately worth a visit just for the view. Book ahead, we did and we got a great table.

We had such a fantastic evening here. Booked a few weeks in advance and had a front row table on the terrace with view over Dubrovnik and the sea. Wonderful views, first class service and delicious food! Exceeded our expectations. The sunset was spectacular too. We decided to take an Uber rather than cable car but the cable car did look a fun and quick way to get to the restaurant.

Undoubtably the best restaurant views ever. I wasn’t expecting much for the food at this restaurant as I thought it would all be about the view and more of a “tourist” restaurant where the food isn’t as good. However, I was wrong, the food and cocktails were amazing. 

I had the seafood linguine to start (which easily could be a main) and the sea bass for main. Both were lovely dishes and fresh fish. My husband had the pork cutlet which he also enjoyed.

You MUST book this restaurant in advance if you want a decent table. I booked it a couple of months before coming and still could only get a second row. However, our friends went in the day without booking and got a front row so it seems the evening is the busy time. 

Even if you don’t do the restaurant, get the cable car to the top of the mountains and take in the amazing views.

A Beautiful restaurant in the most perfect place.
Food was fabulous 
Service was fantastic 
Views Amazing 
Highly recommend I could have sat here all day a real lucky find and very small queue

The view was amazing as expected, but we were also impressed with the food and the service. We had the Linguine with shrimp and seashells which was light and flavorful. I took the picture after we already started eating it. We also had the fish fillet of the day which was tuna, it was also very good - flavorful and tender. And we had the grilled vegetables. We didn’t expect the food to be as good or as reasonably priced. Very happy with the meal.

We visited thinking it’ll be the sort of place where you love the view but a drink would cost a fortune. 
Have to say the drinks were reasonably priced. The view is stunning. You have to visit this place.
We asked for a seat with a view and the lady servicing us obliged within minutes. As we were only having a drink we were asked to give the table back after 90 minutes which was fine. 
A must visit for those coming to Dubrovnik.

You can either get a taxi or use the cable car to get to the restaurant. We chose to get the cable car which was approximately £20 return per adult.

We booked online, which was simple to do, and confirmed our reservation on the day at 2.00 pm.

We had a great table overlooking Dubrovnik, and the views were fantastic.

There was a light lunch menu on offer, but we ordered from the main menu, and the food was excellent; we couldn't fault it.

The service was also excellent, and the staff were very attentive. 

I must if you travel to Dubrovnik and looking for excellent food and service.

We had brunch here which was delicious and catered for vegetarians. 
Great friendly service.
Amazing views while sitting

What can I say? Stunning! An amazing place! I booked about 4 wks before we travelled and booked the 1st row. Journey up is stunning, arrived and was greeted by the most cheery fellow. Shown our table and we were taking in the views when a waiter arrived and asked us to move, as they had a large party due in and said we would be better in a different spot. Grand, off we went, ordered and drinks arrived and then the same thing happened, so we moved again. All the tables were stunning. You can't get a bad view here and the staff bend over backwards to take pics for you. Food arrived and it was fab, carpaccio was gorgeous, the Dalmatian trilogy was stunning. I had seabass and my friend had salmon I think. Both were lovely, we ordered too many sides but we made a fair stab. Then they arrived with free deserts for the inconvenience of moving us and free shots! All uncalled for, but the desserts were gorgeous. We could have rolled down the hill. And the journey down is fab too. Very expensive but it was a treat and the staff go above and beyond and I've been in service a long time!
We got the cable car up the mount and had lunch at the Panorama. The food was good but the view were amazing.

I was very excited to eat here in Dubrovnik and made a reservation a ways in advance for our first night. We took an Uber up because I'm not fond of cable cars and the views were amazing! We arrived early but our table was ready for us. And what a table! Right by the rail overlooking the beautiful city. Breathtaking! We enjoyed a cocktail each while watching the sun slowly set. We had spoiled our appetite with a late lunch so didn't order a starter but we had the veal and pork chop. Both were good. Presented so beautifully. The desert looked fabulous at the next table but we couldn't. Our service was a bit slow but with that view who cares. Ended with a nice glass of wine and the setting sun. Cost $718kuna so very fair

Such a beautiful view! The food was really good too.
When you book your reservation make sure to ask for the first row tables, but honestly you can have a great view from all the tables. 
I highly recommend this place!

We decided to indulge ourselves a little with a trip up on the cable car and a meal at the Panorama Restaurant. We loved to views, the food was excellent and the service was very good indeed. If you are considering this, do remember to factor in the cost of the cable car (we paid around €20 per head return) but we felt that it was all worth it for such a magical experience.

Fantastic welcome from the lovely front of house hostess, unrivalled views, flawless service, great menu and a spectacular cable car ride back into the heart of Dubrovnik…simply an unmissable experience.

What better way to spend the last night of our holiday, dinning at the top of a mountain, with the best views over Dubrovnik. We had booked in advance but it looked like tables were available with a short wait at the bar. The views (both of the sea and the mountains) are beautiful. And sunset time is very romantic. 
Service was excellent. Our waiter was very attentive. The food was of a high quality and reasonably priced for it's location.
I would definitely recommend

Only had a beer and a cappuccino, bit pricey but the position is fantastic with fabulous views over dubrovnik. The food looked delicious and was beautifully presented. Staff very helpful and pleasant, very popular, great spot to have a breather if you've gone up in the cable car.

Our waiter Antonio gave excellent service.
The views were spectacular and we really enjoyed the experience. 
Would recommend to anyone visiting the city

Waw. What an amazing view and even more amazing food. Outstanding food and experience. The restaurant catered for everything. It was windy and breezy so felt a bit cold and they had blankets and offered us electric heaters after the sun went down. Peter our waiter was very friendly and helpful. Thank you for a special evening.

How do I do justice to this restaurant? It was so much nicer/better/more enjoyable than I expected. Definitely our favorite in Dubrovnik. The views from virtually every table will take your breath away—so, everyone here, including the highly professional staff, is just plain happy to be here—the place is gorgeous, with the tables flowing down multiple levels to take maximum advantage of the setting. Oh, and the food is top notch also. Go.

First i want to give the staff a big praise.. We turned up for our booking a day early and the staff managed to find us a table and get us seated within 15 minutes during a busy lunch hour! The staff and service was just impecable from a warm welcome, to a quick drinks service to taking some fab photos of us for memories. I was pleasanlty surprised at the reasonable price of the drinks and food and the quality too. We ordered chips as a side and the portion was large enough to share and came with dipping sauce, perfect companion to our cocktails.

Good food, great service and what a view! We took the cable car to the top and though the journey was short it was totally worth it. There was a bit of a thunderstorm while we were there and staff happily moved our reservation to a table which had an umbrella.

Absolutely stunning views, very friendly and professional service and delicious food. Try the melt in your mouth lamb Ragu . Absolutely perfect fillet steaks. one word of advice, wear really warm clothes. Despite the fact that the waiter gave us blankets and put a heater next to our table, we were absolutely freezing. It is on top of a mountain after all, so very windy.

The view is so worth the visit.
We had lunch here and I was totally surprised the food was very tasty, the mojito was one of the best I've ever had, I'd highly recommend the visit although we came early in the season and got in I think it's recommended that you book so you're not disappointed. 
They must have the fittest staff in the world as the whole restaurant is built around steps.
Great food, great beverages, great staff, great view and all at a great price you won't be disappointed

Took the cable car from Dubrovnik. About four minutes and your at the top. There you find this restaurant laid out over a number of terraces. The staff were attentive. Food was good and the views are amazing.

My fiancé and I went to this restaurant for our penultimate meal in Dubrovnik. We weren’t sure what to expect and were worried that it would be another ‘tourist trap’ however we were left extremely impressed. The service was impeccable, we were served in a timely manner, the staff were so friendly and even moved us to a first terrace table when one became available for better views, they also moved a heater closer to us and provided us with blankets. As for the food itself, just WOW. My fiancé had the beefsteak and said it’s the best steak he has ever had. I had the sage chicken dish which was so flavoursome and beautifully presented. The cocktails were also fantastic, and of course the views also made it worth it. Our only slight regret was ordering the cheesecake for dessert as it was plain with a strawberry sauce, it was nice enough but nothing spectacular and in hindsight we should have got an icecream in the old town instead. That being said, we would 100% recommend this restaurant and would return should we come to Dubrovnik again in the future.

The restaurant is very nice this is based at the top off the cable cart area.

Staff friendly and a good choice off menu to order from.

Blankets were provided has being high up it can be abit chilly for this time of year.

We had snacks toasted ham and cheese and a burger, came with salad and fries. Reasonable price and a nice view to have a meal

We only had drinks as had food planned for elsewhere that night. The views were gorgeous and watching the sunset from here was spectacular. 

I had an amaretto and strawberry cocktail that was absolutely delicious!!!

We spent two hours enjoying a three-course lunch with cocktails and wine.

The service was unparalleled, it was the right amount of attentive and friendly. 

The food was delicious and flavoursome, the wine was recommended by the waiter. He was kind enough to allow us to try before buying a whole bottle. 

It got a bit windy during the sitting; blankets and heaters were on hand. 

While you dine, you enjoy breathtaking views across Dubrovnik and the Adriatic sea.

We visited the area via the cable car not knowing what was there. We were told we had to make a reservation to be able to be seated. The restaurant was only a quarter full at that point so it was incredibly disappointing as we weren't to know this and there wasn't enough there to hold our attention for an hour to when they said they could seat us.
We called here and had a refreshing drink as it was very hot,the views are well worth getting the cable car up the mountain you can see all of Dubrovnik .

First off caught the cable car up. Nice but a bit expensive at 30€ each but u can get a taxi instead. Drinks about 7.50 each. The view was fantastic looking over the sea. I had the seafood linguine about 20 euro but I have to say best pasta dish I ever had. Not cheap but if u have extra cash to spare a nice treat.

Spent several hours at this terrific hilltop restaurant ! There was a bit of a breeze on the day but we were supplied with blankets. Service was quick and friendly, and the place was immaculate. The restaurant is situated on several levels across the hilltop edge by the cable car.
it was a nice way to relax with an excellent view. We did not eat but the hostess was nice to let us have a table for 45 minutes

Booked for my partners 40th birthday after a recommendation from a friend. 
First thing to mention is be prepared to pay the £20 cable car fee but for the experience it is worth it in my opinion. 
We went at the very beginning of the season, so was still very chilly but imagine in the height of summer it is wonderful. The views are breathtaking.
Service was great but Unfortunately for vegetarians there was a very limited menu. When my partner questioned this, he was told it was the beginning of the season, which isn’t really fair as vegetarians and. Vegans should always be catered for these days!! Nevertheless they pulled it out the bag with delicious food for all of us and we thoroughly enjoyed.

Absolutely superb !! The location the staff and the food ✅ just go there and see for yourself !! We will be back ! We had an amazing meal traveled by cable car and then watched the sunset ! Absolutely spectacular !!

Eating delicious food while overlooking the beautiful town of Dubrovnik... I mean, what more do you need...
Oh wait, beautiful sunset and a good selection of wine :) All sorted.
We tried a variety of Croatian wine and all were really delicious.
The food was very tasty and all plates arranged exquisitely.
My wife has Coeliacs, so needed gluten free options and was delighted to be well taken care of. First restaurant here that also served some gluten free bread, which was much appreciated.
And they even had a delicious GF white chocolate cake.
Can't recommend enough.

We booked an inside table with a view to watch the sunset. On arrival, we were welcomed and asked to wait while the waiter finished laying up. In that time a group of ladies ‘that lunch’ were brought in from the outside tables as they were chilly and led to our table. We were then taken to another table on the other side of the restaurant. Obviously we were annoyed but we were told there had been a misunderstanding and it was always the ladies’ table.

Eventually there were profuse apologies and a bottle of Prosecco and a discount on the food.

Despite all this, we would recommend the restaurant for the food and, of course, the view. Just make sure you get the table you book.

On our first day we had dinner prebooked at the Panorama Restaurant and it did not disappoint. While it was a bit cool that evening the staff did all they could with blankets and heaters to enable us to dine outside and experience the incredible views and spectacular sunset. The food was very tasty and we all enjoyed the meal with a few of us experiencing the delicious burgers. The waiting staff were all friendly, polite and more than helpful and we were impressed by the consistent high standard of hospitality. If you have the weather it is the place to go and you will experience an amazing sunset while having a lovely meal. It is well worth the visit

I had a lunch with my mom at the Panorama restaurant and, being a frequent traveler and a fine food lover, I was positively surprised by the presentation and taste of the dishes I tried at that restaurant ( try the chicken dish and the vegetable & mushrooms risotto). At the beginning, when we arrived, there was a misunderstanding with one of the waitresses about reservation and available tables at the terrace up to the point that we decided to leave. But the professional approach and the attentiveness of the restaurant’s manager quickly solved the issue, and we could finally enjoy our time up on the hill overlooking the sea and the old town. Although it was quite windy the day wi visited the restaurant, the experience worth it! If you happen to be in Dubrovnik, don’t miss this place. Thanks again to the restaurant manager to make our time positively memorable!

Having taken the cable car up and back, we decided to have lunch here. With the option to dine inside and out, the restaurant was very clean and our waiter was very helpful and pleasant.

We had both food and cocktails and with such a superb view while dining it made the meal even more so enjoyable, couldn’t fault the food at all and the cocktails were very tasty to 😊

This restaurant is definitely a must if you are visiting Dubrovnik! The views of the Old Town and the sunset were incredible. The food was lovely and the service was amazing! I would recommend wrapping up warm in the colder months as it can be windy however blankets and heaters are provided. We had mains, drinks and desserts and it cost around £80.

Had the best meal today with breathtaking views, all reasonably priced. The staff were so quick and friendly, felt very genuine, nothing to much and happy to take photos for you of the views. There are blankets and heaters incase the temp drops, the staff will make sure you are warm enough and that you have the best experience you can! Definitely recommend!

Came here more for the views but the food did not disappoint. It’s April and expected it to be cold but we were provided blankets and heaters so really not so bad outside. The service was amazing as seems to be the case with Croatian hospitality. The food portions were a good size and we all sat and enjoyed the sunset whilst enjoying each other’s company and eating great food. Would definitely recommend it.

Friendly and efficient when booking our table. Food and cocktails were lovely. Great view, we were there for sunset which was really beautiful. It was a windy night so the terrace was closed but they organised a table beside the window for us. We noticed that another small group didn't initially get a table beside the window but the waiters offered one to them as soon as it became available. We were also offered a 10% off voucher at the end of our meal for their sister restaurants which we did use during the trip. Really recommend for a special meal.

Wow this place blew us away. The view is the best I’m Dubrovnik and the tables are along the cliff edge for you to enjoy it. The staff couldn’t do enough for us from providing heaters a blankets to taking the perfect pictures to remember our experience by.. then there is the food it was faultless along with the staffs knowledge of the menu and wine. 

We will forever remember our visit here ❤️

Not only does this restaurant boast the most beautiful views over Dubrovnik, but it is a lovely place. The staff are so friendly, polite, professional and attentive and we only had the cheescake, but it was the best cheesecake I’ve ever eaten and can only imagine how gorgeous the main menu would be. Definitely reccomend.
We stopped off here on a quad bike tour. The food and views as well as service were fabulous - well worth a visit
We had two very tasty cakes wonderfully decorated. The staff is very friendly and knows English very well. View is breathtaking. You can sit outside or protected from the winds inside.
Food was delicious!! Staff is so nice too, we didn’t have a reservation but they fit us in, and what a perfect view! I highly recommend!
Amazing drinks and service! And definitely worth the walk up! Took us 70 mins to walk up just before sunset and the views are breathtaking. You can get a taxi also.

With no reservetion , with in 15min waiting, we have got a really good table . The pplace is so zen and beautiful!!! The view is too die for !! The food is excellent and the staffs are amazing and superdupper friendly !!
They run back and forth, up and down the stairs with food and drinks, yet they still give you good and friendly service !!! Thank you for the unforgetable moment <3

Thank you Tripadvisor for helping us find this unique place. Food was great (recommend Sea bass fillet) and service from our waiter Tihomir was outstanding. We will definitely be returning to Dubrovnik and this unique place.

Came up late afternoon for a drink - first the hostess tells you in a brusque manner that the table must be freed in an hour. Fine. Then when the waiter finally shows up, he is very curt and hassled. So much for a relaxing atmosphere. Definitely not worth taking the funicular up.

Originally booked for the night we arrived but due to vile weather and the cable car not running we were able to book for lunch the next day ( amazing commotion) 

We booked ages ago so wanted a cliff side table which we got . Cable car great & easy to use. We only planned to have lunch but stayed for sunset which was incredible! Blanks/ heaters supplied and no pressure for our table ( we did spend a bit 😂)

Our best day in Dubrovnik - hands down the best views z

We had another great meal at the restaurant after loving our meal last year. If you’re after a meal with a view, this is a must. The menu was extensive and service very good. We initially booked a table away from the edge, but when one became available the waiter offered it to us. Staff were pleasant and made sure every table had a heater and blankets as it was cold- a nice touch. The food was good quality and we didn’t have to wait long for it. 

Would 100% recommend while you’re in Dubrovnik, but do book ahead.

I booked a table for lunch at this restaurant on my birthday - the reservations manager was extremely prompt with her replies and the booking experience was a breeze. 

On the day itself however the terrace area was closed due to strong prevailing winds. My reservation as a result was converted to an indoor table. I was impressed with the fact that they actually reserved one of the tables with direct and unobstructed panoramic view of the old city for us in exchange. 

Service was excellent and so were the food and drinks. 

Reservations are probably a good idea and given it’s only an email away there’s no reason not to book in advance.

We had amazing dinner in Dubrovnik with a view to match.
Definitely worth a visit for views of the whole of Dubrovnik and surrounding islands. Food was beautifully presented and very tasty.
Staff members were informative, friendly & welcoming.
It was very impressive experience for us and I would recommend it to anybody who visit Dubrovnik. :)
This is a great place to have a drink and view the city of Dubrovnik and surrounding islands. The restaurant is a bit pricey for what you get but the bar is worth the view

The place certainly has possibly the best views of Dubrovnik’s old town but the service is not quite matched. The waiters seemed a bit bothered almost by the costumers and the drinks also weren’t up to the standard although the milk foam on the cappuccino was perfect.
Had such a perfect meal - a standout of our holiday. Setting obviously is stunning, but the service and food were an equal match.

This restaurant is amazing. Service is amazing. Our waiter was the best. The view from our table was breath taking. We arrived for our sitting at 17.15 pm so we got the best of both. We could see the clear skies and then experience sunset.

What an amazing setting, the view from the top of the mountain is incredible, food is fantastic and the service is excellent, that was the cherry on top of some incredible vacation days in Dubrovnik
Teodora the host gave us a great table and was so nice and sweet that after having lunch we came back for dinner 
I would recommend Panorama to everyone visiting Croatia

Incredible setting and fantastic food. My steak was wonderful, and my girlfriend had carbonara which she loved too. The pudding selection was also beautiful. Great service and a fair price, would highly recommend!

We came here after hiking up the mountain and visiting the museum. We ordered the Lasagne which was good. Of course you pay the view - the restaurant is one of the more expensive ones. But the service was very good and people reserve tables for the sunset!

Super evening in the best company (my husband). We arrived a bit early and were ushered to a fabulous table with amazing views over the ocean and the whole of Dubrovnik. The waiting staff were superb- very attentive and professional. Shout out to Josep! 

The food was delicious although we had to move inside after the main course as the weather was closing in. No matter - one complementary cocktail later we had a table inside and were enjoying our pudding. 

All in all a lovely evening. We will return!
Great food and drinks, but mostly enjoyed the spectacular views of Dubrovnik. Enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere and the excellent service.

We couldn’t have had a better experience at this amazing restaurant. The food was exceptional, atmosphere was lovely and relaxed, the views were idyllic and we were lucky enough to see the sunset. The staff were friendly, attentive and nothing was too much trouble. I just can’t recommend this place enough, it’s definitely one to visit. I will definitely be returning.

Our group of 10 rode the cable car up so we could enjoy sunset before our dinner reservations. When we arrived at the restaurant we were greeted by a very friendly Sinša. We were a bit early , he kept us informed as to when our table would be ready. Reservations in advance are a must.

When we were seated Josip introduced himself as our waiter. He was very informative and helped those who couldn't decide which dish to order.

Our favorite was probably the Dubrovnik style cutlet with Sea bass filet and veal with forest risotto right up there. Linguine with shrimp and sea shells, pasta orzo a la risotto with shrimp were yummy too! All dishes were fantastic. Highly recommended, especially with Sinša and Josip's help. It was a chilly night but very comfortable with their heat lamps. My pictures all turned out red due to the lamps.

This place is simply breathtaking, gorgeous food, cocktails and an amazing view. We went for my partners birthday so they came out with a sparkler in his dessert and I didn’t even ask them to, which was really kind of them. Our waiter was absolutely brilliant all night and couldn’t do enough for us. The cocktails were some of the best I’ve had and the food was amazing, you pay a premium for the view but it’s worth it. You do need to book in advance though and request the terrace if you want the best table.

Our favourite meal and night in Dubrovnik. Service from the minute I booked was excellent. I received an email from them to help and advise on when was best to book so I got the best sunset view - it was unbelievable. The service on the night was impeccable, wine and cocktails fabulous and the food was the best we had over the 2 weeks we stayed in Dubrovnik. Thank you again!

We booked to sit out on the terrace but unfortunately the weather wasn’t our friend due to the wind. Not the restaurants fault

We went inside but we felt the service wasn’t great. Too long a wait for drinks and the food wasn’t speedy enough either.

I had the prawns which were lovely but my husbands veal was lovely, though a small portion.

Generally we just felt there wasn’t the level of attention and the staff were not overly friendly either 

Shame, it was supposed to be a special night out

We arrived an hour early for our booking so we could watch the sun go down. It’s something you have to try and do if you get the chance. We were lucky that someone else didn’t turn up for their booking and we had asked if we could be seated earlier if a similar table was available. Turns out we had the best table in the restaurant! 
As for the food, that was nothing short of exceptional. I had the pork cutlet and my wife had fillet steak and both were just amazing, in fact probably the best meals we’ve eaten! The service was brilliant and it was surprisingly reasonably priced for what you get and the view you have.
Panorama should be on everyone’s must do list, but if you want a sunset sitting you have to book early!

An amazing view . Take the cable car up to the the top and have dinner. We were celebrating a special birthday and the ambience was perfect. 
Staff couldn’t do enough and the food is fantastic ! 
You need to book in advance

Panorama is the best restaurant we have visited in Dubrovnik. 
I have visited dubrovnik 6 times now and this has to be the best. Nautika is a close second but Panorama's location just gives it the lead. The views of old town is spectacular. 

The service is outstanding - Josef was a great help and deserves lots of praise. 

The food was very special. We all had the steak! Highly recommended!
The setting is stunning especially watching the sunset but the food, wine & staff are fabulous. Amazing customer experience

First let me say that this was hands-down my boyfriend's highlight and favourite meal of our entire trip. For me it was a little bit tarnished by my reservation process.

First the pros and there are many. The views are stunning and there is a sense of excitement building as you reach the top of the mountain via cable car (you can drive up also but we wanted the cable car experience). Our table was beautiful with views out over the old town and to the sea. I had deliberately booked for sunset and it did not disappoint. We had cocktails which were good. We had soup and seafood linguine to start however it was the delicious steaks cooked to perfection that really delighted us. Our waiter Braz (I think), despite being very busy with several tables was polite, welcoming and professional. He kindly took out picture for us and is an asset to the restaurant. Wraps and heaters were provided when the sun went down and the evening cooled.

Now to the only disappointing part of the evening. I made my reservation a month before the dinner and was told that we could have the table from 5.45 to 7.30pm, this was emphasized multiple times on booking, on confirmation of the booking, when we arrived AND when we sat down. However, unfortunately when we arrived (at 5.40) we were told our table was not ready, we waited until 6.05 to sit down which wouldn't usually be a problem except that they ONCE AGAIN reminded us that we would need to vacate the table before 7.30pm allowing us significantly less time to eat and adding a slightly rushed feeling to what was otherwise a lovely evening, we didn't order dessert as due to the delay in getting our table we didn't have sufficient time.

Overall I would still recommend this restaurant as its location was excellent and the food was delicious and our waiter did a great job.
Only went to 6 restaurants in Dubrovnik but this was the best - food and view amazing. Outdoor terrace beautiful too.

Did the walk up the mountain to the Imperial Fort on a Sunday morning. We were debating whether to go down into the Old Town or grab some lunch in the Panorama restaurant and decided to stick around at the top of the mountain.We also decided to forego the only available table which was facing the back of the restaurant and had a wait for a table of around 20 mins (to be expected on a Sunday lunch service). When we did sit down the wait was worth it - we had a table right at the edge overlooking the Old Town - what a view. Wasn’t expecting much from the food / drink as the place felt like it could be a honey-trap for tourists but was pleasantly surprised. My burger was okay but my partner had a blue cheese salad which she was really impressed with. The drinks were good and the whole meal was not overpriced considering the view which was certainly worth a premium. Overall was quietly impressed and would have no hesitation recommending this place, especially if you get lucky with the table.

Stunning views and excellent food & Service. Truly must stop here if not for a meal, for the signature drinks. Attentive and kind service, the drinks are out of this world and truly a work of art. 5 Stars! We had the Dubrovnik style pork chop, so flavorful, tender amd outstanding! This is a must try!

Took the cable car up here and decided to have a meal whilst looking at the views. The food was delicious and the cocktails were great. The views from the restaurant did not disappoint! The service was great and got a 10% discount to eat at the sister restaurants. Highly recommend!

Wow! The most amazing evening ever. The food and service was first class. Our waiter Josip couldn’t have been more courteous and friendly nothing was too much trouble for him including kindly taking lots of photos of us when requested! The views are breathtaking and the relaxed ambience made our evening so special. We had some beautiful cocktails and wine followed by a delicious 3 course meal. Everything tasted divine and was cooked to perfection. My boyfriend particularly loved the octopus terrine but the menu has something for everyone. The presentation and detail throughout the whole evening was 5 star. Would love to return again on our next holiday to Dubrovnik.

We had an unforgettable experience up at the panorama restaurant, booked for my fiancé’s 30th, the staff went above and beyond to make the evening as special as possible! The food was exceptional, and the service outstanding. As for the views.. breathtaking, the camera doesn’t do it justice!

Would definitely recommend booking for sunset, spend sometime up there before hand and time to dine whilst the sun is setting. 

Thank you to the restaurant and all the staff for the best night

This is the highlight of my foodie trip in Croatia. Not only was the food good, the ambience can’t even beat. I don’t have words to describe the feeling it gave me. I reserved a table one month before I went to Croatia and asked for a nice table at 6pm. We had a tour that day and asked the driver to just leave us there instead of taking us back to our hotel. We were there at 4:15pm. The hostess told me it was okay that we are early. Then she prepared a very nice table, the most perfect spot to see everything. She told me I could have the table until 8 pm since my reservation was from 6-8. So my son and I took our time. We had drinks before and after. He had a light lunch of burger but it was a super gourmet one. Mine was sea bass and honestly it was one of the best fish dishes I’ve had.

The most incredible dinner at Panorama, an absolutely stunning view! I recommend arriving just before sunset, to watch the sun go down from the viewpoint. Impeccable service the entire evening, and such fresh seafood. Highly recommend the king prawns, and risotto starter! Our favourite restaurant in Dubrovnik so far! Thank you :)

Here we ate best food in Dubrovnik and also the best burger in my life! The view is fantastic, the service was impeccable and the food was very, very good. Prices a bit high but nothing out of the ordinary, considering that the food is 'a la carte', the service is impeccable and the view leave you speechless.
Excellent service, probably some of the best in Dubrovnik. Vendrán, our waiter, was great at making recommendations. The meal was tasty, and the atmosphere very nice.

Made a 6 pm reservation a month ahead to be sure to get a prime spot to watch the sunset. Was told we had the table until 7:45 pm which was fine because we planned to have drinks and appetizers, and go elsewhere for dinner. We were warmly welcomed and taken to a fabulous table. Despite the timetable, we weren’t rushed at all and fully able to enjoy the amazing views! We had radlers and shared the bread basket, creamy tomato soup and cheese and olive platter which was delicious and quite filling. Finished with espressos. My worry about the server’s reaction to us not ordering a full dinner was totally unwarranted - he was all smiles and when he served the food, he wished us an enjoyable meal. Of course the main reason to come is for the stunning sunset and views, which did not disappoint!! Words of advice though: 1) we opted to take an Uber from the old town rather than the crowded, expensive cable car. What we didn’t know was that drivers do not like this route up, which is windy and narrow and often involves having to back up or go on gravel in order to let the car coming down pass. We had 4 Ubers cancel on us before one picked us up, so keep that in mind. 2) Prices are double to triple what you would pay elsewhere for the same item. For example our radlers were 50 kn each but in old town they were 22 kn. Not complaining, just explaining. 3) if we come back to Dubrovnik, we would bring our own drinks and watch the sunset from the free viewpoint right next to the restaurant. Very glad we came, but feel it’s a once in a lifetime type restaurant.
Overpriced..Does not matter magnificient venue...Stuff is professional..Still think they have different prices fir domestuc and foreign tourist..Paid for cappuchino 28kn..for example

Amazing meal at Panorama! We visited for our anniversary and the service we received was amazing!! We had a table with excellent views of Dubrovnik and the sunset. It was so romantic!

Food was excellent, would have been good to see some more variety but nonetheless was still great.

Definitely recommend this restaurant and we will be back!
Lovely food and amazing views! A must-visit on a trip to Dubrovnik! Great steak sandwiches and they even had gluten free bread for my sister too!

Panorama restaurant is another hidden gem. White table cloth service high on the mountain with great views. Has a good breeze so stays cool. We had lunch and drinks. Excellent place to visit 
Cable car can be crowded at times. We lucked out. Maybe due to Covid. The ride up does not get as good breeze inside as the ride down do it can be stuffy. The views are incredible. And the ride up is pretty quick. It’s less expensive to buy a round trip ticket and easier. They have nice clean bathrooms at the top.

What an experience. Amazing views, great service and food was good too. We book in advance to get a front table.
Would definitely recommend.

We showed up in the afternoon without a reservation and they found us a perfect table that had an amazing view on the edge of the patio. The service was very prompt and the food was excellent. This was definitely worth it!

Best waiting staff ever experienced in Croatia 
The servers were so attentive and nothing was too much trouble. 
It did get chilly even though it was August and they came round with blankets and heaters .... we were lucky enough to catch the sun set and at that time the lunch menu was available, had lasagna and chicken salad. 
Food was a average to be honest (your basically going there for the view with the meal) however the warm apple pie with caramel and almond crumble and vanilla ice cream made up for the main.
Cocktails were super

I absolutely love this place!!
The waiter Stefan was so nice and friendly, nothing was too much trouble for him, and he always had a smile on his face which is very important. I am really looking forward to going there again.
Wow! Absolutely amazing experience from start to finish, amazing views, service and the food and drink was perfect ❤️ highlight of our holiday, thank you so much

The service was great and all the waiters were wonderful, since despite being fully booked, they were able to arrange a table for us. The view over the city was absolutely fabulous and this was a really unique experience and we had a pleasant evening. The cuisine was excellent; great flavour and great composure in all the courses.
Amazing view, very helpful and nice service and good food. Go early for a more relaxed and less crowded experience. We loved it!

The most breathtakingly beautiful evening for my partners birthday. Very easy to communicate with via email and confirming the booking etc. We were greeted warmly upon arrival, and seated at a table right at the front as promised with spectacular views! We watched as the day turned into night and the sunset, which made the evening unforgettable. The food was 10/10, beautifully presented, very generous portions and tasted delicious. Drinks were incredible too. The waiters were amazing, extremely attentive and even brought out a birthday desert complete with a firework for my partners birthday, all of the waiters came and sung happy birthday to him! We didn’t expect any of this and it only made the evening more special. There were fleeced blankets for when we got cold and heaters. The waiters went out of their way to make sure everything was perfect, even changing the table cloth when I spilt something and taking photographs for us and other guests with the view in the background. This restaurant should be number 1 on trip adviser, not a single complaint everything was absolutely perfect!!! A special thank you to our waiter Tihomir he was absolutely fabulous. An evening we will never forget, thank you thank you thank you! If you are visiting Dubrovnik you MUST visit, but be sure to book in advance due to the popularity of the place, so worth it!

Located at the top of a mountain so the view is magnificent! ( took a trolly up) The food is worth the money. I ordered the pasta with lamb ragu as a starter and it was soo good. I could have stopped there because the portion was dinner size. I had the prawns......mouth watering good. The service was great, very attractive staff. Warm blankets offered when chilly air came in. Worth the trip

If you want a truly special evening out, take the cable car to this amazing restaurant. It has everything, wonderful 5 star food, service & views. Couldn’t of wished for a better way to spend an evening!
Just go for the view, without any culinary expectations. Worth the visit though. Need to book in advance.

I booked this restaurant 2 weeks in advance and still only managed to get a table in the second row from the sea without a direct view of the city below, so reservation is defiantly key far in advance for the best tables. (We still experienced lovely views from the 2nd row). You are asked to confirm your reservation before 2pm the same day to ensure they don’t give it away. 

To reach the restaurant you can pay a taxi/ bolt or experience the cable car like us. We paid 170 kuna for a return ticket each to take us to the top of mount srdj where the restaurant is located. The cable car took around 4 minutes or so, 26 people approx to a carriage leave a bit more time if you are going up for sunset at it was quite busy and we had to wait for the 3rd carriage to get up. 

When you reach the top you will also find a viewing platform and a gift shop. The restaurant has a handful of indoor seating but the majority is on the cliff Terrance. There are many stairs throughout the restaurant area. Each table/ chair has access to a blanket for when the temperature drops after sunset and also a heater. There is some nice chill music in the background too with a lovely candlelit romantic vibe. Although from the Terrance you cannot directly see the sunset as the sun drops the other side of their main building you can still experience from the various view spots. From the Terrance you can see all the city and Lokrum island. 

The service and waiters had top notch service - the best hospitality we experienced in all Dubrovnik. They were friendly, helpful, polite and attentive. 

The food was presented beautifully with a wonderful portion also. We had the grilled beefsteak which was cooked to perfection with such attention to detail on the plate and also how they serve it to you. 

This wasn’t a cheap meal, for 1 starter, 2 mains and 3 cocktails + 1 water we paid approx 160 euro but I have absolutely no regrets the food, service, atmosphere, vibe was incredible. I would defiantly recommend going to this restaurant if you can and even better for sunset. 

Check out my Instagram for some videos of our meal and other Croatia highlights. @lucyamberparsons

Lunch with a view is vey hard to beat once you've visited this restaurant. The tables overlooking Old Town Dubrovnik are fabulous and the parasols are a welcomed shade. You'd think the view would be enough to get a good rating, however the food is a must try. The seafood is delicious and pasta al dente. All of this is enhanced even more buy the wonderful service of the staff. In particular, Tiho and Josip, who were super accommodating and attentive. A must visit!

Pros
. The views (obviously) 

. Something a little different 

Cons
. 2 steaks and 2 draft beers cost us £80. Although the steak was tasty and presented beautifully, we thought this was pricey for what we got. 

. Costs £20 each for the cable cart to reach the restaurant.

. Bookings for a table at the very edge (full view) are apparently booked a year in advance. We made our reservation three weeks in advance and told we would get a table in the second row (limited view). 

. Upon arrival, we were told it would rain later so they had to close the restaurant outside and we would be seated inside. It did not rain until we got back to Dubrovnik Old Town which was around 1.5hours after we were seated so it was a great disappointment that the restaurant denied us the full experience.

Had we been allowed to sit outside, I’m sure the experience would have been different.

On top of Srd hill, it has the most beautiful view of the old town and Lokrum island. The easiest way to arrive is by cable car.
The terrace tables are much nicer than the inside ones, but this way the bathrooms are really far away. The mozzarella salad, was great, made with real buffala cheese. Then, we had mussels, a shrimp stew (hard to eat, because they had the head and shell) and risotto. 
They were very good, but I think that the setting and the view are the best part of this experience.

The view - extraordinary
Food & drinks - excellent
Personal - very kind & welcoming, true professionals

If you are around, this is a must ✌🏻

I booked for the view and sunset and was so delighted that the food quality and wine list were excellent as well. I initially selected a wine that had been recommende but our waiter steered me to another that he said was much better. Since it was also a bit less expensive I followed his lead and was glad that I did. The evening was joy incarnate; my only disappointment was they had no oysters that day. Life's funny that way- we booked an oyest tour for the next day

One of our most memorable dinners EVER.
The cable car ride from old town was fantastic and once up top we were given a table that had a view like none other…(hint make advance reservation-we had made ours before leaving Canada). The food was amazing and the service as good as it gets. Sometimes panoramic type restaurants have nice views but “meh” food…not here - it was the whole package and we’d recommend this to friends or loved ones coming to Dubrovnik

My friends and I booked Panorama restaurant for our one and only night in Dubrovnik. From start to finish the host and our waiter Ivan went over and above to ensure that we had the best possible experience. Food, service and setting was all 10/10 and couldn't be faulted.

We had a fabulous front row table- we were told because we had booked in advance (thanks to Enisa at sun gardens concierge). All i can say is it was amazing, staff were brilliant, great food and drink choices. we booked for 6.30pm to maximise the sun set and views and when our table time was up the staff found us a table further back to have drinks. 

Highly recommended

We had eaten lunch in their sister restaurant dubrovnik 1836 who gave us a 10% off voucher to use so well worth it.

Lovely restaurant with beautiful views of Dubrovnik Old Town. Food and drinks delicious with amazing staff. Will definitely return and recommend to all friend who visit Dubrovnik. 
Would recommend taking the cable car (only a couple of minutes) rather than taxi as the road up is narrow and can be busy through the day!

A must visit during your time in Dubrovnik. We happened to get a walk in table due to a cancellation but defo book in advance. View was amazing during sunset. Food was worthy of a Michelin star! Amazing service as well. One of the best meals I have ever had!
This place has excellent food and a dramatic view of Old Town. The staff is super friendly. If you don't make a reservation, plan to wait in line.

Everything was excellet: the food, the service, the view… perfect coctails and would recomment to everyone! The food is amazing and well prepared. 
The view is magnificent

Loved the views. Had strawberry amoretto drink that was amazing! Nice variety of food choices. You definitely need reservations here. Was so breezy and cool up here. Serve was great. Would go here again!
The view from the restaurant is spectacular. The staff was very nice and we had the best burgers of our visit. The restaurant is pricy (especially the drinks), but worth the money.

This was an amazing restaurant at the top of the cable car ride in Dubrovnik. Food was wonderful and views at sunset were beyond belief. Reservations are recommended but you can sometimes get in at sundown by putting your name on a waiting list.
Beautiful view but poor service and outrages prices. I would not recommend going there. Much better places to eat in Dubrovnik

We had a wonderful evening at this restaurant. We had not booked and it took a little while to get a table in the cocktail bar area and then wait for a table in the restaurant but well worth it.
We started with cocktails which were excellent and delicious before being taken to our table. 
All 4 of us had excellent food. The chicken dish was very tasty as was the calimari. 
The service was also very good and it was wonderful to sit and enjoy the great views over Dubrovnik and the surrounding area. 
The cost was also pretty reasonable for the position of the restaurant.
Definitely recommended.
One word ‘Wow’. Food superb and a view to die for. Pricey, but who cares. First place I will return to when I come back to Croatia 🇭🇷 😎

I can describe this restaurant with one word: AMAZING!! Everybody that is making holiday in Dubrovnik MUST go there!!!! Thanks to our waiter Blaž and to his director Siniša!!! Perfect organization, perfect food, perfect hosting!!! We will come back soon!!!

Had heard so many good things about this restaurant and it did not disappoint. We had a wonderful table (46) on the edge of restaurant overlooking the old city. The service was impeccable. Our waiter was Niksa and he was attentive but also gave us space. He made us feel special and proactively let us know what time the cable car would be leaving. The food was delicious. We will definitely be back.

Great views, great food and lovely, happy staff. We had excellent burgers, some delicious tuna salad and there was a more exciting choice of vegetarian options than other nearby restaurants. We got there early and we’re lucky to get a table. Best to book in advance. .

We chose to spend our final night in Dubrovnik at the beautiful Panorama restaurant. The whole experience from beginning to end was simply wonderful. We were fortunate to receive a table somewhat in the shade with a perfect view of Old Town and the setting sun. Our server helped us select a bottle of wine that paired very well with our food selections - so well in fact that we ended up ordered two. The beef carpaccio was a stand-out starter dish. I selected the catch of the day (Tuna steak prepared spot-on medium rare) and my friends had the veal and the salmon. Not only was the food delicious but visually stunning as well. We witnessed a man propose to his now fiance which was sweet to see. I imagine this happens often because the setting is romantic and beautiful. After our meal concluded the manager was kind enough to find us a high top table on an upper level for after dinner drinks. Service was impeccable, the atmosphere romantic and posh without being pretentious, and the views are second to none. Getting to ride the cable car to/from the city was a fun bonus. I highly recommend this establishment to anyone visiting Dubrovnik. A must try.

We had a great time at Panorama! Upon recommendation from a friend, we reserved a front row table for sunset on our first night in Dubrovnik. It was the perfect end to a long day of traveling- relaxing with a bottle of wine, delicious food and a great view! 

Highly recommend to anyone visiting Croatia for the first time!

Unexpected food and service! The greatest quality in Dubrovnik! Please try their sandwiches which are burgers and the desserts which are to die for!) Thank you so much dear Panorama for the greatest moments and peace and service!

The food was amazing, the service was perfect and the view was awesome!!!!! The reservation lady that we contact by mail was really nice because she explains us that the day that we tried to reserve, we wouldn't have the view of the city but the other side, so we asked for the day after and she gave us a really nice table with the beautiful view of the city and it was really amazing!
I recommand it, for the food, the view and the service, it was a perfect time!

Went up on the cable car to see the view and visit the war photo museum, which is very good. Stopped for a drink at Panorama and ended up ordering appetizers as well. Once we sat down, the view was astonishing and we wanted to stay for a while. Food was good and ambiance amazing!

We took the gondola up and had a edge of the cliff table for lunch. I am not a fan of heights but loved this. The service was excellent , the fruity drinks tasty and the food was just right. There is no other view like this in all of Dubrovnik. It was not crowded but we did come to Croatia in the midst of a pandemic!

While the scenery was nice, the food was just a step behind compared to some of the other fares we had in town. There were tons of bugs swarming us and we even had to have our glasses taken back after some bugs were found crawling around in it. One of three locations that support the 10% discount card, but I would say the other two (Gradska and Dubrovaka 1836) have the edge on this location. There is little to do at the top of the mountain besides this so don't feel rushed to come up much ahead of your reservation.
The views are incredible. The ham and cheese sandwich was really good. The waiters were attentive and very nice.

We were concerned that Panorama might be a place that had such a great view that they could get by with average food. That is definitely not the case! Every course was delicious and beautiful. The service was outstanding. It was an exceptionally windy night, so the tram wasn't running. We considered cancelling our reservations, but we were able to get an Uber to the top. They had blankets and a carefully positioned heater to keep us warm. The view as the sun was going down was jaw dropping. Definitely make a reservation and don't miss dining here. Ask for a table on the front row of the terrace with a view.
When in Dubrovnik you must take cable car and there you will find this great restaurant, fair price, good meal and very friendly stuff. The view is breath taking :)

This place a “must go” like literally you are definitely missing out. The view is amazing, the food is great, and the service....

Tihomir was our server and I never had such wonderful, great service in my own country (US). He was so kind and made our experience extra special. Definitely would recommend and we will be back. Special thanks to Tihomir!!!
Veggie risotto was incredible. Wonderful view. We were told reservations are usually far out at this restaurant.
Great service, food and THE VIEW! If you want to have amazing lunch, dinner or even just a coffe in peace and admire the view this is place for you. 5/5. I really reommend 😁😍
Excellent food, wonderful view and kind staff. We enjoyed in local and fresh dishes (the chef is amazing) and sun. We recommend to visit!

Amazing view and great staff. 
After a long walk climbing to the top point we were amazed by the beautiful view this place is offering. Maybe the most beautiful in Dubrovnik.
